Hagee barkka medhdhi xaafo giidi eqqiigiya xaafee medhdhi xaafo eranchcha gidenna.
A oosoykka puuli de’iyobaa geetettenna.
Nabbabiyaageekka hegaattuwa… taarike xalaala giidi nabbabikko puuli de’iyo ooso( medhdhi xaafo) gidiyoogee attidi shiishshi xaafo gidees.
( ኘሮጀክት 17ዐዐዐ፣ የ1ኛ ደረጃ 2ኛ ሳይክል መ/ራን የርቀት ትም/ኘሮጀክት ፡ 1994 ፡25.
Taarikiya shooqay aybee?
Tarikiya shooqay taarikiyaappe aybin dummati?
Aybin misatii?
Taarikiya shooqay hara attenna mehdhi xaafuwa ufura.
Taarikeenne taarikiya shooqay issoy issuwaara dabbotiyanne kaafettiyaabata.
Taarikee wodiya kasiya kaaluwa bolli baasettidi polettidabatu odo.
Taarikiya waattawu dummatida eeshshay imettiyoy qaasuwaara de’iya polettiyaabatu kasiya kaaluwa bolli baasettidoogaa gidennaagaa.
Amaare 1968: 2728/.
Naa’aykka medhdhi xaafuwa giddon beettiya polettiyaabatunne haniyaabatu kasiya kaaluwa naagida odo giyoogan misatiyaabata gidikkonne taarikee gaasuwaara de’iya kasiya kaaluwa naagida polettiyaabatunne haniyaabatu odo gidenna gishshawu taarikiya shooqaappe dummatees.
Hagaappe dendidaagan taarikiya shooqa; issi issi medhdhi xaafuwa giddon aybi aybissi hanidee?
Gi oychchidi demmiyo zaaruwa ba gomppan oyqqida oykko issi wodiyan kasiya kaaluwa naagidi polettida hanotati hanettido gaasuwaanne kaalettiyo ayfiya gatti oyqqida medhdhi xaafuwaassi bolla kifile geetettees.
Polettiyaabatunne haniyaabatu giddon gaasoy de’iyo dabbotettay( Ohettay) de’iyoogee medhdhi xaafuwa taarikiyaayyoo ashuwa mayzzidii de’iuwa (shemppuwa) immees.
Taarikiya shooqay gaasoy de’iyo polettiyaabatunne hanettiyaabatu kasiya kaaluwa bollan baasettidabaa gidiyogaa bessanawu maxaafatun shiiqennan attennabay foristtere heetiya.
Hgeekka,” Kawoy hayqqiis; A kayyuwa gaasuwan kawiya hayqqaasu”.
Ha leemisuwa giddon uttida yohoti ( Kawuwa hayqoynne kawee hayqoy) gaasuwaanne ayfiya gaytotettaa kasiya kaaluwa bolli baasettidaabeega gidiyo gishshawu; nabbabiyaageeti”yaatin kawiya aybissi hayqqadee”” giidi oychchiyo woyshawu, kawuwa hayquwa gaasuwan I bolli gakkida wolqqaama kayyuwappe denddidaagaana gidiyoogaa akeekkoosona.
Taarikiya shooqay, medhdhi xaafuwa giddon beettiya polettidabatinne haniyaabata, karssikarssata, eeshshaawati bantta heeraara gidin hara eehsshaawatuura de’iya gaytotettaanne medhdhi xaafuwa kumetta gomppaappe gum’’ettidi kiyiya gul’’abaa (cuccumaa)… h.
A giddon geliya yohoti ubbay gaasuwaaninne kuushshan (ayfiyan) qashettidi kasiya kaaluwa hemetan biidi issi ayfiya( kuushshaa) bolli gakkiyoode nabbabiya asa woppu oottoosona.
Hegaa hanotan nabbabiya urawu issi garssa ufayssaa medhdhiyoogee attenna.
Hegaa bollankka taarikiya shooqaay sanssalatadan ohettidi biyo buussay nabbabiya uray”kaallidi ooni?
Aybaa?
Polanaddeeshsha?
Qanttan xaaxi waaxiyoode: maara mankka hanotan waaxettida( shiiqida) taarikiya shooqay medhdhi xaafuwa odoy ayfaama, ufayssiyaagaanne yeemoyiyaagaa gidanaadan gita maaduwa immees.
Bessiya hanotan makkisettida( waaxettida) taarikiya shooqay ammanttiyaagaa.
Taarikiya shooqaa giddon shiiqiya yohoti hanotatinne harabati ubbay tumu alamiyan asa na’a de’uwan gayttana ( polettana) danddayiyaabata misatana koshshees.
Ha eeshshay beettiyaaba gidikko taarikiya shooqay nabbabiyaagetu achchan ammanettiyaagaa gidees.
Taarikiya shooqaara ohettidagan hara denddana bessiyaabay taarikiya shooqaa qommuwa.
Taarikiya shooqay issi achcha(selle) woykko cora achcha( waatta) gidana danddayees.
Issi achcha taarikiya shooqaa giyoogee issi achcha gidida allaalliya bolla xallan ayfiya wottidi giigiya taarikiya shooqa.
Gidoppe attin issi allaalle xalaalaa yuushuwan simerettiya taarike shooqi dariin de’ennaagee odettees.
Hara baggaara qassi cora achchaara de’iya taarikiya shooqay, daro allaalleta ba giddon oyqqiyoogaanne eeshshaawati undduwaalo gidida ayfe ayfe yohotunne hanotatu giddo geliiddi beettiyo taarike shooqa qommo / Danyyaachchew 1977/.
Gidoshin, ayyaa taarike shooqa giddon gidiin koyettiya ayfebay, issi issi polettiyaabaynne haniyaabay odettiyaabaa (taarikiya) dichchanawu abbee de’iyoobaa giyoogaanne; he taarikkiya shooqaa issi tangguwa sinttawu hemetissyo gidatettay de’ana danddayiyoogaa.
Hegee xayiyaabaa gidikko ay qommo taarike shooqaykka wolqqi baynnaagaa gidiyoogee attenna.
Ane taarikiya shooqaa xeelliyaagan shiiqida era cuccumettiyaagaa kessanawu kaalliya leemisuwa akeekoos.
Fiqir Iskke meqaabir geetettiya medhdhi xaafuwan kacaama eeshshawa gidida Bezzaabbi biittaa yeggidi baqatido taarikiya bolli wudiya qonccissoy hagaa misatees.
Goojjaame giddon Mankkusa geetettiya man’’iyan , manta Mabiraatu Boggaalleppenne Godattee Wuddinashippe yelettida Bezzaabba, na’atettan dumma dumma harggeti kayyan kayyan sakkidi paxa kaa’idosona.
Issi na’aa payyatettay simmana malanne shemppoora I de’ana mala geeshsha xoossatussi “shiiqo na’a”oottidi immoosona.
Gidinkkoonne Bezzaabbi diccidi asa gammi gakkiyoode bari diccido mootta, bari de’ido keettaa, barina dichchida aayyiyoonne aawaa oli aggidi biittappe xayees.
I biittaappe xaynawu bayra gaasoy shiiqqo na’a gidiyoogaa.
Yaatin shiiqo na’a gidiyoogee biittaappe baqatissii?
Yaagiya oyshaa nabbabiyaageeti denttanaagee attennaba.
Hegaayyookka, taarikiya shooqaa giddon shiiqida hanotatinne polettidabatu baggara aaliya zaaruwa demmoosona.
Bezzaabbi shiiqo na’atettaa ixuwa doommiyoy, na’atettan heeraa naatuura I kaa’iyoode heera naati shiiqo na’aa” yaagi yaagidi A bolli qilliiciyo wodiyaana.
He A laggetu qilliicee iitiyoogaa bari aayee Wuddinashissi ubbatoo odiyoogaanne waanoo giyoogaa aggibeenna.
Gidikkonne aayee cimoynne ha geeshsha xoossatu maaduwa demmiyo hanotay Bezzaabbi bari na’atetta layttan shiiqo na’atettaa ixxiy hanota lefissees.
Gidikkonne Bezzaabii astetta dicci dicci biyoode, layttay gujji gujji biyoode I qoppennan A sheefay( kahay) appe baqatees.
Nabbabiyaageeti ha’ikka “ aybissi?
Bezzaabbi shiiq na’atettaa ixotettay akeekennan zeerettidi yiido gaasotettay taarikiya shooqaa giddon imettiis.
Bezzaabbi layttay tammanne oyddaa heera gidiyoode bullachchaaninne layttaa baalatun gayttiya lo’’o lo’’o macca naati A dosiyoogaanne koyyiyoogaa qonccissanawu dumma dumma qonccissiyo malaatata bessido wode I akeekennan laamettiyoogaa doommiis; yettaanne kaassa dosiya Bezzaabbi yettaappenne kaassaappe haakkidi doona pogennan kayyottiiddi deiyoogaa dooriis.
“Yaatin, doona pogennan kayyuwan de’iyoogaa aybissi doorii?
Hagawukka medhdhi xaafuwa taarikiya shooqaa oduwa giddon gidiya zaaroy imettiis.
Hegeekka, Bezzaabbi, I dosiyoogaa oottennaadan, macca asaara laggetanawu danddayennaadan , hagaa mala bonchchuwawu qaadettoppe geetettidi barkka de’anaadan pirdday kasetidi A bollan kuuyettoogaa eriyo gishshataassa oonaaranne gayttennaninne doona pogennan kayyuwan di’iyoogaa doommidoy.
Ha hanotay shiiqo na’atettaa de’iwa ixxanaadan A oottees.
Bezzaabbi asadan merettidi, asadan de’ennaadan oottidaagee A medhdha xoossaa gidennan bari aayyiyo gidiyoogaa I bari doonan qonccisees.
Hagaa mala de’uwa( shiiqo na’a gididi de’iyoogaa) dosennaagaa, doorennaagaanne koyyennaagaa yootees.
Ha guugge giddo palamaappe guyyiyaana simmi A ammanuwaappenne deretettaa ammanuwappe ( xeelaappe) giddon de’iya karssikarssay googidinne zawaappe aadhdhidi xuuqqiyoy.
Hegee kaalettyogay qassi bari aayyiyonne aawaa, qassikka bari diccido keettaa olidi baqatiyoogaa gidees.
Hagaappe qommo baggaara shiiqida lemisuwan Bezzaabbi gelido hanotati, a bollan gakkidabati, hageekka kaalettido qofaa( buzo) karssikarssay, wurssettan ha ubbabati A qofaa goosissidi biittaappe xayanaadan oottidoogaa xeellida.
Hegaa giyoogeekka Bazzaabbi shiiqo na’a gididoogee bari laggetun qilliicissidoogaa, hara asadan siiqidinne siiqettidi de’anawu teqettidoogaa gidiyoogee, muleera bari yelettidi diccido heeran alamettuwa duussaa de’anawu danddayibeennaagee, bari aayee baggaara polettida shiiqqido na’atetta de’uwa ixxidi biittaappe baqatidoogaa akeekida.
Hagaappe haray shiiqqido na’atettaa ixxanawu gaaso gidida hanotata, ha hanotay loddan loddan yaa yaa iitanaadaaninne gammaappa aadhdhanaadan ootida hara haotati issoy issuwaara tukkubulettida gaaso gidiya hanotatu bolli baasettidi taarikiya shooqa kifiliya medhdhidosona.
Eeshshaawata.
Eeshshawati aybatee?
Eeshshaawatu qomoti oonee oonee?
Eshshaawatu eeshshati aybee aybee?
Medhdhi xaafuwa giddon odettiya taarike ubbay eeshshaawatubaanne etaara ohettida hanotaatubaa odes.
Hegaappe denddidaagan eeshshaawati medhdhi xaafuwawu keehippe koshshiya ayfe yohutuppe bayratettan xeesettiyaageeta.
Ha sima kifiliyan eeshshaawatu aybatettay, eeshshaawatu medhdhiyo ogetinne qommoiti shiiqoosona.
Eeshshaawatu aybatettaa.
Eeshshaawati medhdhi xaafuwa taarikiya giddon yaanne haanne qaaxxaqna mala daraasiya akeekaaninne guuggiya qofaa wolqqan merettiya tumu alamiyan de’iya asa gishsha gidiyaageeta.
Eta gishshatettay aadhdhi aadhdhidi leemisotetta meraa ekkiyo wodeekka de’ees.
Eta gishshatettay leemisotetta meran de’ana danddayees giyoode kiitanchchati, medoosati , do’ati, ayfiyan beettennabatinne beettiyaabati h.
Asa na’adan qoppoosona; sintta qofaa, siyettiyaabaanne bantta koshshaa h.
Bantta sintta qofaa hoolliya gattanawu hanettiyabatunne polettiyaabatu giddon walahettoosona.
Taarikiya godati guuggiya qofaa wolqqan merettoosona; etikka leemisota.
Nuuni de’iyo hanotaanne tumatettaa borinashshiya borxxoxxissidi nuna bessiya, nu tuggaa zoretissiya, nu ufayssaanne xoonuwa phoolissiya xoossatetta meretay de’iyoogeeta gidennan asa mereta.
Hagaa baggaara nu xeelliyoode daraasee gita medhdhiyaagaa….
Gidiyo gishshawu bari meretata etanatettaa ubbaa erees.
Eta wozanaaninne guuggiyan de’iyaabi Kushiyaana.
Eta aymuwa bessees.
Ikka etaara issippe be’ees.
Nunakka bessees.
Waatidi giikko, Aaymoy ‘ajjuutay’ xuuray h.
Medhdhi xaafuwa meretati paxa de’iyaageetuppe nuuni eriyo ay asanne gidennan asa na’aa ubbaa bantta garssan shiishshi oyqqiyoogeeta.
Eta haasayay obaakka gidenna” eti gishshatidi gelliyo uraabaa.
Eti beettiyoy (eqqiyoy) bantta buzobawu (issibaa xalaalaw) gidennan kumettatettaassanne leemisotettaassa.
Ha qommoora shiiqidabaappe eeshshaawati merettido wodiyaaninne qatuwan beettiya de’uwa malaatay (ashaaray) beettiyoogeeta gididi de’uwa undduwaalo sinttaa bessiya asa naatu misatotanne gishshtidi geliyaageeta gidiyoogaa akeekeettees.
Bolla baggaara qonccidoogaadan, zammaana xaafuwan darotoo eeshshaawati merettiyoy asa naatu leemisuwaana.
Eti xeesettiyo sunttaykka asa na’atubaa.
Fiqir Iskke meqaabir geetettiya medhdh xaafuwan xeesettiya pitiraariya Mashasha , Sebilewonggelonne Bazzaabba, Ke Adimaas Baashshagger giyaagan, Abara, Haylemaryiyamanne Lulito, ye qeyyi kookkeb xirrii giyaagan, dereiba, Hiruutonne manta Guliilaata leemisodan denttana danddayeettees.
Ha eeshshaawati asadan ashuwa maayidi,shemppuwa ekkidi, sunttay imettiin h.
Gidikkonne aadhdhi aadhdhidi eeshshaawati asa meraa ekkidi merettenna wode gayttees.
Ha hanotay merettiyoy eeshshaawati leemiso meran, giyoogeekka, ayyaanati, medoosatinne do’ati, cuccumettiyaabatinne cuccumettennabati medhdhi xaafuwa giddon bolla ekkidi ayfiyan beettiyaaba gididi asa naatu gishshawu shiiqiyo wode giyoogaa.
Ha meran eti shiiqiyoogee medhdhi xaafuwa giddon asa naatu gishshaa gididi yaa haa qaaxxiyoogaa diggenna.
Eeshshaawatu qommuwa.
Eeshshaawati naa’’u qommuwan moodettoosona.
Hegeetikka sellenne undduwaalo eeshshaawata geetettoosona.
Selle eeshshaawat giyoogeeti qommuwankka gidin yesuwan metoy darennaageeta, issi ginaara, issi achcha( macara) xallaara merettidaageeta/ Tesfaye 1978, Debbebe 1973/.
Selle eeshshaawati undduwaalonne cora macaaraara de’iya metotunne hanotatu giddo gelennaageelanne issi erettida eeshshaa oyqqidi kantti kiyiyaageeta gidiyo gishshawu nabbabiyaageetu matan waayissennan dummatidi erettiyaageeta.
Selle eeshshaawati merettiyoy, qayfettiya eeshshaawatu issi issi qonccenne geema( bollanne garssa) mereta, polettiyaabata… h.
Pattiyaaban pattennaban ba laytta ubban coo ganccariya bitanee, issi shumuruukkobaa oottiyoogan cimmiya shareechchoy bari golla xalla demmanawu warettiya doonaa qara dallaallay qoncen kasaliyo bayzziya hiyyeesiya h.
Selle eeshshaawati, metoy hegaa keeni dariyoogeeta gidenna gishshawunne issi allaalle bolla xallaan wudiyaageeta gidiyo gishshawu; “hayqqanaappe attin” giissiya baaxiyaanne olaa giddo gelokkona.
Darotoo, medhdhi xaafuwa giddon issi amarida taarikiya sohuwan amarida wode xallawu puttu giidi sohuwaarakka qassi xayi aggiyaageeta.
Hageekka eti waayissennan erettanaadaanine hassayettanaadan oottees.
Hara baggaara mati issi erettida bantta eeshshaa wurssettaa gakkanawu shukuluuli oyqqidi kantta kiyiyaageeta , wolqqaama baaxiyaanne karssikarssa giddon gelennaageetanne taarikiya giddon eti geliyo sohoy ziqqa gididoogeetanne eta wsunttay xeesettiyoode nabbabiya asay sohuwaara eri aggiyoogeeta gidiyoogaa, nabbabiyaageeti laamotennaageetanne qaaqqatennageeta gidanaadan oottees.
Nabbabiyaageeta maalaalissiyanne eta nashissiya abbee baynnaageeta gidiyo gishshawu salettiyaageeta gidana danddayoosona.
Meeziya: Ane hano gakkanawu intte nabbabido medhdhi xaafotu giddon intte hassayiyo selle eeshshaawata yootite.
Naa’’antto qommo eeshshaawati undduwaalo eeshshaawata geetettoosona.
Undduwaalo eeshshaawati bollanne garssa / doonaanne kahaa) meray gazzatidoogeeta, undduwaalettida metotuuranne karssikarssatuura baaxetiyaageeta, bantta sintta qofaa hoolliya gattanaw wolqqaama baaxiyaanne barchchiya giddoora kanttiyaageeta gidiyo gishshawu nabbabiyaageeti medhdhi xaafuwa tarikiya giddon demminnekka metoy baynnan erana danddayokkona.
Eta oonatettaanne eta buzo erettida eeshshata gammayidi eranawu danddayiyoy, taarikiya wurssettaa gakkanawu wozanappe nabbabiyoogaaninne eta buzonne haraara de’iya eeshshaa akeekan pilggiyoogan, hegaakka eti merettido wodiyaanne qantuwa tamu issipetettaa de’o sinttaara( ginaara) gattidi xeelliyoogana gidiyoogaa abaa pilggiya eranchchati yootoosona.
Undduwaalo eeshshaawati issi medhdhi xaafuwa taarikiya giddon etawu de’iya gishshay xoqqa gidiyo gishshawu issi erettida taarike kifiliyan qantta wodiyawu beettidi xayiyaageeta gidokkona.
Ubbakka dariya medhdhi xaafuwa taarikee kiirimmiyoy eta de’uwa yuushuwaana gidiyo gishshawu, ayfettiya yohotunne hanotatu giddon gelidi walahettishin ( oottishin) be’eettees.
Hegaappe denddidaagan hageetu mala eeshsha wati dariya medhdhi xaafuwa shemppotu giddon ayfiyan kumi beettidi paxa kiyidi qaaxxiiddi beettoosona.
Undduwaalo eeshshaawati, unddennanne undduwaalo metoti tiran gayttiyoogeetanne, etikka sintta qofaa minotettan wolqqaama baaxiya bazxetiyaageeta gidiyo gishshwu medhdhi xaafuwa taarikiya buussawu dumma maaduwa immoosona.
Hegaa bollan , taarikiya giddon de’iya sohoy aahonne eta metoykka wolqqaama gidiyo gishshawu nabbabiyaageeti qaaqqatanaadan oottees.
Eta metoti issi kuushshaa bolli gakkiyoodenne eta buzo erettida eeshshata nabbabiyaageeti wurssettan akeekiyoosaa gakkiyoode nabbabiyaageetu bolli issi maalaalettiyoobaa medhdhees.
Ke Adimaas baashshaagger geetettiya medhdhi xaafuwa ayfettiya eeshshaawati Abarinne Haylemariyami undduwaalo eeshshaawatu leemiso gidana danddayoosona.
Karssikarssaa.
Karssikarssaa aybatettaa.
Karssikarssaa aybatettaa xeelliyan Mantta Asafaa Zariun (2000:172) kaalliyaagaatti qibccussas.
Tumu alamiyan asa de’uwan dumma dumma waretaynne baaxee gayttees.
Ha baaxeenne waretay de’uwan de’anawu, de’oyyoo koshshiyaabata kunttanawu, kehiyaagaa demmanawu, amottiyoobaawu gakkanawu, xaaxi waaxin koshshaa kunttanawu woykko wozanaa woppissanawu ooseettiyaabata.
De’uwan de’anawu gididi garssa koshshaa kunttana giishiin asatu giddon merettiya dumma dumma gaasotuppe denddidaagan issoy issuwaabaa maayenna hanotatinne phalqqettati naa’’u yaratu giddon merettiiddi beettoosona.
Hageeti qassi bantta baggaara ooshshaanne sugettaa ehoosona.
Ha hanotay de’uwa giddon qoncciyan beettiyaabanne attennabaa gidiyoogee erettidaba.
Medhdhi xaafoykka tumu alamiyaabaa phoolisiyaagaa gidiyo gishshawu hagaa mala hanotaappe gaxa gidana danddayokkonna.
Medhdhi xaafo alamiyan de’iya eeshshaawati taarikiya giddon eta garssan merettida gaytotettaappe denddidaagan dumma dumma gaasotun lanccetu woykko phalqqettatu giddo geloosona.
Ha lanccetunne phalqqettatu gaasuwan merettiyaabay karssikarssaa geetettidi xeesettees.
Naa’’u ixettiya wolqqatu gidduwan merettiya baaxiyan, issoy haraa xoonanawu, issoy haraa oogganawu, woykko issoy bollatettaa demmanawu warettiyoode; haray qassi xoonettena mala, kunddenna mala, woykko haray appe bollatenna mala birqqiiqishin be’eettees.
Karssikarssay, eeshshawati baaxetiiddi gelido torqquwaappe kiyanawu warettishin, qassi hara metoy sinttan eqqishin, qassikkka ha metuwa lonqqu oottanawu ( zarbbissanawu) malishin beettiyo medhdhi xaafuwawu ayfettiya urura.
Ikka qaassi attennaba gidiyo gishshawu”karssikarssay taarikiyawu zokko meqetta geetettees.
Zokko meqettay asi bari qottaa oyqqidi eqqanaadaaninne qaaxxanaadan haphphidi kaafi oyqqiya bolla kifile.
Karssikarssaykka taarikia mino tuussan wozanappe kaafidi gaxaappe gaxa gakkanawu, awu halchchettida ogiyan baanaadan oottiyaagaa gidiyo gishshataassa zokko meqettan leemisettidoogee.
Karssikarssay waattay keexettiyo baasoba geetettees.
Taarikiya waattaa buussan oosettiyaabatu woykko haniyaabatuyyoo denddoy( donttay) woykko gaasoy karssikarssaa gidiyo gishshataassa I hagaadan geetettidoy.
Issi taarikee sinttawu baana danddayiyoy karssikarssaa giddo geliya naa’’u eqettiya eeshshaawati polyoobatu woykko ixettiya wolqqatu gaasuwan merettiya yohotuuna.
Eeshshaawatu garssan merettiya dom’’ettan haniyaabati medhdhi xaafoy qaaqqayiyaagaa gidanaadan maaddiyaageeta.
Leemisuwawu Fiqir iskke meqaabir geetettiya medhdhi xaafuwan Mebiraatu Boggaalenne Baxaamu Wuddinashi , Danxxe kaasanne pitiraariya Mashsha , pitiraariya Mashshanne pitiraaliya Asagge, Bezzaabbinne A aawu giddon merettida karssikarssatinne eta gaasuwan eeshshaawatun polettida yohoti taarikee yeemoyiyaagaa gidanaadn maaddidosona /Zerihun 2000: 172173.
Karssikarssa eeshshata.
Ay qommo medhdhi xaafo karssikarssawu ayyoo A eeshshay de’ees.
Koyroy, karssikarssawu de’iya gaasuwa xeelliyaagaa.
Naa’’u ixettiya wolqqati morkketettan xeelettanaadaninne xiiqqottanaadan oottiya qonccidi beettiya karssikarssaa ashshenna yohoy (gaasoy) woykko halchchoy de’ana bessees.
Hageekka karssikarssaa gaasuwa geetettees.
Hegaa gishshawu, isettiya wolqqata ixotettaa giddo gelissiya, karssikarssawunne baaxiyawu denttettiya, bessiyaanne doonaa kumiya gaasoy woykko halchchoy de’iyoogee karssikarssawu erettida eeshsha gidiyoogee erettana bessees.
Karssikarssaa gaasoy xiiqqottiya wolqqatu gidduwan merettiya halchchuwa, equwa, xeelaa, oosuwa ammanuwa, koshshaanne h.
Hegeetu mala karssikarssaa gaasotikka bessiyaageeta (ekettiyaageeta) gidana koshshees.
Bessennaageeta gidiyaaba gidikko medhdhi xaafuwa taarikiya sinttawu hemetissiyo abbee de’enna.
Hegaappe denddidaagan taarikee biroon doommishin nabbabiyaageeta yeemoyennaagaanne ufayssennaa gidees.
Aadhdhida kifiliyan qonccissanawu malidoogaadan; Fiqir iskke meqaabir, geetettiya medhdhi xaafuwan de’iya Bezzaabbi yelettido heeraanne barina yelidaageeta oli bayidi xayanaadan oottida karssikarssaa medhdhida gaasoy, heeraa naati “shiiqo na’aa” yaagi yaagidi baceessiyoogaanne shiiqo na’a gididoogaappe denddidaagan bollachchaaninne layttaa baalatun aara gayttiya bari lagge macca naatuura siiqo de’uwa medhdhanawu danddayibeenna hanotaa.
Hagaappekka haray ha medhdhi xaafuwa giddon demmiyo hara eehshsaawatu, Mebiraatu Boggaallenne Baxaamu Wuddinash, Pitiraariya Mashashanne Godatte Xiru Aynet, pitiraariya Mashashanne Pitiraariya Asegge, Pitiraariya Mashshanne Danxxe Kaasa, Pitiraariya Mashashanne Sebile Wonggeli… h.
Hageekka medhdhi xaafuwa taarikee biroon doomettaappe qaaqqayiyaagaa gidanaadan oottiis gaanawu danddayettees.
Karssikarssaa issipetettaaranne waattaara ohettidabaa.
Bessiyaagaatto shiiqida karssikarssay kanttiyo dumma dmeeziyaara ohettida waatta xekkati woykko odo kifileti de’oosona.
Hegeetikka, karssikarssaa gaasuwa,.
Shikkaaletuwa, umbbubulettaanne purettaa.
Eta gaytotettaa kaalliyaagaatto formula meran wottana danddayettees.
Gaasuwa Shikkaalettuwaumbbubulettuwapurettaa.
Issi gaasuwan merettida karssikarssaappe denddidaagan ixettiya wolqqatu giddon merettiya shaahotaynne xiiqqottay issoy issuwaara olettanaadan oottees.
He olaykka meetettiiddinne shikkaalettididdi biidi shikkaaluwa giyoogaa xekkawu gakkees.
Naa’’u yaratu domettay yaatti iitidinne wolqqaami wolqqaami ddinne gammaappe aaddhiyo xekkay woykko kifilee umbbubulettaa geetettees.
Hegaappe guyyiyan qassi ha wolqqaamidi umbbubulettida naa’’u ixettiya wolqqatu karssikarssay leeppi leppidinne birshshetti birshshettidi bees.
Hagee karssikarssay loddan loddan leppi leppidi biyoogan issi qommo ayfiya demmiyo xekkay ( kifilee) qassi purettaa geetettees.
Ha kifiletu ubban karssikarssawu maado gidiya allaalletinne hanotati beettana bessees/ Tesfay 1978, Zerhun 1992/.
Simmi karssikarssay issipetettay naagettidoogaa gidana bessees.
Giyoode, qofa (I oyqqidobaa) issipetettay maayettidaaga ( giiga) gidana bessees.
Hegaattuwa jarssikarssay waattatettay de’iyogaa gidana bessees giyode karssikarssay waattatettay de’iyogaa gidana bessees giyoode karssikarssay merettido dumma dumma xwkkatu( kifiletu) giddo waattaatettaa ohettaynne qaraynnettiyo hanotay de’ana bessees giyogaa.
Hegaa gidiyo gishshawu, issipetettaynne (waattatettay) (quraynnetettay) de’iyo karssikarssay dumma dumma kifilwru( xekkatu) waattatettaynne qofaa dabbotettay de’idi, issoy haraa yeliiddi , issoy haraa zemppissiiddinne dichchiiddi taarikiya poluwa gakkanaashin baana bessees.
Hagaa mala buussay qassi medhdhi xaafuwa taarikee nabbabiyaageetu wozanaa gaggiyaagaanne aggoppa aggoppa giy aagaa oottees.
Leemisuwawu, ke Adimaas baashshaagger geetettiya medhdhi xaafguwan, karssikarssaa denddiyonne worettay, qofaanne waattaa gaytotettay naagettin xaafettoogaa akeekana danddayettees.
Naa’’u eqettiya yaratu giddon de’iya karssikarssa wolqqaa yesoy ( abee) giiga woykko mise gidana bessees/ Tesfaye 1978, Zerihun 1992/.
Naa’’u eqettiya wolqqatu giddon phalqqettaanne ixotettaa medhdhida halchchuwa, equwa, xeelaa , ammanuwa, koshshaa, h.
Hagee qassi karssikarssaynne baaxee ufayssennagaanne yeemoyennaagaa gidanaadan oottees.
Hegaappekka haray taarikiya qaattaa teqqees.
Nabbabiya uri, laa ha’i aybi hananwu diishsha?
Ooni , aybaa oottanawu diishsha?

Leemisuwawu, Fiqir iskke meqaabiriya giddon godatte Bexaamu Wuddinashinne Mantta Mebiraatu Boggale giddon merettida dom’’ettan naa’u eeshshaawatu gidduwa de’iya woqqaaa abbee giiga gaanawu danddayettees.
Eta giddon merettida dom’’ettawu gaasoy bantta na’aa Bezzaabbi sintta de’uwa xeelliyaagan etawu de’iya koshshaa woykko equwa dummatetta.
Godattiya Baxaamu wuddinasha , Bezzaabba na’atettan waayissida dumma dumma harggetuppe I woosaanne shiiquwa siyidi gonddalle gididi ashshidaageeti taabootata gidiyo gishshawu , Bazzaabikka dicciyoode taabootatussi oottiiddi geela’otettan de’ana mala koyyawusu.
Hegaa gishshawu shiiqo na’a gidanaadan oottawusu.
Hegaa gidana xaykko boshan gayettees yaagada ammanawusu.
Hara baggaara qassi Mantta Boggaalee barintta na’ay hara ay asadankka keexxidi , haaridi, machchidi alame duussaa de’ana mala, qassi etakka maaddidinne zemppissidi de’anaadan koyyees.
Ha naa’aykka ha bantta dumma dumma koshshati polettin be’anawu wolqqaama amoy de’ees.
Hageekka baaxe giiga woykko matattidaagaa gidanaadan oottees.
Leemisuwa.
Hara gujoleemisuwa ha hanotaa qonccissoos.
Naa’’u dumma dumma citati keeshe kuwaasiya kaa’oosona giidi qoppoos.
Ha naa’’u citati aybannekka baaxetennan de’ishin issoy aybakka gelissaennan , issoy qassi usuppunaa haraa bolli gelissi xoonikko he kaa’ida naa’’u citati giiga gidokkona .
Nuuni xoonidaagaa bagga gidiyaageeta gidikkokka he kaassay dariin ufayssennaagaa gidees.
Kaassay ufayssiyaagaanne nu hulluuquwa baakko zaarana danddayiyoy , naa’’u citati kaassay kuuyettana gakkaanashin issoy hara xoonanawu warettiyo waretay giiganne matattiyaagaa gidiyo wodiyaana.
He kaassan xooniya citaa mali ekkanawu waayissana gakkanawu issoyi issuwara wolqqaama annaacettidi issi wurssettaa ayfiya bolli gakkiyoode alees.
Medhdhi xaafuwa giddonkka, eqettiya wolqqatu giddon de’iya karssikarssaynne kaaxee giiga gididi shiiqiyoogee hagaa mala ayfiya beetissees.
Ammanettiyoogaa.
Medhdhi xaafuwan merettiya karssikarssay asa naatu de’uwan merettiyaagaa mala gidana bessees.
Hegeekka qassi bnabbabiyaagetu achchan ammanettiyaagaa gidanaadan oottees.
Ha karssikarssaa ammanettoy; eqettiya wolqqatu dom’ettawu gaaso gidiyabatu( halchchuwa, ammanuwa, xeelaa, koshshaa h.
Debddaabbewu giya medhdhi xaafuwan Medaabuu geetettiya eeshshaaway Bisiraati siiquwan ohettiyoogee, hegaappe denddidaagan dabddaabbiya xaafidi immanawu qachchoogaappe guyyiyan, immoo immoppoo giyoogan barkka mootettiyoogeenne yashshan kumidi haniyoobaa xayiyoogee, hegaappe simmin immanawu qachchiyoode qassi zaari zaaridi xubee gayettiyoogee( Koyro gallassi otobisiya toggiyo issi santé bakkanay xayiyoogee, hara gallassi qassi Bisiraatippe guyyebaggaara hokki ekkidi o kaalliiddi sinttaara eqqida biraataara dom’’ettiyoogee) nne wurssettan dabddaabiya immidabaa gidikkonne Bisiraatea xaafido dabbdaabbiye zaaroy asaa gidennan A gadawaassa gididoogee( qoppenne poluwa) tummu alalamiyan polettiyaabaa misatiyaaba.
Karssikarssaa qommota.
Tumu alamiyan de’iya asa na’I bari huuphiyaara, hara asaara, deretettaa wogaaranne meeziyaaranne meretaara karssikarssees.
Medhdhi xaafuwa eeshshaawatikka hageetu malatuura baaxetoosona.
Karssikarssaa qommoy eeshshaawatu giddo gaytotettaadan dummatees.
Dumma dumma ereanchchati dumma dumma karssikarssaa qommoti de’iyoogaa yootiyaabaa gidikkonne ayfettiyageti oydda.
Hagaa mala karssikarssay naa’’u eeshshaawatu giddon merettiya halchchwa, xeelaa, ammanuwa, koshshaanne amuwa dummatettaa gaasuwan merettiyaagaa.
Hageekka naa’’u eeshshaawati phalqqetta qofaa garssi gelanaadaninne bari yaraa yaraa ekkidi xoonanawu baaxetanaadan oottees.
Qeyyi kokkeb xirrii geetettiya medhdhi xaafuwan manta Gullilaatanne Godattee Amisaali giddon, Derribanne Mantta Gullillaatentta gidduwan, Derribanne Hiruuti iddon h.
Eeshshaaway meretaara gayttiyo karssikarssaa.
Eeshshaaway meretaa haniyaabatuuranne mereta sinttatuura dom’’ettees.
Leemisuwawu: Medoosatuuranne do’atuura, dozatuuranne heeraa carkkuwa eeshshaara, ha carkkuwa hanotaa kaallidi merettiya melatettaa, haattaa kixaa, bazzotettaa, misatiyaabatuura darotoo karssikarssay merettees.
Leemisuwawu zerihun Biraanu Ma’ibel ye abiyot waazeemaa geetettiya medhdhi xaafuwan goshshanchchay namisaaranne melatetaara dom’’ettishin be’eettees.
Eeshshaaway deretettaa wogaaranne meeziyaara medhdhiyo karssikarssaa.
Hagee eeshshaaway deretettaa seeraara , meeziyaara, wogaara, ammanuwaara, duussaa maaraaranne misatiyaabatuura medhdhiyo karssikarssaa.
Ha deretettaa eeshshati eeshshaawaa buzo xeelaara, ammanuwaara, qofaara, koshshaaranne amuwaara h.
Fiqir iskke meqaabiriya giddon Bezzaabbi taabotatussi shiiqo na’adan imettido gaasuwan hara ay asadankka bari dosidobaanne koyyii dobaa oottanawu danddayibeenna.
Hegaappe denddidaagan A koshshaanne deretettaa koshshaa, ammanuwanne meeziya giddon wolqqaama karssikarssay merettees.
Karssikarssaykko gammaappe aadhdhidoogaappe denddidaagan yelettido man’’iya olidi baqati aggiis.
Hagaappe bolla baggara qonccida karssikarssa qommota issippe xaaxi waaxidi bolla (kare bagga) karssikarssa yaagidi xeesiyaageeti de’oosona.
Hegawukka eta gaasoy ubbaykka qoncciyaaninne beettiya naa’’u eqettiya wolqqati baaxetiyooba gidiyo gishshaassa.
Eeshshaaway barinaara medhdhiyo karssikarssaa.
Hagaa mala eeshshaawan agiddon merettiya karssikarssa gididi kaha giddoba woykko garssabaa geetettidi erettees/zerihun 1992, 175/ Hariishowuna/1972/ odidi ha karssikarssabaa aybatettaa qonccissiiddi” Issi uraa giddon de’iya koshshatu garssan merttiya phalqqetta” yaagees.
Tumu alamiyan polettiyaabatunne eeshshaawaa garssa sinttatu( eeshshatu) gidduwan maayettenna hanotay merettiyoode eeshshaawaa giddon asummatettaa metoy merettees.
Eeshshaawaa guugge giddon simerettiya buzo ammanoy, buzo hulluuqoy, buzo xeelay, buzo koshshay, buzo halchchoy, buzo eqoy, h.
Giddo karssikarssan shikkaalettida eeshshaawaayyo bayra malaatay, issibaa kuuyyanawu( qachchanawu) abbiya xayiyoogaa, bichchaariyoogaa, woppaa xayuwa, qofaa wulaatiyoogaanne un’’ettiyoogaa h.
Garssa karssikarssaayyo bayratettan odettiyaabati he aawu eeshshaawaa giddon simerettiya garssa hanotata gidiyoogee qoncce.
Gidoppe attin, garssa karssikarssawu gaaso gidiyaabati garssabata xalaala gidennan kare bagga hanotatikka gaaso gidiyoogaa akeekana koshshees.
Ke adimaas baashshaageriya waana eeshshaway Worqqu Abari garssa karssikarssan gelida eeshshaawatuyyoo leemiso.
Worqqu abari hananawu koyyidonne hanidi beettidoobaa giddon merettida phalqqettaa gaasuwan wolqqaama giddo karssikarssaan shikkabillettida asa.
Abara, issi baggaara issipetettaa meezee, A ishaa manta Worqqu abaatenne A aayyiya godattiya Baafanna ?
machcho ekka” mati giyoogee, I oottiyo ooso keettan zammaana biro oosuwa daafuray hara baggaara qassi A giddon geemmi uttidi waayssiiddinne ooliiddi gam’’ida misiliya medhdhiya kiyiyo hidootay wolqqaama garssa karssikarssaa medhdhidosona.
Hagaappe denddidaagan A guugge shaaraa qashamees, pudiya dugiya gees, hanno hanana giyoobay ixxxi uttiis, qashauwa xayi uttiis.
Ha hanotatun qashetti uttiis.
Hagappe denddidaagan, medhdhi xaafuwa taarikiya giddon darotoo bari huuphiyaar mootettishin be’eettees, bana barkka zaari zaaridi oychchees.
Ta oonee?
Miishsha(buqura), ikka allaalle keesenna kasaarida miishsha.
Miishsha gidana attanaadan oottiday oonee?
Ta huuphen taneeyye woykko tana yelida deretettay woykko taani ta\maara kanttada yiido timirttiya hoollee?
Timirttiya sintto qofay issi issi uri barintettaa, bari oonatettaanne bari meretaimotaa eranaadan ootiyoogaa.
I bawu taani oonee?
Worqqu Abara hagaa malatiya oonatettaa oyshaa giddo mootuwa giddo gelissidaagee I hananawu koyiiyoogaa hananawu danddayibeennaagaa.
Ane tumu alamiya asaa bolli neeni xeellidobaanne woykko neeni nabbabido medhdhi xaafuwa giddon ne demmido karssikarssa qommota birshshada yoota?
Woqaa.
Medhdhi xaafuwawu baaso ufura gidida woqay wodiyaanne qatuwa qonccissiya naa’’u qaalatu waattan beettida qaala.
Wo giyaagee wodiya giya qaalaappe duutti ekkidi qa giyaagee qassi qatuwa giya qaalaappe duutti ekkoogaappe guyyiyan naa’aa gattiyoode “Woqa” geetettiya qaalay merettiis giyoogaa.
Hegaa gidishin wode…issi taarikee polettido wodiya gidishin, qotay qassi issi medhdhi xaafuwa taarikee hanidonne polettido qatuwa( man’’iya) qonccissees.
Xaaxi waaxiyoode, eeshshaawati bantta de’uwaayyoo koshshiya yohota demmiyoonne poliyo wodiyanne qatuwa giyoogaa.
Qatuwa geetettiyaagee, eeshshaawatu de’iya sohuwaanne taarikiya poliyo sohota muleera xeelliyaaba.
Sohoy, dumma dumma mereta hanotaa, biittaa utettaa, heeraa sinttata, dembbaa, koluwa, woraa , shaafa , keettaa, quliya , gonggoluwa, buzzuwa, wogga ogiya, giyaa sohuwa, ooso keettaa…h.
Hegaa bollankka, dumma dumma allaalliya immiya miishshata, maayota, alleeqiyabati, haasayaa, muussaanne de’uwa hiillati( urqqaa oosoy), dere saawu de’iya taarike, aqo, polotikaanne wogaa de’o sinttati( merati) , hageeta kaallidi yiya dumma dumma deretettaa gaytotettati… zal’’iya ,olaa, goossaa dumma dumma meretaa gaasuwa yiya danobati, namisaynne koshay(iraa xayoy), carkkuwa hanotaa laamee, di’oynne biitta giddoppe kiyiya tamay… h.
Leemisuwawu, Nuuzaazee geetettiya qantta medhdhi xaafuwa taarikee odettiyo man’’etuppe issuwa gidida waanne eeshshaawaa de’iyo keettaa meray kaalliyaagaato shiiqiis.
Taani Addisaabi yuuyyoosappe laappun laytta gidiis.
Ta oyddu naatuura Baashshaa Wolddee geetettiya heeran de’ays.
Keettiya naa’’u kifile.
Yaahaa simmiyoos baynnaaro.
Issinniya taanne shawaaya zin’’iyosiyo ,hankkoriya wuyigenne quma miyoosiyo.
Gidduwan de’iya penggiyawu gordde gididi genttiya issi gal’’a magalashoy de’ees.
Nu keetteeyyo, koriniise,ifitta, aanno geetettiyaabi baawa.
Keetta geetettana gishshawu mati issi isi kifilyan qooreppe garssa xalla luuxissiya issi issi maskkootee de’ees.
Godaawu ushachchinne haddirssi xeelliiddi pee’ikkokka issi godaa bolli kaqettida poototuppe harabaa aybanne be’ekketa.
Taanne ta naatetta lagge kushiya kushiyaara ohettidi, shawaaya diccida huuphiyaara (በጐፈሬ) , A qassi Askkiyo idimmada, taani qassi I matan Bixxillo oyqqada, kuraateenne zennebee nu achchan eqqidi ta poototi simi hageeta.
Biron sintta baggaara intte geliyo wode issi xarapheezzaa, geddi gi uttida oyddu oydeta, sihuwaara de’iya carqqiya kametti uttida piliipise iraadoonee adussa oydee(zalanggay), heezu jimma oydeta hageeta A bari garssan oyqqidobati.
Qammi qammi mati ta naati zin’’yo naa’’u saleenatanne puu7ettidi meraara ubbaa laamettida naa’’u firaasheta yeggeettees.
Ee ta naati hagaan aqoosona.
Galaben de’ishin ta imettida gal’’ida aaho birddilisiyaanne issi gal’’a gaabe misatiya carqqeta issoy issuwaappe dafi dafidi ekkiddinne ooyttiidi, issoy issuwaara sugettiiddinne qaacettiiddi aqiyoorippe attin awudenne saruwan zin’’idi aqi erokkona.
Hara woqaa meraappe issoy wodiya.
Wodee qonciyo oyddu merati de’oosona.
Issoy, medhdhi xaafuwa giddon qaaxxiya eeshshaawati phoolissidi bessana mala koyettida dere asaa de’oy polettido taarikiya wodiya muleera xeelliyaaba.
Naa’’anttoy , taarike polettidonne eeshshaawati de’ido erettida wodiya / ወቅት/ boniya, balgguwa, silaa gabbaa) shiishshi oyqqiyaaba.
Heezzantto meray, taarikeenne hanidabay polettido gallassaa, saatiya gallassaa, qammaa bessiyaagaa /Zerihun 1992/.
Hegaappekka haray taarikee polettido sokonddee, daqiiqay, saaminttay, aginay hagaa giddon geliyaaba.
Oyddantto meray qassi, taarikiya giddon qaaxerettiya eeshshaawati issoy issuwaay poliyo gaytotettaara ohettidaba.
Eeshshaawati iitan gidin kehan issoy issuwaara oottiyo gaytotettay wodiyan zawatidaba.
Leemisuwaw, issi eeshshaaway haraa ixxiyy, woykko issi eeshshaway haraa siiqiyoy woykko issi eeshshaaway haraa woriyoy h.
Wodiyaara oyqettidaagan nu akeekana bessiya ayfebay, daraasee, taarikee polettido wodiya, layttaa h.
Hagaa mala taarikee gayttiyoode he taarike wodiya erana danddayiyoy , medhdhi xaafuwa giddon shiiqida de’uwa hanotati(sittati), eeshshaawatu qofay, haasayay, maayoy, alleeqettiyo hanotaynne go’ettiyo miishshati h.
Darraasee medhdhi xaafuwa giddon layttaa giddon deiya wodetakka qoncciyan yootennan taarikiya shiishshikko, medhdhi xaafuwa giddon merettida eeshshaawatu oosuwa, qaattaa, duussaanne maayuwa hanotaa, carkkuwanne heeraa hanotaa qonccissuwa h.
Kaallidi Gunggun geetettiya medhdhi xaafuwappe ekettidaagee wodiyaara ohettida taarikiya oyqqido gishshawu leemisodan xeelloos.
Baraataa aginaa 7 gallassi 1958 m.
Hagaappe qommoora shiiqida leemisuwan layttay, saateenne sohoy sittaaninne qoncciyan odettidootaa akeekettees.
Issi issi daraasee bari dooruwaadaaninne bari danddayaadan, hagaappe bolla baggaara qwonccida woqa kifiletu giddoppe taarikiyawu injjetiyaagaa go’ettana maatay de’ees.
Issi issi daraasee woqaa shiishshiyoy medhdhi xaafuwawu koyro shemppuwan woykko shemppota issippe shiishshiyoogaaninne dumma dumma qonccissiyoogaana.
Gidoppe attin, hagaa mala shiishoy daro zammaana daraaseti doorokkona.
Cora zammaana daraaseti mati woqaa eeshshaawatu oosuwaaranne hanotaara issi gatti gattidi qanttan qanttan walkki walakki gelissidi qonccissoosona.
Hagee qassi nabbabiya uray woqaa polettiyaabatuuranne hanotatuura gatti ooyttidi nabbabiya gishshawu dogennaadan oottiyoogaappekka taarikee salettennaadan oottees.
Taarikiya odiyo ginay, medhdhi xaafuwa taarikiya odiyay oonee?
Taarikiya odiyaagee taarikiyaara de’iya gaytotettay aybee?
Taarikee odettidoy o ginaaree?
Giya oyshatussi haniyaanne aliya zaaruwa immiya medhdhi xaafo ufura.
Taarikiya odiyaagee he taarikiyanikka de’idi(walahettidi) woykko taarikiyawu gido gelennan qaxan eqqidi xeelliyabada taarikiya odana danddayees.
Issi daraasee o ginaara medhdhi xaafuwa taarikiya shiishshana bessiyaakkonne eeshshaawatussinne taarikiya waattawu giigiya ginaa akeekan doorananne kuuyyana bessees.
Hagaa maaran , daraaseti bantta dooruwaadaaninne koshshaadan dumma dumma taarikiya shiishshiyo gina qommota go’ettoosona.
Taarikiya shiishshiyo oyddu ayfe ayfe ginati de’oosona.
Ha taarikiya shiishshiyo ginan, taarikiya odiyaagee taarikiya giddon walahettennan gaxan eqqidi xeelliyaabadan taariki shiishshees.
Taarikee odettiyoy heezzantto asana.
Ha taarikiya shiishshiyo ginay taarikiya odiyaagawu aaho la’atettaa immiyaagaa gidiyo gishshawu, taarikiya odiyaagee taarikiya poliya eeshshaaway akeekibeennanne xeellibeenna awugaakka medhdhi xaafuwan haniyaabaa ubbaa, eeshshaawatu oonatettaa, hulluuquwaanne qofaa, xeelaanne ammanuwa, amuwaanne koshshaa h.
Eeshshaawatu bolla bagga meraanne kahaa(garssa qofaa) loytti eriyoogan eta guugge giddon simerettiya yohota, eti poliyo allaalleta ubbaa h.
Ubba eriyo taarikiya shiishshiyo ginan taarikiya odiyaagee bari qofaa, ammanuwa, opitaa h.
Hegaappe denddidaagan taarikiya shiishshiyaagee taarikiya giddon qoncciyan gidin geeman de’uwa xeelliyaagan bariyo de’iya birshshettaa, xeelaanne boriya qonccissana dandayees.
Gidikkonne ha taarikiya shiishshiyo ginawu issi issi metotikka de’iyoogee odettees.
Koyro metoy, taarikiya shiishshiyaagee awugaakka eeshshaawatussi de’iya kare garssa bagga hanotaanne oosuwa qoncciyan eriyoonne odiyo gishshaw nabbabiya uray pilggiuonne barkka galouo(erouo) qaadaa immenna.
Hagee qassi nabbabiya uraanne eeshshaawatu gidduwan de’ana bessiya hayyo hiilla oosuwaassi de’iya matatettaa gilqqettees.
Hara metoy qassi taarikiya odiyaagee nabbabiyaageetunne taarikiya gidduwan geli gelidi, hegaadankka issi eeshshaawaappe hankko eeshshaawaakko pinni pinnidi taarikiya odiyoogeenne bari xeelaanne boriya h.
“Maammoo biccuu” geetettiya qantta medhdhi xaafoy ubbaa eriyo taarikiya shiishshiyo ginan shiiqidaagaa gidishin, appe xunqqi ekkidi taarikiya leemisodan ane xeelloos.
Maammoy adarashaa heeran erettida mayo zal’’anchcha.
Ikka suuppabaa gidennan corabaa issi kutti bayzziyo suyqee de’iyo uraa misatiyaagaa, bari maayiyobankka alliqarettiyaaga, caammaa addiniitaa issi galla naa’utoo qucissiyaagaa, A heeray “taskkiayo godaa” Maammoo yaagiyo gujo sunttaa kessidoogaa.
Qammi Markkaatoppe Wube bazzuwa gakkanaashin bari miishshaa toskkayiiddi qamissiyoogee,bankkooniya zemppidi wuskkiya hattaadan duuqissiyoogee, uyiyoogee, haraa shoobbiyoogee, hara I erettido ooso gidishin, I gelenne tukke keetti, I erenna maccaasi baawa.
“Kaamiya ayssi shaammikkii?
Tana gidikko soo gelikke; qammosan aqa aggays yaagees.
Bana ekka ekka giido galla bari suyiqiyan oottiya naa’’u oosanchchata yuushshi yuushshidi ushshees.
Damooza gidikko mati laatamanne ichchashu birappe bollaa qanxxenna.
I qammi qammi yuuyyidi laaliyo miishsha demmoappe attin woqqay bayzettidee?
Aybi shamettidee giidi eta kaallenna gishshawu , etikka bantta baggaara Maamo suyqiyaappe bonqqiyo mishshaa Wube bazzuwa gakkana xaykkonne qammi qammi Markkaato giddon laalliddi qamissoosona.
Maammossi machcha baawa.
Giddo Araadaa piyyaasan issi erettida tukke keettan siiqoy oyqqana gakkanaashin Maammossi ubba wode ufayssa.
He araadaa puulanchchiya mati siiquwa wodoruwan sakaalada oyqqaasu; A bari kiyyoogaatto oottiyoogaa doommaasu.
Hw qodiyaappe doommidi uyiyoogaa aggana xayikkonne daro tukke keettaa gakkiyoogaa aggiigiis.
Gidikkonne aqishin aqishin qanxxennan uyiyoogee haahaa dicciis; Wuskkiya penggeppe doommada duuqqa’ giyoogaappe aadhdhidi “Haayite, ta siiqiyo be’ite” mati gi giidi ushshiyo bari laggetussi xaaramuse wuskkiya dooyissiyoogaa doommiis.
Mattottiyoogee harggiyoogee yiis.
Suyqiya biidi miisshaa ekkiyoogaa agginnee Araadaa gakkanawu tawu haakkiyiite yaagi yaagidi suygiya ubbaara oosanchchatuyyoo aggiigiis.
Oosanchchati kase asaa wochchi wochchidi wuuqqiyoogee attinnee”Nuna laatamanne ichchashu biran shammees; Yaatidi bawu oossinne wuskkiya caccafees” yaagi yaagidi bayzziyoobay guuxxidi gallassi shamiciyaanne shuraabiya laafa miishshan oliyoogaa doommidosona.
“Ikisaama dorssay modhdho giishin hayqqees” giyoogaadan keettaawaynne oosanchchati suyqiyo boggidosona; Maammoy mela suyqiyo idimmidi attiigiis.
Suyqiya qulppiya bayzziis.
Shochchaa zal’’ana giidiDiredawa wodhdhiis.
Sima ubbaa eriyo taarikiya shiishshiyo ginaa.
Hageekka ubba eriyo taarikiya shiishshiyo ginaatto heezazantto xekka asan odettees.
Ha taarikiya shiishshiyo ginan taarikya shiishshiyaagee “Sima ubbaa eriya taarikiya odiyaagaa (shiishshiyaagaa)”geetettees.
Sima ubbaa eriya taarikiya shiishshiyaagee haniyaabata, oosettiytaabatanne hanotata h.
Taarikee shiiqiyoy issi waanna woykko sima eeshshaawaa ginaara gidiyo gishshawu taarikiya odiyaagee eeshshaaway eriyoobaappe hegaa keeni gaxi kiyenna.
Eeshshaawaara aaro eratettaynne matatettay de’iyo eeshshaawatuppe kare baggaara de’iya hara eeshshaawatu qaattaa, koshshaa, qofaa, hulluquwa h.
Hegaappe denddidaagan taarikiya shiishshiyaagawu ashay de’ees.
Hagaa mala tarikiya shiishshiyaagee ayfettiya eeshshaaway/awugankko awugankko sima eeshshaaway/xeellidobaappe, qoppidobaappe.
Siyidobaappenne A hulluuquwa denttettidabaa h.
Hegaappe haray, sima ubbaa eriya taarikiya shiishshiyaagee taarikiya buussa giddon bari qofaa, xeelaa, koshshaa, hulluuquwa… h.
Sima ubbaa eriyo taarikiya shiishshiyo ginan taarikiya shiishshiyoogee eeshshaawaa(eeshshaawata) nabbabiyaageetuura matayiyo baggaara ubbaa eriyo taarikiya shiishshiyo ginaappe keha gidiyoogee odettees.
Ubba eeshshaawatu kumetta asummatettaa, oosuwa, hanotaa, h.
Hegaa bollankka taarikiya shiishshiyaagaa xeelaa,ammanuwa, koshshaa h.
Gidoppe attin, ha taarikiya shiishshiyo ginaawu A lefa miyyee de’ees.
Gunggun geetettiya medhdhi xaafoy odettiyoy sima ubbaa eriyo taarikiya odiyo ginaana.
Kaalliya appe dutti ekkido taarikiya leemisodan xeellos.
Qammi imatta ubbay moysetti simmin, qannamaashiya Balaynneenne dodattiya Ilffi yikenddu barintta semppiyoosan kaho moosona.
Soon de’iyaaba ubba “xaykki hay “ giidobaadan eta naa’aappe attin hari soon bawa Maccasiya coo miyaabaa malatanawu doonaa qaattawusuppe aybinne I uluwawu duge wodhdhibeenna.
Maccaasee doonay qumaa coommiyoode uloy mati yohuwa aatti aatti yeggees.
Keettaawaassikka maccaasiya ulo giddon oyqqa uttidobay geliis.
Naa’’aykka wolqqaama cincca.
Issoy issuwa xeelloosona.
“Ha mishiriya hachchi tana lo’’abe’uukku.
A hagaatto puuridoy yohossa” yaagidosona Qannamaashiyantti qooreppe qommuwan hirggiiddi.
Eti karido hirggay coo hada gididi attibeenna.
Paxi kiyidi tana hagaa be’ikkii giiddi eta sinttan tollu giidi eqqiigiis.
Mishiree daama puzhziina sinttay teerana haniya barbbariya misatidi kumetta asatettay eexxiigiis.
Sawiya maataara gatti munaqqidi huuphiya giddon wottido oyssay seeri seeridi shaashiya garssaara yiidi qinxxalliyaara goggi goggidi mishiriyo mettiis.
Qooriya xaaxidoban ha goggi goggi waayssiyaagaa kaalli kaallidi quccoosona.
Etawu ( mishiriyo) danddayana giinikka immiis.
Garssan meetettii meettida qofaynne barintta dawutteebaa siyidobay garssappe xuussidi kiyanawu matiis.
Qin’’arissiyoogaa doommiis.
Hagaadan doommana giyoobay ereta exxikkonne “Intte simmi yaa haa giidikka intte kuuyyidobaa eranawu de’eeta, tabay ay malee?
“Aybay?
“Waatidi aybay geetii?
Hay tumu gelennan ixxiinee aybay intte giyoogee?
Yaatin woygoo?
Nenni qonccissada haasayakka?
“Hayii!
“Hegee taappekka kiyibeenna, hegaa tana erenna gaadiiyyee?
“Yaaniinkka!
Ha’’I taani giyo ayfebay, taanikka inttenaara biyaariiyye….
“Be’a sima !
Nena qassi awu baanawu amoyidee?
“ Haray awa bii ?
Taani siya be’ennabay de’iyaabaa malatoppo!
Koyro xekka asan taarikiya shiishshiyo ginaa Taarikiya shiishshiyaagee”Koyro xeekka asa taarikiya shiishshiyaagaa” geetettees.
Ha taarikiya shiishshiyo ginan shiiqiya taarikee, taarikiya shiishshiyaagee he taarikiya giddon walahettidaagaa woykko gaxan eqqidi yohuwa xonggollida ayfettiya eeshshaawa(issitoo issitoo sima eeshshaawa) gidana danddayees.
Taarikiyaagee(ተራኪ) “taani” haga oottaas; be’aas; siyaas; qoppaas; zonggolla;akeekaas; hagaa malabay tana gakkiis, tanaan gayttiis; ta bolli polettiis… h.
Hara tuussan, ha taarikiya shiishshiyo ginan taarikiya shiishshiya eeshshaawaa era zawaninne xeelaa yuushuwan hanida de’uwa sinttatu(meratu) xallay odettees.
Hagaappe denddidaagan; taarikiyaagee bari qonccissuwa, bare qofaanne de’uwa birshshettaa h.
Ha taarikiya shiishiyo ginan shiiqiya taarikee eeshshaawaa aawu doonan odettiyaagaa gidiyogee taarikiyawu de’iya tumatettaa naaganawu gita maaduwa immees.
Nabbabiya uray eeshshaawaa eriyoy A haasayaaninne A oosuwa xallaana gidiyo gishshawu eta giddooninne A giddon( nabbabiyaagaanne eeshshaawaa) hayyo bila ooso matatettay de’anaadan oottees.
Gidoppe attin, ha taarikiya shiishshiyo ginawu pacciyaabatikka de’iyoogee odettees.
Koyro pacaq miyyee; ha taarikiya shiishshiyo ginan taarikiya shiishshiyaagaa qofaanne birshshettaa (ትርጓሜ) h.
Hegee qassi awu de’iya ammanaatuwa oyshaa giddo yeggees.
Naa’’antto pacay qassi; taarikee eeshshaawaa eraanne xeelaa yuushuwan direttidaagaa gidiyo gishshawu; nabbabiya uray eeshshaawan gayttidabappe( eeshshaawaa meeziyaappe) kare baggaara de’iya issi issi yohota demmennaadan oottees/ Zerihun 1992/.
Kaallidi “Ye fitstsaamewu mejemmeriya” geetettiya taarikiyaappe ekettidaagee koyro xekka taarikiya shiishshiyo ginaan shiiqidaagaa.
Hirggiya asa mala gidikkeshin keehin hirggas.
Sinttaayo gishshawu hirggiyoogaa doommoosappe gam’’aas.
I bari meeziyaadan geemmoosappe takkiis.
Heezzu agina gidiis.
Wurssettan taani be’ido qammaaghee kase sinttaaya gidibeenna.
Waaciwaaca, kaassanchcha, mite uyite giyoogaa giyoogaa saletti erenna sinttaaya gidibeenna.
Zawi baynna naacanchcha.
Darotoo miiccennan ayba beiy de’ii?
Giyoogaa doses.
Yaaniyo gishshawu, naacees, miicceesmiiccidei miichchees.
Awu naaciyoobay wuryoode he naachchay niyo hassayettii?
Yaagidi tana oychchees.
“Awugee tana’awu?
“Heezzantoy”.
Yaatiyo gishshawu heezzantto naachchaa hassayidi miichchaa doommeettees.
Nuuni eriyo naachcha ubbawu payduwa payduwa immi wottida.
Taayyoo issitoo issitoo payduwan he naachchaa haasayanawu waayissees.
Diraamatto ( ተውኔታዊ ) taarikiya shiisho ginaa.
Ha taarikiya shiisho ginan yohoti, oosotinne hanotati h.
Taarikiyaageekka, diramatto taarikiyaagaa geetettodo erettees/Tesfaye 1975, Zerihun 1992/.
Ha taarikiyo ginan nabbabiyaageetussi shiiqiya yohotinne hanotati diriiphaa bolli oottiya asatu baggaara xeellanawu shiiqida asassi shiiqiyaagaatto hanidi odettees.
Hagaa mala shiishoy qassi xeellin beettiyaabadan haniyo eeshshay de’anaadan oottees.
Eeshshaawati oottiyobati, issoy issuwaara de’iya gaytotettata bessiya hanotatinne hegaa misatiyaabati shiiqiyoy issoy issuwaara haasayettiyoogaaninne qofaa laamettiyoogaana gidiyo gishshawu; nabbabiya uray eeshshaawatussi de’iya oonatettaa, halchchuwa, xeelaa, koshshaanne amuwa h.
Hegaappe denddidaagan, ha taarikiyo ginan taarikiyaagee eeshshaawati oottiyo oosotun gidiin eti geliyo hanotatu giddon kelttiya gelidi ayba qofaa, boriyaanne qonccissuwa immiyo qaadi awu baawa.
Taarikiyaagee qoncciyan beettiyaabaappe haraa aybanne I eriyoobi baawa.
Taarikiyaagaa oosoy sintta baazzen eqqidabaanne beettiyaabaa, bari hulluuquwaabaa(siyettiyaabaa) gujjennan attuwa duuqqiyoogaa gidiyo gishshawu kaameratto shiisho geetettiidi xeesettees.
Ha taarikiya shiishshiyo ginan eeshshaawatu qofaanne oosuwa laamettiyoogee hegan he sohuwan shiiqi aggiyo gishshawu eesotetta eeshshay de’ees.
Haniyaabata, oosettiyaabatanne yohota eti de’iyooridan shiishshiyaagaa gidyo gishshawu cuccumettiyo hanotaanne tumatettaa mayzziyoogaan A puulatettaa xoqqisseees.
Eesuwaar eesuwaara polettiyo hanotaynne ayfen beettiyaabadan haniyo hanotay hegaadankka qassi eeshshaawatu oosuwaanne haasayaa I de’iyoogaadan shiishshiyoogee; eeshshaawatunne nabbabiyaageetu giddon de’ana bessiya bila oosuwa (ኪነ ጥበባዊ) matatettaa naaganawu maaddees.
Gidikkonne taarikiyaagee darotoo eeshshaawatu oosuwaanne haasayaa laamiya giddon kelttiya gelidi issi issi yohota qonccissennanne borenna gishshawu nabbabiyaageeti taarikiya waayettennan akeekanawunne birshshanawu metootanana danddayiyoogee odettees.
Hagee ayyoo erettida paca miyye geetettidi erettees.
Ha taarikiya shiishshiyo ginaabaa loyttidi akeekanawu kaallidi Adefiriis geetettiya medhdhi xaafuwaappe ekettida taarikiya leemisodan xeelloos.
“Qassi neeyyoo awun qammidee…?
Simmi neeni Worddofa golliyo aguwa ixxadasa; wodiyaaranne soo gelakka gidikkii?
waani ane guuttaakkonne asi koyyana giyaakko… Ha hanotaa nena teqqanabaa xossi giigisso.
Laa maalaaliyabaattenne Galla galla gido coo aykko baawa shin qammaagee qassi ayba geetettii… daribeennee?
“Denddayis ta giishsin, denddays ta giishin wodee taani erennan coo biigiis… “Ee, A golliyan neeni mati de’iyoode wodee neeyyo ubbatoookka erettenna… Tanaara neni mati de’idabaa gidiyaakko tammanne naa’’u gaasuwa shiishshanashiin… I bawu wonttifee saaminttay daannata nuuni shoobbiyo gallassa gidiyoogaa eradii…?
“Yaatin nuuni haasayidobay aybee aybee?
Hage godattee Aseggaashinne era na’ee Tsiwooni haasayaa giddon taarikiyaagaagaa qofay, boreenne qonccissoy hegaa keeni gujettennan ayfiyan beettiya hanotaadan shiiqiis.
Ha diraamatto hanotaan shiiqida taarikiyaappe naa’’u eeshshaawata oonatettaa, eti haasayiyo yohuwaabaa eta doonaappe kiyiya haasayan nabbabiyaageeti eroosona.
Cuccumaa.
Koyruwan aygaa mala medhdhi xaafuwawukka, lo’’o gidin iita gidin, issi cuccumay de’ees.
Daraasee barinan gayttidabaa, bariyo siyettiyaabaanne bari qofaa h.
Hagee daraasee nabbabiyaageetussi aattanawu koyyiyo ayfe gidida de’uwaabay woykko aafe kiitay cuccuma geetettidi xeesettees.
Daraase oyqqidi denddiyo baaso gidida de’uwaabay woykko hoollee medhdi xaafuwa giddon merettiyoy cora medhdhi xaafo macarata issippe dabboyiyoogaanne qachchiyoogaana.
Hegaan, cuccumay, taarikiya buussan, eeshshaawatu de’uwaappe , eeshshaawati issoy issuwaara medhdhiyo gaytotettatuppe, he gaytotettatu gaasuwan merettiya karssikarssaatu h.
Hageekka cuccumay, medhdhi xaafuwaassi gul’’a qofa woykko wudiyooba gidanaadan oottees.
Hegaa gishshwu medhdhi xaafuwawu de’iya hara sinttata( meretata) A yuushuwan gardissidi shiishshees.
Ha ufuraabaa yoonaasa do’oy/ 1966, 319/ qonccissiiddi kaalliyaagaatto goosona.
Cuccunmay nuni meezetido haasyan he maxaafawu sintta qofaa giidi xeesiyoogee, daraase nuussi yootidobay, eeshshaawati oottiyoobay, haasayiyoobay, qoppiyoobaynne aymottiyoobay ubbay xaaxiwaaxettidi taarikee odettanawu, he xuufee de’anawu gaaso gidiya gul’’a qofaa woykko he taarikiya yuushuwan kiirimmiyaabaa.
Issi medhdhi xaafuwa cuccumay nuussi odettidaagaa gidennan odettidaagee woygiyoogee?
Yaatin ayba gidneeshsha giidi nu oychchiyoobawu demmiyo zaaro.
Hegaa gidikko cuccumay, medhdhi xaafuwan odetidaagaappe, qonccidaagaappenne polettida yoho ubbaappe woykko I oyqqiyo A gomppaappe gum’’ettidi kiyiya gul’’a qofaa xeelliya hayyo xaafo bilaara oyqqiyo A gomppaappe gum’’ettidi kiyiya gul’’a qofaa xeelliya hayyo xaafo bilaara oyqettiya qofaa/woykko medhdhi xaafo ufura/ giidi kuuyyana danddayettees.
Issi medhdhi xaafuwa cuuccumaa demmana danddayiyo hanni xalaala geetettiya ogee baawa.
Gidoppe attin, cuccumaa kessanawu akeekettana bessiya ayfebati de’iyoogaa eranchchati yootooosona.
Ayfettiya eeshshaawatu kumetta asummatettay, eti oottiyo osotinne hanotati, eeshshaawatussi de’iya gaytotettay, he gaytotettaappe denddidaagan merettiya karssikarssati, karssikarssata gidin oostotinne hanotati kaallettiyo wurssetta ayfeta akeekiyoogee cuccumaa demmanawu go’ees.
Hegaappekka haray eeshshaawatu haasayaykka cuccumaa demmanawu maaddees.
Hegaa bollikka medhdhi xaafuwa taarikiya giddon taarikiya shiishshiyaagan imettiya boreti, qofatinne de’uwaassi imettiya birshshettati cuccumaa kessanawu wudana bessiyaabata.
Leemisuwawu Fiqir iskke meqaabiriyan beettiya ayfe cuccumay he wodiya de’iya biittaa duretu ayso wogay ceeggidaagaa gidiyo gishshawu laamettana bessees giyaagaa.
Ha gol’’a qofay ayfe ayfe eeshshaawatu asummatettan, eti oottiyo oosotun, eeshshaawatu giddon beettiya gaytotettan, eti geliyo hanotatuuninne karssikarssatun, taarikiya shiishshiyaagaa qofatun ubban phoolidi beettiis.
He medhdhi xaafuwa gul’’a qofay kaallidi beettiya Kaasa Gudu haasayaa baggaara xaaxi waaxettidi shiiqiis.
Nu maabaraa eqoy oosettido siraatay, meezee, wogay, higgee de’oy de’iyo maabara wogadan gidennan dioy baynna shuchchaa kellay issoy issuwa bolli doorettidi qommoogee garssaagaa duge naaqqidi garssaagee qommoogaa tookkidi de’anaadan hanidi oosettidaagaa gidiyo gishshawu wodiya daruwaappe denddidaagan garssaagee sohuwa yeddiyoogee attenna gishshawunne hagee haniyoode keettay wuridid laalettenna mala wodhdhi eqqidi kaseegaappe lo’’idi asaa, shuchchaappe keehiya meraa bessiya paxa de’iya maabaray merettana bessees.
Hachchi de’iya nu maabaraa siraatay oosettiyoode he wodiyan de’ida maabarawu hagaadan hanidi oosettiydoogee go’’ana danddayees.
Gidoppe attin hachchi maabaraassi go’’ennaagee erettidabaa.
Gidiigidnkka aygaa maabaraaa wogaykka he maabaraa de’uwawu haggaazana mala asi oottidobaa gidishin, he maabaray barina aylle kessidi haaranaadan oottidoogee eeqa gididi ha eti ootido eeqaa medhdhidi aagaa(Xoossaa) sohuwan wottiyoogadaaninne goynniyoogaadan qoodettees.
Doonaa.
Doonay wurssettanne tumu medhdhi xaafo ufura.
Hegeekka medhdhi xaafo( mal’’iya) doonaa.
Daraasee derettaagaa gidin biribaa gidin issi birshshetti de’iyo asan gayttiyaabaa, qofaanne hylluuquwa xaafiyoynne harawu aattiyoy doonaana.
Daraasee nabbabiyaageetussi aattana koyyiyo qofay oyqqidobay lem’’ilem’’a Jallanne shufuroba gidennaadan puulay de’iyo doonaa halchchidi go’ettana bessees.
I oyqqiyoobay abbee de’iyooba, hulluuquwa bochchiyaabaanne misile medhdhiyaagaa gidiyoy, go’ettiyo doonay pyylattidi shiiqiyo wode xalaalaana.
Hagaa tmayanawu daraasee, bessiya, qonccenne doorettida qaalata, zibanne bila haasayata, maaraa mankkaa naagidi xaafettidanne makkisettida paca qofa qashotanne qofa qashota h.
Adimaasu Yohaannis/1966/ daraasee qaalata dooridi go’ettiyoogee puulay de’iya xuufiyaassi koshshiyagaa gidiyoogaa kaalliyaagaatto gees.
Qaalatu xekkay, eta deexotettay, eta xuuray, eti immiyo geema birshshettay, gidatettay issuwa gidenna.
Asana say dees, Ashuwan paashshay dees giyoogaadan qaalankka qaalay dees gaanawu danddayettees goosona.
Simmi , issi misiliyaagee A guugge giddon merettida issibaa, qofaanne hulluquwa misiliyan xeelliya uraassi shiishshiyo ubbay, daraaseekka de’uwa misiliya medhdhidi nabbabiya uraassi shiishshiyoy puulay de’iyo doonaana.
Hegaappe denddidaagan daraasiyawu hallaccida woykko xoqqu giida doonaa danddayay de’ana bessees.
I aattiyo qofay oyqqidobaa qoncce ufayssiyaanne dogettenna hanotan shiishshiya qaalatanne qonccissota akeekidi doorananne go’ettana koshshees.
Hagaadan oottanaayyoo qassi qaalatussi de’iya zibanne beila haasaytu eeshshaa, meretaanne geluwa geeshshidi akeekiyoogaa koshshees.
Zerihun/1992:15 / Tiroolooppappe (1980) ekkidi ha allaassiya kaalliyaagaadan qonccissees.
Dooni daraasee taarikiya shiishshiyoonne de’uwa misiliya medhdhiyo qalame gidiyo gishshawu aybippenne aattidi nu’ettiyoonne qoppiyo miishsha.
Hara imotatim guuggiya qofay , akeekay, xoqqu giida timirttee, minnidi oottiyo danddayay awu de’ikkonne I bari hooliya poluwa gattanawu bari oosuwa mal’’iya doonan shiishshanawu danddayana xaykko ha odettida imotati banttarkka aybanne go’’okkona yaagees.
Daraasee medhdhi xaafuwa shiishshiyo doonay ammanettiyaagaa/ekettiyaagaa/ gidana bessees.
Haggaazaa bolli pee’ida qaalati, ziba haasayata, bila haasayati, paca qofa qashotunne qofa qahsotu makkisoti h.
Hegaadan haniyaaba gidikko nabbabiyaageetu achchan sohoy de’iyoogeeta( ekettiyaageeta) gidoosona.
Asay hemettiyoogaa diggiyo saatee malattidabaa gidikkonne, Addisaabaa kase baariden saleta laamiya laawada xiskkuwa aafuwa giddon wullabe’ukku.
Qamaa xumay saruwa xayiis.
Gdaretunne heeraa kanatu issippetetta waasuwa gishshaa shugguxiya, matireesiyaanne dimotoforiya xuussay xumaa kantti kanttidi siyettees.
Xiskkuwa xayssidi uluwan kabbaa boqqees.
Asa ubbaa keettan xiskkoy shayan bayyido ubbay kaaraa xeela xallaa shaayiis.
Baarudaa peenoy siiriyan gleido genessiyo gididi ubbaa hayttay qarattidi eqqi uttiis.
Ha leemisuwa giddon unddenna qaalati zokkisso( geema) birshshettaa oyqqidi gelidaageeta.
Eti gelido awudiyankka qofaa qonccissidinne puulaydi shiishshiyo gidatettay de’iyoogeeta gidishin bessiya (haniya) qaalata gidoosona.
Meeziya.
Kaallidi ha meeziya tohossan shiiqida oyshata zaarite.
“Taarikee medhdhi xafuwaassi mela meqettappe attin asho woykko de’o gidenna geetettidoogee ybissa misatii?
Eeshshaawati leemiso meran shiiqana (merettana) danddayoosona giishin woygiyoogee?
Ubbaa eriyo tarikiya shiishshiyo ginawu de’iya qoncce gidida pacabata qonccissite?
SHEMPPUWA – QANTTA MEDHDHI XAAFUWa.
Geluwa: Koyro shemppuwan yeda medhdhi xaafuwa aybatettaa, tumu de’uwaara de’iya dabbotettaa, xaafanchchatanne eti qofaa demmiya hanotaanne eta ufurata xeelliyaagan aassidi be’ida.
Ha naa’antto shemppuwan qassi, qantta medhdhi xaafuwa aybatettaa, eeshshatanne xaafo hiillata be’ana.
Ha shemppuwa wurssettan tamaareti.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwa sunttaanne aybaatettaa.
Qantta medhdhi xaafy erettiyo dumma dumma sunttati oonee oonee?
Qantta medhdhi xaafo giyoogee woygiyoogee?
Qantta medhdhi xaafoy dumma sunttatun xeesettoppe attin ubbaykka “Ze shortti isttoorii” yaagiya Ingglizetto xeessaa gishshataa eqqoosona.
Gidoppe attin aahuwan meezetido sunttay qantta medhdhi xaafuwa yaagiyaagaa.
Ha oyshaassi issi barina danddayidanne ubba eranchchati maayettiyo zaaruwa immana danddayettenna.
Baawa giyaakko eranchchati kaalliyo hayyo xaafo bilaa oppitaanne eti de’iyo layttaa(wodiya) hanotaadan imettiya birshshettaykka dummatees.
Gidikkonne baaso qofan daro dummatettay de’ennan aggana danddayees.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwa aybatettaa xeelliyaagan issooti issooti awu de’iya qaalaa coratettan qonccissoosona.
Leemissooti awu de’iya qaalaa coratettan qonccissoosona.
Leemisuwawu, Holimaan/1980/ “Qantta medhdhi xaafoy biddan shiiqiya medhdhi xaafo; yesuwan 500 qaalatun xaafettiya qantta mehdi xaafuwaappe doommidi 12000 qaalata adussa qantta medhdhi xaafuwa gakkees” yaagees.
Danxxe Asfaykka qantta medhdhi xaafuwa honggochhca woga gi sunttidi , ikka qassi barina danddayidanne kumetta gididanne issi erettida ( zawatidia) cuccumaa/kiitaa/ Zawatida/500ppe­­ 10000/ gakkiya qaalatun gidiya hanotan birshshidi nabbabiyaageetussi shiishshiyoogaa qonccissees.
Hara baggaara qassi qaalaa coratettay qantta medhdhi xaafuwa aybatettaa kunttidi qonccissana danddayenna yaagiyaageeti de’oosona.
Olggaa yaazebeek”Ze istteet of shortti isttooriis in Itiyoophphiya”/1981/ yaagiya masttireetiya kunttiyo xuufiyan issi issi erettida xaafetu sunttaa shiishshada, eta oosoy 10000 ppe bollatiya qaalatun xaafidoogaa qonccissada qaalaa coratettaa awu buzao mahadan ekkiyoogee daruwa efeennaagaa qonccissawusu.
Isttooninne A laggeti (1970) qantta medhdhi xaafoy aybee?
yaagiya oyshawu, adussa medhdhi xaafuwa shaahooyye woykko a buzo gompppaynne hiillay de’iyoobee?
Yaagiya oyshaa denttidoogaappe guyyiyan eti barintta huuphen zaariiddi yaagoosona.
Ha oyshay Frankki Okeneer , Siin O Faa’ooliinanne Echi.
Ii Beetisa misatiya qantta medhdhi xaafuwa xaafeta haasayissidda allaalle gidiyoogaa yootidi; ha xaafeti ha macaraa qantta giyooga xallan aadhdhennaagaanne awukka A huuphen A danddayida qottaynne gomppay de’iogaa; A baggaara beettiya issi achcha wurssetta ayfee hara hayyo xaafo bila macaratun beettana danddayennaagaa qonccissoosona yaagidddi aahuwan shiishshoosona.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwa xaafettaaninne bori nashuwan koyrottiyaagaa geetettiidi malattiya Eedigaar Alen Po giyoogaadan, qantta medhdhi xaafoy issitoo utettan nabbabettana danddayiya mino issippetettay de’iyoonne A hoolleekka issi achcha gidida yedan shiiqiya hayyo xaafo bila qommo yaagees.
Mino issippetettaynne issi achcha wurssetta ayfee qantta medhdhi xaafuwawu baaso eeshshata.
Mino issippetettay medhdhi xaafuwa giddon beettiya ayba yohotikka doonaa, eeshshaawaa, woqaanne polettiyaabatu issippe ohettaa xeelliyaagaa gidishin ; issi achcha wurssetta ayfee qassi ha odettidabati issoy issuwaara ohettidi gakkiyo hoolliya.
Ha yohota kaalliya kifilyan aahuwan denttiyo gishshawu ha’’i birshshiyoogaa koshshenna.
Hagaappe qommoora be’ido birshshettatussi issi meray de’oppoppe attin barintta baaso qofan daor dummatettay de’enna gaanawu danddayissees.
Eta dummatettay , baggay yesuwa bollan wudiyoode baggay qassi A eeshshaa bolli wudees.
OOna gidinkka birshshettati qantta medhdhi xafuwa aybatettaabaa xeelliya bessiya qofaa cuccunttidosona.
Qantta medhdhi xaafoy erettiyo eeshshatuppe ayfettiyaageeti siituwa, mino issippetettaa, issi achcha wurssetta ayfiyanne eesotettaa.
Qantta medhdhi xaafoy siitiyaagaa giyoode issi issi medhdhi xaafuwa allaallee A koshshatettay qofettidi shiiqiyoogaa bessees.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwan shododattidi / yorddodattidi/ shiiqiyaabi aybikka baawa.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwa siitoy Aufurettatuuninne A xaafo hiillatu go’ettan qonccana danddayees.
A siitoy taarikiya, taarikiya shooqaa, eeshshaawa meruwa, woqaa, taarikiya ginaa, doonaa, karssikarssaanne hartu hiillatu ginaara birshshettidi xeelettana danddayees.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwa taarikee issi achcha.
Adussa medhdhi xaafuwaatto miyyiyanna ohettidinne sheephetido (cora ginay de’iyo) taariketaoyqqana dandayenna .
Sheephetida (cora ginay de’iyo) taariketa oyqqiyo payduwan taarike aakki aakkidi biyo gishshawu oosoy micettidi qottaa xayees.
Qantta medhdhi xaafoy issi achcha gidiyuoogaappe denddidaagan yeletaappe hayquwa, eretaappe ehuwa geluwa, doomettaappe poluwa gakkanawu de’iya adussa taariketa shiishshana danddayenna.
Leemisuwawu, Fiqir iskke meqaabiree adussa medhdhi xaafo gidishin Dabddaabee qantta medhdhi xaafo.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwa taarikee issi achcha xalla gidennan issi guutta/qantta/ de’uwa sinttaaninne gayttiyaabaa bollan wudees.
He gayttiyaabaakka koyroppe wurssetta gakkanawu qonccissennan aggenna giyoobi baawa.
Medhdhi xafuwa hoolliya ginaara go’’ees giidi qoppiyo hanotaappe doommidi taarikiya wurssi cinggidi qonccissennan de’iiddi.
Bessees qoppiyo taarikiya hanotaa bolli medhdhi xaafuwa essiigees.
Medhdhi xaafuwa taarikiyakka dumma dumma ginaara aassidi gidennan issi gina xalaalaara giigissees.
Siitoy qoncciyo hara ogee taarikiya shooqaa.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwa taarikee issi achcha gidiyo gishshawu A taarikiya shooqaykka issi achcha gidees.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwan sheephetida/lokkomettida/ taarike shooqa giyoobi baawa.
Taarikiya shooqay cora achchay deiyoogaa gidikko cora achchay de’iyo taarikee de’ees giyoogaa.
Hegaa gidikko taarikee aakkiyo gishshawu A qottaappe gaxi kiyees.
Qantta medhdhi xaafo gidiyoogee attees.
Eeshshaawa meruwa ginaarakka siituwa qonccissana danddayettees.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwa eeshshaawati payduwan guutta.
Issuwa woykko naa’’anne heezzu eeshshaawata oyqqees.
Issi issi qofaa qonccissiya maxaafati issi eeshshaawa xalaalay de’iyoogaa qonccissoosona.
Gidoppe attin issuwaa woykko naa’’a heezzakka gidana danddayoosona.
Eeshshaati daridosona giyoogee eta giddon de’iya gaytotettay aakkiyo gishshawu taarikkee aakkees.
Etettana bessiya ayfebay eeshshaawatu yesuwa gidennan he naa’’u woykko heezzu eeshshaawatu de’o taarike keehippe aakkidi shiiqikko taarikee keehippe aakkiyoogee attenna.
Yaatiyo gishshawu eeshshaawatu issi achcha de’uwa bolla zallan wudana koshshees.
Eeshshaawata aassikko dumma dumma ginaara xeelliyoogaa aggidi issi woykko amarida gina xallaa xeellana bessees.
Hegaa bollankka koshshiyaaba gidikko eeshshawatu qonccissuwaakka siitettees.
Medhixaafo taarikiyaa eeshshaawaa geesay, ye lagatettay, siiriyaa qazazatettay, huuphiya /uyshatettay medhdhi xaafuwaassi immiyo maadoy xaykko qonccana koshshenna.
Taarikee siiquwaabaa gidikko eeshshaawaa guulay taarikiyaassi immiyo go’’ide’okko hegaa qonccissiyoogee medhdhi xaafuwaa aaro loyttees.
Kare bagga asatettaa qonccissiyoogaappe attidi garssa bagga asatettaa qonccsiyogee medhdhi xaafuwaassi aanuwaa go’’iyaaba gidikko kasetana bnessiyay garssa bagga asatettaa gidees.
Siitoy qoncciyo ogiyaayaappe issoy wogaa.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa wogay xuntta.
Aaho sohuwaassi qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa sohuwaa de’anawu danddayenna.
Wogay xuummiyoogaa xalla gidennan wogaa bessenna qonccissuwaa qonccissiyoogaappe naagettana bessees.
Ay taarikeekka wodiyaanne sohuwaa zawaa giddon polettiyoogaa eriyaaba gidikkonne medhdhi xaafuwaa giddon wogaa coo sunttawu go’’ettiyoogee koshshiyaabaa giddenna ammanoy dees.
Hegaa giyoogee biittaa utettaa,pooluwaabaa h.
Gidoppe attin wogaa geeshsha( geeshshidi) qonccissiyoogee medhdhi xaafuwa qottawunne gomppawu maaddiyaaba gidikko geeshshidi qonccissiyoogee koshshiyaaba.
Taarikiyaa shiishshiyo ginaa xeelliyaagankka qantta medhdhi xaafuwa siitay qonccees.
Taarikiyaa issi ginaara xeellana bessishin dumma dumma ginaara shiishshana giikko taarikee aakkiyoogee attenna .
Hagaa giyoogee issi taarike issi sohuwan dumma dumma asan odettishin siyoogaa mala giyoogaa.
Issoy issuwaa bollan gujettiyoode taarikee aduqqiyoogee attenna.
Ha daatay merettannamalanne qantta medhdhi xaafoy bari qottaa xayennamala issi maacettida taarikiyaa shishshiyo ginaara qonbccees giyoogaa.
Karssi karssay ha qommoora qonccidaagaa misatees.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa karssi karssay qantta medhdhi koyrobay karssikarssay aaho gidana bessena haraa ba miyyiyaa sheepheyidaagaanne dumma dumma meray de’iyoogaa gidanawu bessenna karssi karssa gaasuwaappe doommidi purettaa gakkanawu de’iyaa buussay paatettidaagaa gidennan hiilla hanuwaaninne eessuwan shiiqana bessees.
Hegaa gishshawu paatettidabaa garssan gelennan de’ishin karssikarssay merettishin be’ idoogee ayfe liphanaashin yaa googi goobidi unbbubulettaakk gakkiyooga habbabettees.
Doonaa ginaarakka siitoy beettees.
Issi qaalaakka haray atto awu de’iyaa koshshatettaa be’idi go’’ettana koshshees.
Koshshennabidday.
Koshshenna qonccissoy, koshshenna haasaya laamerettay qantta medhdhi xaafuwan sohoy baa.
Issi issi qaalaa I bessiyoo gaa aggiyoogaa akeekidi go’’ettana bessees.
Hara hiillatunkka xaafiyaagaa ha hiillaa kaallana bessees.
MINO ISSIPPETETTAa.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa eeshshata geetettiyaageetuppe xoqqay giidi beettiya haray issippetettaa.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwaayoo mino issippetettay de’ees.
Issippetettay medhdhi xaafuwaa qottaanne gomppaa woykko medhdhi xaafuwaa ufuratanne xaafuwaa hiillatu giddon de’iyaa waatta woykko issuwaawu issuwaara qashuwaa xeelliyaagaa.
Qantta medhdhixaafuwaa giddon issi issi yohoy issoy issuwaara gahettiyoogaa xalaala gidennan issoy haraayyo go’’iyoobay de’ana bessees.
Woqay eeshshaawaa medhdhiyoogaaw taarikiyaawu, doonawu, medhdhixaafuwaa buussawu barina danddayidaba beeraa bessana koshshees.
Geshshaawaa meroy qassi taarikiyaawu doonawu karssikarssawu woykko qassi karssikarssay doonawu, tarikiyaawu, taarikiyaa shooqawu, cuccumawu, barina danddaydaba beeraabessanaadan qofettidi giigana bessees.
Leemisuwawu wogay geeyyidi qonccana xayikkokka eeshshaawati oottiyo gaytotettaadaaninne eta issipettaa awudiyan wogaa hanotaa shaakkidi erana danddayettees.
Karssi – karssay baasobaa gidikko eeshshaawata aaro karssikarssaa giddo gelissiyo gishshawu taarikiyaa shikkaalanawunne medhdhixaafoy wozanaa gaggiyaagaa gidanaadan maaddiis giyoogaa.
Hara baggara karssi karssay eeshshaawatu bollan qofaanne eeshshaa laamyaa ehiyaabaa gidikko eeshshaawatu meruwaaayyo maaddiis giyoogakarssi karssay gaasuwaappe biidi purettaa gakkanawu biyoode taarikiya shooqaara sitta gaytotettay de’ees.
Doonaa baggaarakka eeshshaawatu oonatettay erettiyoogee eti haasayiyo haasayaana eti qoppiyo qofaa gidikokka qoncciyoy doonaana.
Qantta medhdhi xaafoy ciimmatida issippetettay de’ees yaagiyoogeekka hagaa malatiyaa medhdhi xaafuwaa ufuratunne hiillatu ohettaanne issoy issuwaassi immiyo maaduwaa bessiyoogaana.
ISSI ACHCHA WURSSETTA AYFIYAa.
Qommo baggaara qonccissido qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa eeshshatuppe haray issi achcha wurssetta ayfiyaa.
Issi achcha wurssetta ayfee qantta medhdhi xaafuwaayyo ayfettiyaa eeshsha.
Ha wurssetta ayfee xaafanchchay sintta qofaa oottidi denddido hoolleenne ikka gakkidi cuccumiyo wurssetta ayfe.
Issi issi medhdhi xaafuwaa ufuraynne medhdhi xaafuwaa shiishshiyo ogee issoy issuwaara waaxettidi issi hoolliyaa bolli gakkana koshshees.
Issi achcha wurssetta ayfee medhdhi xaafuwaa gidduwan polettiyaa yohotu ubbaa gaytotetaassi kuyshsha eeshshaawatu eruwaappe doommidi taarikiya kuuyettaa gakkanaashin de’iyaa taarikiyaa hanotaynne medhdhi xaafuwaa ufuratinne medhdhi xaafuwaa shiishshiyo ogetu issipetettay ubbayyode’iyaa eesoy ha issi achcha wrussetta ayfiya bessanaassa.
Issi achcha wurssetta ayfee awude liyaa cuccuma xalla gidenna.
Ha cuccumaa gidinkka hara hiillati issippe waaxettidi medhdhyoogaa.
Hegaa gishshawu cuccuma xalla gidennan cuccumay kaaletttiyo hulluuqoy woykko hanotaa laamee hagaa giddon de’iyaabaa.
Mantta Asaffaa Zerihuuni; 1992M.
Eesotettaa.
Eesotettay qantta medhdhi xaafuwa eeshshatuppe issuwa.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwan loddaara biya taarikiyawu sohoy baawa.
Eeshshaawatu eruwaappe biidi taarikiya poluwa gakkanaashin polettiyaabati ubbay eesotettan qaaxxoosona.
Eeshshaawata, wogaa, karssikarssa eroogaappe guyyiyan sohuwaara karssikarssay shikkaalettishiininne metoy wolqqaamidi umbbabulettaa bolli gakkishiininne sohuwaara qassi ammanttiya hanotan metoy birshshettishiininne taarikke wurssettawu gakkishiin nabbabettees.
Taarikiya eeso buussaa xubbiyaabatussi go’’I baawa.
Leemisuwaassi heeraa qonccissoy medhdhi xaafuwa taarikiyaassi koshshennabaa gidikko eeshshaawatunne taarikiya qaattaa teqqiyo gishshawu A go’ettiyoogee koshshiyaaba gidenna.
Bessenna eeshshaawatu, woqaanne hanettiyaaba qonccissoy qantta medhdhi xaafuwa giddon sohoy baawa geetettiyoy hagaa gaasuwaana.
Issi issi bori nashshiya asati qantta medhdhi xaafuwa wolqqanttaa wolqqammettaara miseyiyoy hagaa gaasuwaana.
Wolqqanttay ayfe liphuwan beettidi xayiyoogaadan qantta medhdhi xaafoykka eesotiyaabatu bolli wudiyo eeshshay de’ees.
Lo’’o medhdhi xaafo gidikko nabbabettidikka abay sohuwaara coo xayi be’iaaba gidenna.
Asfaa Zerhuni/1992/ eesotettaa xeelliyaagan” odettiya taarikee keehiin mirqqettennan eesuwan eesuwan odettana bessees.
Taarikiya shooqaynne dumma dumma kidileti bantta buussaa naagidi, paatettiyaabata darissennan, aakkida woqaa qonccissuwaanne eeshshaawatu guyye haydaa aggi be’idi eesotidi hemettana bessees/sinttaa 230/ yaafiiddi qonccissees.
Ee, eesotettaa giyoogee hagaa.
Taarikee mirqqettiogaa darissikko A ogee aduqqees; taarikee micettees.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwa taarikee aani gayttidabaappe bawu injjetiyaaba misatidid beettikko lawuhu giidi gelinnee bari dooommidoogaakka polennan medhdhi xaafuwa hoolliyaadaaninne sintta qofaadan gidduwan kaqqidosaara wurssiyoy hegaa gaasuwaana.
Hagaa meran shiiqida medhdhi xaafuwa taarikiyawu kumettatettay de’ana bessees.
Hageetuppe kareera qantta medhdhi xaafoy erettiyo hara eeshshatikka de’oosona.
Issi issi bori nashshiya eranchchati paranassaawe xaafanchchaa Giidee Mooppooso oosotun beettees giidi odiyoogaatto, qantta medhdhi xaafoy nabbabiyaageetu/ezggiyaageetu/ hulluuquwaanne xeelaa kuuccidi oyqqana bessees.
Issi gita misilya woykko massi moliyo oosoy xeelliyaageetu kumetta xeelaa /dereqaa/shiishshi oyqqiyoogaadan qantta medhdhi xaafoykka nabbabiyaageetu kumetta xeelaa(derqaa) oyqqiyo eeshshay de’ees.
Hageekka issi baggaara wozanaa gaggiyoogaappe A yesuwaappenne eesotettaappe pulttiyaaba.
Hara baggaaara qassi qantta medhdhi xaafuwa giddon denddiya issi issibay medhdhi xaafuwaayyo immiyo go’’I xaykko; nabbabiaageetu/ezggiyaageetu/ kumetta xeelay/qofay/ medhdhi xaafuwa bollan shemppana xaykkonne guuggeekka aggidi harasaa biyaaba/qoppiyaaba/gidikko issibaa akeekennan aadhdhiis giyooga.
Akeekana xaykko qassi medhdhi xaafuwa muleerakka akeekibeenna giyoogaa.
Hara qantta medhdhi xaafuwa eeshshay danttotettaa.
Qantta medhdhi xaafoy biddan shiiqiyaaba gidikkonne doonaa go’ettaa baggaara siitettaynne siqqinttatettay beettees.
Yeda medhdhi xaafoy danttuwaadan gidana xaykkonne doonaa go’ettaappe denddidaagan eehoy beettiyo gishshawu danttuwaagaa kessa gidana xaykkonne danttotettaa eeshshay woykko danttotettaa yeda cuufiya eeshshay beettees.
Oosuwan mucurettida qaalata, paca qofa qashta, qofa qahsota go’ettiyogee; qanttanne adussa qofa qashota laammi laammidi xaafiyoogee ha danttotettaa eeshshaa medhdhees.
Ta maraccee eexxiix, xuugettiis.
Tana gakkidaagee inttenan gakkoppo.
Wonttiin qammiin ooshsha, yoho, wara.
Awu baadii?
Auw geladii?
Oonaara takkadii?
Wara.
Hegaa ne azinawu hanennaara wontto tawukka hinno gidikkii?
Wara; wara, hare kessidi ha’’ikka wara.
Woykko tawu so giddon injjetibeenna.

YEDA MEDHDHI XAAFUWANNE QANTA MEDHDHI XAAFUWA SHIISHSHIYO OGETa.
Ha sohuwan yeda medhdhi xaafuwaanne qantta medhdhi xaafuwa shiishshiyo ogeti shiiqoosona.
Hegeetikka yootetuwa, qonccissuwa, zaari haassyuwaa, hiraagiyoogaanne wozana gaggiyoogaa geetettiyaageeta.
Ane hageeta issuwa issuwa leemisuwaara gattidi kaallidi be’oos.
Medhdhi xaafuwa shiishshiyo ogetuppe issoynne ayfettiyaagee yootetuwa.
Yootetoy, naa’’u woykko hegaappe aadhdhiya eeshshaawatu giddon polettiya qofa laamiya .
Eeshshaawati poliyoobatubaa, eti geliyo hanotatubaa, gakkida metotubaa, eta sintta qofaabaa, eta amuwaabaanne koshshaabaa, eta karenne garssa bagga asummatettaabaa h.
Tumu alamiya asati issoy issuwaara haasayiyoogaappe dummatenna hanotan poloosona.
Eeshshaawatu eta doonan shiiqiya yootetoy, nabbabiyaageeti eeshshaawatu asummatettaabaa, qofaabaa, oosuwa, eta giddon de’iya lo’’onne iita gaytotettaabaa, eta sintta qofaabaanne eta equwaabaa hhm loyttidi eranaadan oottiya lo’’o taarikiya shiishshiyo oge.
Gidikkonne xaafanchchay yootetuwa coo sunttawu gelissana bessenna.
Yootetoy go’’aa bolli pee’ana bessiyoy taarikiyaassinne taarikiya shooqawu, hegaadankka eeshshaawatu qaattawunne gayotettawu koshshiyaagaa gididi beettiyo wode xalaalaana .
Hegaa gidana xaykko taarikiya buussawu xube gidiyoogee attenna.
Bessiya hanotan makkisettida yotetoy haasyettiyoonne ayfiyan be’iyoobaa misatiyo hanotay phoolidi beettiyaagaa gidiyo gishshawu nabbabiyaageeta pashkki oottiyaagaappekka bollaara, haniiddi de’iyaabaa qoncciyan bessanawu maaddees; taarikeekka ufayssiyonne yeemoyiyo eeshshay de’anaadan oottees.
Haygaappekka haray, taarikiya tumatettaa mayzzees.
Gidikkonne tuma malatana mala eeshshaawatu kumetta asummatettaara, bariyaara, eratettaara, timirtte xekkaara, oosuwaara, mattumaara, de’iyo heeraaranne de’uwa hanotaara misatidiinne maayettidi shiiqana bessees.

Qonccissuwa.
Ha medhdhi xaafuwa shiishsiyo hiillay, eeshshaawatu kare bagganne garssa bagga meraa, eti poliyobatubaa, eti gliyo hanotatubaa, eti de’iyo kumetta hanotaabaa, etagarssa gaytotettaabaa, etaara gayttiya metotubaanne karssikarssatubaa, eti yaanne haanne qaaxerettiyo wogatubaa h.
Qonccissuwan puulattidi shiiqiya aybabaykka nabbabiyaageetu bessibollatukko gakkiyo abbee xoqqa.
Hegaa giyoogeekka, qonccissuwan boolimidi shiiqidabaa nabbabiyaageeti matan beiidobadan, siyidobadan singgidobadan, laaccixeelidobadaninne bochchi xeellidobadan qoodoosona.
Hagaa mala hanotan misile medhdhiyaagaa gaanawu danddayettees.
Hagaappekka haray medhdhi xaafuwa taarikee mal’’iyaagaanne ufayssiyaagaa gidanaadan gita beeraa bessees.
Taarikee nabbabiyaageetu hulluuquwa bochchi bochchidinne ayyaanaa woppatettaa immiiddi , qoncce gidida hanotan qofay sinttawu baanaadan oottees.
Hegaa bollankka bessiyaadan shiiqida qonccissoy,, nabbabiyaageeti, eeshshaawatu oonatettaabaa, eta metuwaabaa, eti merettido woqaabaa, eta xeelaabaanne koshshaabaa h.
Gidoppe attin medhdhi xaafuwa giddon oshiiqiya ay mala qonccissoykka qonccissaas gaana xalaalawu gidana bessenna.
Qonccissoy bari hiillatettan awu de’iya go’’ay xoqqu giidi beettiyoy; taarikiya buussaara, eeshshaawati beettido heeraara… h.
Nabbabiyaageetu achchankka gita sohoy imettiyoogaa gidees.

Kaa;;oya “Nuuzaazee” qantta medhdhi xaafuwan kasetiya sinttatun shiiqidaagaa leemisodan xeelloos.
Ha giddon tana keehippe qofissidabay bambbaraasiya yohuwa.
Bambbaraasiya befirddu ta bollaankka shaway bollan gakkidi un’’uwa ubbawu bayratiya gaaso gidida asa.
Intte ammaniin ammanaa na xayiin daro iitabaa tana qofissidosona.
Istta naa’a giin ta karbbayiniya barssada ogiya doommoogaappe guyyiyan ta naatu cenggurssay eta waasoy yeehoy, qassi Shaway woosaynne watiwatoy, ta cenggurssaykka taayyoo guyye simmidi siyetti siyettidid… dumma dumma meray de’iyo wulaatettidanne phooliya maari mankki baynna yohoti , shoraa maaraa xayida misileti ta kahan (qofan) beetti beettidi… istta naa’’a giin ta qofaa aggada simmaas.
Bambbaraasiya Befirddu tumakka hara asa bolli oosettenna pirddaa ta bollan oottidosona.
Heggee kiittibeenna barintta pirddaa ta bolli bpirddidosona.
Hagaappe guyyiyan ta bolli ay oottanee.
Be’idetii ta quliyo ta keexxiyoode sohuwa ta ekkidoy etappe.
Joyro shufuwa wottada, yaappe haappe gaada dagaido heezzu xeetu biraa sohuwa ekkanaw qanxxaas.
Nu maayettidoy layttan laatamu biraa, etawu qanxxanaassa.
Hachchi gakkanaashinkka etawu qanxxaydda gam’’aas.
Gidoshin tawu meto gididabay hagaa gidenna.
Issi sha’u bira giya kaaletuwa(wogaa) ta qoppidi heezzu xeetu bira oottido gishshawu, ichchashu layttappe guyyiyan sohuwawu issi sha’u bira qanxxada tabaa oottana gaada etawu paramaas.
Tumaappe gikko issi ciishaynne ba koyyido wodiyan qanxxana danddayees.
Eti mati dosada maayettaas gaada paramanaadan oottidosona.
Wogay hegaatto gidennaagaa zaara zaarada odiinkka”Ta biittan (sohuwan) ta koyyidobaa oottana danddayays koyyana xaykko aggaaga”.
Ubba haray inttena maalaalo”Ichchashe usuppunan qanxxana xaykko keetta yeddanawu…” gaada paramaas.

Yootetay, eeshshaawatu beettiyaanne beettenna woykko cuccumettiyaanne cuccumettenna de’uwa, oosuwa gidiin qofaa, hegaadankka sintta qofaanne koshshaa… h.
Aygaa mala yootetuwawukka hjaasayan qonccissiyoonne oosuwan bessiyo sinttati de’iyoogaa naqaashan zemppissada qonccissana danddayays.
Qonccissuwan boojidi(puulattidi) shiiqida taarikee hulluuquwa bochchiyoonne misiliya medhdhiyo wolqqay xoqqa.
Hegeekka aybissakkonne brshshada yootana.
Aygaa mela qonccissoykka taarikiyaaranne eeshshaawatuura keehippe uttida sintta qofay de’iyoogaappe attain doonaa puulayana giyoogaa xalaalawu oosettiyaagaa gidennaagaa naqaashaa shiishshad qonccissana danddayays.
Hiraagay,eeshshaawatu sinttanaa de’uwa tumatettaa malaatanawu go’’iya medhdhi xaafo hiilla gidiyoogaa qonccissana.
Eeshshaawatu kase de’uwaanne oosuwa ehiyoogan, ha’’I taarikiyaara issippe dabboyidi taarikiya shiishshiyo hiillay aadhdhidabaa haasayissiyoogaa gidiyoogaa naqaashan qonccissana danddayays.
Hiraagan bessiyo sinttanaa allaalliyaappe aattidi aadhdhida hassayssiyo hiillan odettiya aadhdhida taarikiya appe aaro hanotan aaho paatettaa immana danddayiyoogaa qonccissana.
Nabbabiyaageetu bollan un’’ettiyaanne ufayssiya hulluuquwa/heennaa/ medhdhiya qofatu, hanotatunne polttiyaabatu geemmi ekkiyo hanotaay beettiyo taarikiya shiishshiyo hiillay, wozanaa gagettay de’iyoogaa gidiyoogaa leemisuwa immada qonccissana.

Ay medhdhi xaafuwa de’oy baasettiyoy ufuratun makkisettidinne qashettidi beettiyoogaa.
