HIILLAA YIGGIYOOGAa.
Issi uray lallabiyowode ezggiyoogaadanikka, he uraa lallabay waanida biddakkonne pirddettees.
Doonaa lallaba hiillaa heezzu ogetun go’ettidi yiggettees.
Meezetibenna /zokkisso/yiggetta hiillaa.
Naa’appekka shiishshidi gattido walaha hillaa.
Koyro hiillay biddiya /lallabiya/ urassi xuufiyan gidin doonaan ne bidday woykko lallabay lo’o woykko iita giidi erissenan biddaa siyi simmidi bari wozana garssaninne bari uluquwaan oyqqidi iita gidin lo’o gidin bawu eridi aggibayiyoogaa.
Naa’anttoy qassi, daro wode asay meezetidobanne eridi aqido baa.
Heezanttoy qassi haqommoora qonccissido naa’u hiillaata walakkidi go’ettanawu danddayees.
Oonanne gidin doonaa lallaba hillaa yiggiyo hanotay ne lallaba murutissanawu maaddiya bayiranne ayfe oge.
Xaaxi waaxin doonaa lallaba yiggiyo hiillaa go’ettiyoo gaawu lo’o baaso gidida oyddu gaasoti de’oosona.
Oyshaa oyshadan zaara.
Doonaa lallabaa hiillaa aappun ogiyan go,ettiyoo?
Issi asi denddinnee coo oduwaa biddiyoogaa doommiyaakko he asa waanees giidi qoppeetii?
Hara asati biddiyoogaa yiggiyogan neen ne lallaba hiillaa murutissanawu danddayaasa.

Ee tumaa!
Lallabiya izaawi meezetiyo wode barkka de’iyooga dan lefa hanotan coo shootu goppu gaana besseenna.
Meezeetiyo wode barkka de’ikko wogga Heregaa barisinttan kaqqidi /essidi/ gugaa sinttan maayana bonchcho maayuwaa nne caammaa kumettaa maayidi nne woottidi, Heregaan bana barkka xeelliiddi suure meezetanawu koshshees.
Wurssettan biddaassi qaxarido tumu gallassay gakkanappe kasettidi bari meezetidoogaa issinaa’u heezzutonne koshshikko hegaappekka aaruwaa banttaso asaa sinttaninne bari miiretu sinttaani gujjidi meezetanawu koshshees.
Hage lo’o giidoba qassi wurssettay gakkanaassi yaaminttidi oottanawu bessees.
Wurssettani aybanne gaadee galcci galccennan, menttershshay kokkoyennan, kushee qayixi qayi xennan ayite quphi quphennan, wozanay taaheennaninne kahaay shabbirettennan gugaa sinttan zirxxi giidi eqqidi, burxxu giidi xeellidi, woppu giidi qoppidi, wozanappe giigissido muruta biddaa deddotennan nne lufatennan tololaayidi lalabidi, bari aattanawu halchchido bayira kiitaa gugaa ccuccunttidi, balay bayinna ba oosuwaani gugaani nashettiiddi, ufayis sa tamay waliilay a giddon exxishin, wooraabaaweraa qqettidi, worqqaa /telxxaa/ malatiya maayuwaa siphphi nttan shuuyettidi maayidoogaara lallabassi gugaa sinttani eqqido xeqqa zumbbullappe lallabanassi giicidi immido wodiyaa wurssi go’ettidi wodhdhidi uttiaggeel.

Issiba sinttaara eqqida neeni gugaassi yaa zaarada yootiyo wode nne gugaa wozzanaa sheemppissiyo wode, hegaa danikka ne ayigiya shoddennan sintta xeerappe guuyye gaxaa gakkanaashininne haddirssa baggappe biidi ushachcha baggi gakkanaashin de’iya gugaa ubbaa yarada xeellay idda biddiyowode gugaay giiphphi giidi ne biddaa ezggees.

Oyishan Amppidi Tobbiyoogaa.
Lallaban odettida halchchoy aybee?

Gugaa kahaa lammiyadan biddide?

Amppidi Tobbiyoogaa getettees.
Oyishan Amppidi Tobbiyoogawu wudettiya go’ay ayibee giikko: koyiruwaan, ha oyichchiya gugaassi woyikko izaawussi Likkenne suure zaaruwaa immanawu go’ees.
Naa’anttuwaan, Lallabiya izaawu bari balanne pacaa shaakkidi akeekanawu maaddees.
Heezzanttuwaan, Naa’anttonawu woyikko kaalliya wodiyawu adhdhida muruta lallaba giigissanawunne loyittidi murutisssidi biddanawu maaddees.
Oyddanttuwaan, Gugaara maayettanawunne bari balakka zaaridi xeelliyoogan gita asa getettidi sabettanadan go’es.
Xaaxi waaxin oyishan amppidi Tobbiyooge lallaba biddanappe kasiyan, biddiiddi de’ishin nne biddi simmin lallaba xeelliya allaalliyan denddiya oyisha ubbaassi gida zaaruwaa immanawunne simmiya wodiyan qassi hachchi balappe tamaaridi aaro muruta lallaba loyittidi giigisi ekkidi gugaa sinttan biddana mala abbiya kunttees.
Oyishaa…….

Ha maxaafay nabbaboynne nabbabuwa tamaariyoogee issipetettaa duussan de'iya gaytotetta minttanawu ubbakka qassi issi uray bari buzo koshsha alanawunne eraa dichchanawu gidiya gittaa immees.
Koyro shemppoy nabbabuwaara gayttida kulkka kulkka qofatanne qaalata oyqqidi gelodan shiiqees.
Naa'antto shemppoy qassi issi nabbabanchchawu naa'antto doonan nabbabiyoogaa xeelliyagan de'iya xeelaa shiishshi oyqqees.
Heezantto shemppoykka kaseegeetuppe dummatees geetettana xayikkonne qiibaa kiyi eqqidi nabbabiyaagaa, nabbabettiyagaanne nabbabo hanotaa bolli loyttidi wudees.
Koyro Shemppuwa.

kiitaa macaraa intte aybiini qonccisseetii.
xuufiya giddon I immiyo beeray aybee?
Xuufiya kiitaa macara geetettidi ha maxaafan go'ettidoogee nabbabiyoobaassi birshshetta malaatanaassa.
Ha macarati daroppe issi uraabaa qonccissiyoogaappe issipetettaaduussaa birshshettaakko baqqoosona.
Kiitaa macaray issipetettaa duussan asaa giddon de'iya meqettaa aannisaa, hayttaa haydaa, meraakka bari giddon oyqqees.
Xaaxi waaxiyo wode kiitaa macaray nabbabiyagawu gididee haasayiyagawu issi huuphe yohuwa woykko issibaa qonccissiyaba xalla gidennan qonccissiyo oge gaanawu danddayettees.
Oosuwa Garssaara issi keettan haasayettida haasayaa loyttidi xeellidi kiitaa macaraa ginaa shaakkite.
Issi nibaabiya giddon mattumaa beeraa qonccissiya kiitaa macaraa shaakkdi eranawu danddayettii?
Ha kiita macaraa hara wogan sitti oottidi go'ettanawu danddayettii?
Kress (1985) issi nibaabiya giddon de'iya kiitaa macaraa eranawu kaalliya oyshata denttana danddayettiyoogaadan wottees.
Ha xuufiyan kiitaa macaray koyroy so asaa duussan keettaawaa bollatettaa woykko xoqqatettaa gidishin kareera xeelliyo wode qassi deretettay mattumawu immiyo birshshetta malaatees.
Heezzntto Shemppuwa: Nabbabo timirttiya shiishuwa (Teaching approach.
Nibaabiya timirttiya Ziqqa kifiliyan shiishshiyo wogaa.
Oosuwa Kaallidi imettida oyshata citan tobbite.
Nibaabiya timirttiya ziqqa kifiletun tamaarissana xayikko merettiya metoy de'anee.
Ziqqa kifiliyan giyoogee qeeri naatussi nibaabiya tamaarissiyoogaa gaanawu danddayettii.
Yaanikko ha xekkan nibaabiya waatidi tamaarissiyo?
Lo''o nabbabanchchaa giyoogee bari nabbabiyoobaa kase barissi de'iya eraara gattidi birshshettaa immiyoogan kiitaa akeekiya uraa.
Kayma heetiya (bessaal tiwoorii) hagee daroppe naatussi shiiqiya nibaabee xunttaappe aahuwakko (specific general) baanaadan yootees.
Hegaa gishshawu asttamaaree naatussi shiiqiya nibaabe miishshati shaakerettidi kaaletettiddi shiiqanaadan oottanawu koshshees.
Ha heetee qassi issi nibaabiya nabbabida tamaaree ha"ikka hannin immiyo zaaruwan (immediate response) ammannees.
Koshshiya miishshata muliya shiishshidi naati etappe naagettiya qaratettaa demmanaadan oottiyogeekka ha heetiyasi giddo qofa.
Ha heetiya ammanuwaadan gidikko naatussi nibaabee shiiqiyoy misiliyan, danttuwan, hayttaa hayddaa qonccissiya medhdhi (ayyooha) xaafuwan, de'o woykko issi uraa duussa ayyoohaa (taariiyaa) hanotan hegaanne.

Qaalati suure ziiretana xayikko waanii?
Issi doonaa qaalati qofa qashuwa woykko dummanne koshshiya citaa medhdhiyo wode maaray mankkay de'iyo giraamere wogaa kaallidi uttiyoogaa xeellees.
Hagaa giyoogee asaa huuphee oykkanawu danddayiyoy amarida qaala gidiyo gishshawu guuttaara guuttaara shaakettidinne mucurettidi shiiqanawu koshshiyooga yootees.
Asaa naatu kahay qaalata oykkidi wottiyoy woykko naagiyoy mata wode hassayaana (short term memory) gidiyo gishshawu dari dari biyo wode kaseegaa dogi dogi bees woykko adussa wode hassayawu (long term memory) aatti yeggiyo gishshawu keehippe maaddiya maadiya qaalata ellellidi go'ettanaadan zorees.

Oyddantto Shemppuwa.
Naa'antto doonaa nabbabuwaa.
Sintta qofa.
Naa'antto doonan nabbabiyo wode Nabbabiyo miishshay ayba beeraa kaa'iyakko shaakkidi eroosona.
Nabbabiyoobaa woykko xuufiya doonaadan kaalettiya baaso qofata eridi dooroosona.
Nabbabiyo miishshaa woykko xuufiya deexuwa yiggidi nabbabiya naatu abbiyara biyaagaa dooroosona.
Pilggetta nabbabuwassi injetiya xuufiya dooroosona.
Naa'antto doonaa nabbabuwan xuufiya beeraa.
Naa'antto doonan nabbabiyoogee koyro doonan nabbabiyoogaappe waani dummatii.
Naa'antto doonan Nabbabiyo wode yaanin xuufee kaa'iyo beeray aybee?
Koyro doonay tamaareti woykko haasayiyaageeti aybanne metootennan qaalaa dooridi bantta koyyidobaa qonccissanawu danddayoosona.
Naa'antto doonan haasayiyo wode gididee ezggiyo wode Nabbabiyo wode gididee xaafiyo wode qaalaa dooruwan, qofa qashuwa waattan, menttuwa giigissuwankka gidin koyro doonaagaadan pashkkissenna.
Naa'antto doonan nabbabiyoobay koyroogaadan injjiya darenna gishshawu imettiya xuufiya qanttatettaynne adussatettay, qonccetettaynne geematettay, kawushshatettay deexotettay barina danddayida beeraa kaa'ees.
Hara baggaara qassi nabbabiyo xuufee qantta, qonccenne kawushsha gidikko ekkiyo kiitay immiyo birshshettay kuuyiyo akeekay keehippe eesotees.
Hagaa mala kawushsha oosuwa polanawu danttota malatiya qantta xuufeti eesuwan nabbabidi wurssanawunne zaaretti hassayanwu keehippe lo''o geetettees.
Xaaxi waaxiyo wode naa'antto doonan xaafettida nibaabe miishshati woykko xuufeti iitatettawukka gidin lo''otettawu ogiya dooyiyaageeta gidiyoogee oossikka qoncce.
Oosuwa Hagaappe garssaara de'iya oyshaa qoppa ekkada zaara.
Xaafettidabaa ubbaa doorennan nabbabo aggikko ayba metoy de'ii?
Daro nuuni koyyiyo doonan xaafettida nibaabe miishshati de'iyo heeran de'ikko giiga maxaafaa woykko nibaabe xuufiya dooranawu baaso qofa gidanawu bessiyabati hageeta giidi kuuyiyobati darobati de'oosona.
Issi doonaa quxaruwanne qaalaa tamaaranawu oge gidiyagaa gidanawu koshshees.
Dumma dumma nabbabo zugeta naati go'ettanaadan hanotaa injjeyiyagaa woykko qaadaa medhdhiyaagaa gidanawu koshshees.
Nabbabiyaageetu koshshaa kunttiyanne eta meeziyaara biya gomppaa oyqqidaagaa gidanawu bessees.
Kawushsha qaalatun xaafettidanne Nabbabiyo wode xubbiya qofati baynnaagaa gidikko keehippe dooretteeskawushshanne geeshsha woykko qoncce giyoogaa.
Kifile giddo timirttiyassi giiidi coo medhdhoba gidennan de'ishin suure xaafuwa wogaa kaallidaagaanne giiga kiitaa oyqqidaagaa gidanawu bessees.
Kifile giddon go'ettanawu bessiya huuphe qofata injjeyidi oyqqidaagaa gidanawu bessees.
Tamaaretu eraanne doonaa meeziya bessiyo hanotan giigidi mucurettidaagaa gidikko elle doorettees.
Nabbabuwa dosenna naata woykko tamaaretakka erennan baakko dafidi oosuwa giddo gelissiyaba gididi giigidaagaa gidanawu bessees.
Kiitaa giddon tukettay baynnan sitti giida kiitaa aattiyanne pidda gidanawu koshshees.
Hageeti naa'antto doonan xaafettida nibaabe maxaafaa woykko xuufiya dooriyo wode go'ettiyo mahata gidishin issi maxaafaa dooranawu etappe issuwa xallaa go'etteettee giyoogaa gidennan naa''aa heezzaa woykko dariyagaa go'ettanawu danddayettees.
Ha kaallidi imettida denddo menttotuppe koyro dooruwa demmiyay awugee ane xeellite.
Koyrottada ane nuuni ayba oosuwa waatidi oottiyakkonne oottidi simmi nuuyyoo aappunay qanxxettiyakko amaridaagaa intteyyoo yootays.
Ashanggoy Kabeero goshshaa yamiyan oottees.

Nabbabiyo xuufiya xuufiya deexuwa waatidi yiggiyo eray.
Yiggi xeellana xayikko tamaariyo bolli ehiyo metoy aybee?
Nabbabiyo maxaafati usakka timirttiyassi geetettidi xaafettibeennaageeta timirttiyassi dooridi kifile giddo ekkidi ehiyo wode daro naa'antto doonaa tamaareti deexxiyabadan ekkoosona.
Daroti maxaafay xalaalan kuulumuliyageeti kareera de'iya xuufiyappe nibaabiyassi giigidi shiiqiya nibaabee deexxees giidi qoppikkonne ha wodiya Pilggetta murutati bessiyoogaadan gidikko molettidi giigiya timirtte nibaabeti koyrokka doorettiyoy kareera suure de'o tumaa haasayiya maxaafaappe gidiyo gishshawu daro ginaa qonccissiya duussa wogata milxxi oottidi qonccissees.
Ayba gidikkonne naatussi ekkidi shiiqiyo xuufiya dooriyo ogetuppe amaridaagee garssaara qoncciis.
Maxaafa keettan de'iya maxaafatuppe daro asan nabbabettidaagaa koyyidi nibaabiya timirttiya giigissiyoogaa.
Daro qommo maxaafaa, gaazeexaa, metseetiyanne hara nabbabettiyabata naati shemppuwawu kare kiyiyo dembban laali wottidi daro naati nabbabanawu yaaretiyoogaa Kaalli demmidi go'ettiyoogaa.
Issi nibaabiya giddon dumma dumma qaalata denttidi naati nabbabiiddi waayettennan kunttiyo xuufiya dooriyoogaa.
Daroppe heera meeziya baaso oottidi xaafettida maxaafaa woykko xuufiya dooriyoogaanne hegaanne hegaa malatiyabata gaanawu danddayettees.

Pilggettaa hiillanne pissiya xaafuwa.
Ha korssee wudiyoobay, pilggetassinne pissiya xaafuwawu Cuucumaaninne hiillaa.

Issi issi pilggeta qommota waatidi giigissiyakko shaakkanna.
Kaaletto ogiya go’ettidi qoncceenne, ammanttiya pissiya xaafo hiilla meezzettana.
Koyro shemppuwa.
Ha shemppoy tamaarissiyobay, heezzu ano pilggetta kane qofata .
Shemppuwa halchchuwa.
Pilggeta kana qofata birshshana.
Pilggettaa halchchuwa qonccissana.
Saynisse pilggettatu eeshshaata qonccissana.
Qoncciso pilggetta qommonne qooda pilggeta qommuwa birshshatta eraana.
Oosuwa .
Tamaareto ha oysha, zaaranaasi malideti ente malikko lo’’o .
Asay daro wodiyaappe doomidi bantta heeraanne mootan haanetiyabatu meraa shaakki eranaw un’eittidi beettosona.
Aahoo birshshetan, pilggettaa giyogee issi metuwaassi hayyo zaaruwa woykko hayyuwako gakkansassi hiillanne go’aa immiyaa oosottaa oottiyoo ogiya yaagiyoogaa.
Pilggettay issi metuwa paggalanawu saynisse hiillaa go’etiyoogaa giyoogaa.
Ikka, pilggettaa hiilannee buzo yiirigetta kottannan issippe gatuwanne kuushsha qottata dichanaw, hanaaba malaatiya aahuwan maayretta dichchiyo gattiyoonnee mereta nu qofata makissidi xelliyoo ogee giyooga.
Saynisiyaa pilggatata mino birshshatay, issi ano oyisha woykko mala qofa pilggaanassinne zaaruwaa immanaassi gigida hillla kumidda oosuwa oottiyoogaa giyoogaa .
paatetta qofakko simiyo wode, luxetta pilggetay gooccatida shiiquwa oosuwaa gididi luxetta metotussi zaaruwa immiyo ogee giyoga .
Pilggeta metota shaakiyoogaa.
kase pilggettaa Oosata zaareetiyoogaa.
Pilggettaa mala qofanne ano xaafettidaabata gigissiyoogaa.
Pilggetasi bessiya hiilata, naqaasha shiishanawnne paattanaw injjee ogiyaa makkissiyoogaa.
Pilggettaa oyshata zaaranaawunne mala qofata mali bee’anawu kooshshiya naqaashata shiishiyoogaa.
Shiiqida naqaashata pilggetta oysha zaaranasinne mala qofa yiirigiyoogaa.
Koshshiya pilggetta kuushsha qofassi naqaashshata yiirigeettan gakkiyoogaa.
Xaaxi waaxiyo wode, pilggetay issibassi de’iyaa eraa gujanawu maaddiya ogiyan doometaappe doomidi maaran kasiyaa kaaluwa naagidi ootiyo ooso giyoga.
Qara haasayan luxetta pilggetassi de’iyaa lohissuwa garassan ano madaati,luxetta poshshiyooga hegeekka,issi luxetta hanota giddon issibay aybssinne waanidi hegaadan haniyaakko bessiya hundduma dichchinawu,woykka oorattaba medhdhanawu qofa dentettiyoogaan,ooratta ogiyaanne miishshatu muruta hanottan luxisssiyo ogeta dichchanawu go’’ees.
Oosso2: Bolara de’iyaa nabaabuwan keten’ada, kaaliya oyshata ne qofan qantta zaara.
Issiba co eriyoogappenne saynisse pilggetta go’’ettidi eriyoogaa giddon de’iyaa dummatettay aybee.
Pilggetay” daroto gamma gidena Ogiyan go’etidda birshshiyoogee aybisse.
Luxeta pilggeta oottanassi kasiya kaalluwa naggidi oottiyoogaa aybissi kooshshii.
Pilggetta ne qaalan woygaada birshshutee.
“Pilggetay, Librare Ooso, woykko payddo, woyiko dere giddo ooso gidenna” giyoogee woygiyoogee.

Tamaaretto ha oyisha zaaranaas malidetii?
Pilggeta shaakkiyiyo dumma dumma ogeti de’ossona.
Baasonne issi kane halchchuwaan pee’iya pilggetta, ba halchchuwa meradan.
Qonccisso paatetanne woshshetta pilggetta ,pilggetassi dumma dumma hooleta baaso oottees.
Mali be’onne guyegge hanotan sintaaw gaaso gidiya pilggettaa, pilggeta gigssuwa hiillaa kaaliyoogaa.
Qonccissonne paayido pilggettaa, pilggettay baaso oottiyoo shiiquwana.
Oossuwa Baasonne issi kane halchchuwaan pee’iya pilggettaa gioyoogan ne akeekiyoy aybbakko yoota?
Issi issi gassotun , saynissiyaa pilggetay issi metuwa pilggidi he metuwassi zaaruwa immyoga gididi hegeekka hunddumaa woykka ooso boli peeshshiyo pilggeta gettidi naa’aan shaahetees.
Basso pilggetas hagaappe kaallidi de’iya merati de’oosona.
Oorataaba demanew ooratoa otta qofata woykko qonccisotta issi qofa baaso pilggetappe beetiyaa qofat issi issi halchchttida pilggetaa nu kahaa aassanaw go’ettiyoogaa.
Ooretaba medhdhenaw –ooratta hiillay woykko pilggeta oottiyo oggeta giigissanawu go’ettiyoogaa.
Phoolissiyoogaa kassa de’iya hunddumma woykko hiillay woykko qofa issippetettay duma deretattaa maaraani zaarixeellanaw go’etiyoogaa.
Hegaas, basso pilggeteni anno laagiyaa wolqqay orataba medhdhiyooga gidenan pilggetta hiilanchawu de’iyaa qofa pultissiyonne saynissee pilggetta asa eratetta assiiyooga.
Tilla pilggetta halchchoy hunddummatta paacaansinne tilla pilggetta saynissiyaa go’etiyoogan beetana hayyo qofata pilggiyogaa.
Ha pilggetta beettide muruta ha heeran ooso bolli peeshshanawu denddayo ogeta yiggi xeelliyo hiillaa, co yeedan koyiyo ogiya go’etiyogaappe, dummayidi ooso bolli peeshaanawu go’etetes.
Hagakka baasonne ooso boli peeshshiyo pilggeta dummayidi go’etiyoogee issi wuridaba miqqiqliyoogadan qoodetees.
Oosso 5: Hagaappe kaallidi de’iya oyshatussi qantta qonccisuwa imma?

Gaasso pilggetta.
Washetay issi erettidda wodiya giddon issiba meretta hanotta qonccisanas naqaashsha shiishiyooga woykko ha hanota qotta kase de’iyo hanotatuppe dummayiya meraa geddaraanaw woykko eta giddon de’iya eeshshaatu gaytotata shaakanaas go’ees.
Hageetikka eti dummatiyo xekkatunne, eti pilggetta aahotetta shaakki eranawu go’ees.
Gayttotetta pilggetay hanotatu giddon de’iyaa gitta hassaya demmanas naa’anne hegappe dariya) giddon deiyaa gayttotetta xeellees.
Issi dola deretetta heeran hanetiyaabata gididi nu garssaa koshsha dentetiya daro qaaddati de’oosona.
Gaaso pilggeta.
Gaasso pillgetay koyruwan wudiyoogee issi dumma hanotattu eeshshattanne eta issippetetaba ciimma hanotan woykko ogiyan pilggiyoogaana.
Hara baggara, paattetta pilggettay halchchiyoy,pilggeta eeshsha qottatu giddon de’iyaa gaassonne marutta(Cause effect) gaytoteta giigisanaawu go’ees.
Nuuni issi nu eriyobassi birshshatay de’iyooba nu ayfiyan gaytiyo wodiyaa ha hanata eeshay ayssi I hegatto gididaakko giidi maalaalan xeeliyooga doomeetees.
Issibaa mela pissiyaa aattiyoogaa giddanan ciimmaa ogiyaan ootiyooga hegeekka hayyo hassayanne hunddummatta qonccissiyoogaa.
Paattettida Cora qofatuppe awugee daro go’iyakko shaakiyoogaa.
Hunddumma murutatetta shaakanaas, ha hunddummay maliyoobatan geeraatta paacanaas.
Issi paatteta qofa naqaashata kaafanaw woykko palqqanaasa.
Hunddummanne geeraatu baaso qofata sinta go’aa maliyoogaa.
Koshshaa Pilggetta.

issi like birshshetibena mettuwa ciimayiddi pilganaw go’ees.

Qotta eeshata waati yiggiyaakko akeekiyoogaa.

Ooso 8 mal’ibe’o pillggeta giyoogee neeni eraay?
Guyee hannuwan sintta eeshshaa bessuwaa pilggettaa malibe’oo pilggetara waatadda gattay?
Malibe’o pilggettaa.
Malibe’o pilggettay naa’u citata eti emiyo issi murutta yigiyoogaanne hegaaan gaaso giddiyaa mala paaciyoogaa malibe’o pilggettan kane yohoy saynisseya kaafettidda naaguwa oottiyooganne hegaassikka dumma dumma qonccissuwa immiyoogaa.
Malibe’o pilggettan hiillanchchayikka issi pilggetta hanotan dumma hunddumma wotiyoogan issi hanotay hara boli ehiyo dummatetta yiggees.
Ha pilggetay issi wode kanttida hanotan malati ha’ikka haniyakkonne agiyaakkona hillanchan giigeettidi oosettiyaaba giyoogaa.
Issi hillanchchay Toophphiya giddon hanetiya kaamiyaa daafay ayssi hannetti giidi malibe’uwan naaguwan pilggeta cita gigisiyooga ottanaw dandayetena.
Hagadankka hillanchay issi hanettida kaamiyaa daafaa pilggiyooga xalan kuushakka gakkanawu deexxes.
Hegaa giyoogee, hiillanchchay tilla pilggetiya qottay woykko guye hanotta zaari gamman bessiya qottay lamettiya qotta boli gaassota pilggees giyoogaa.
Eeshsha qonccissanne (Quelitetive) payddo (Quantitative) pilggettaa.
Oosso 9 Tamaaretto, Eesha qonccissinne paydduwa pilggettaa giyoogaa entte akeekay aybee?
Ha naa’u pilggetta qommoti aybin gayttiyoonaa?
Pilggeta oosuwa oottiyo bila ogetta xeelliyaagan hagee tuma oge giyoogaa kuuyettida polonne mucuro hiillaa oge de’ena.
Issi issi hillaykka doometan doometiyaa luxetta billappe woykko otta pilggeta wogaappe denddoosona.
Eeshshaa Qonccisso pilggettaa.
Eeshshaa qoncisso pilggettay muruta paydettiyaa ogiyaan oosetenaagaa.
Eesha qoncisso pilggetta oosuwan neqaashati qonccisso xuufiyari shiiqeesippe attin payddoti shiiqqokkona.
Ikka, keehippe une’ttiyoogee nu deretetay medhdhido yohuwaa tumatetta gidiyaakko oottiyo pilggetta.
Eeshsha qonccisso pilgetas dumma eretiya eeshshay issibassi ciimma meeziyaa dichiyoogaanne issiba pillggetta bussanne hegaa murutata xoqqissiyo hiillan he issibay ekketiyaa ogiyaan pilggiyooga.
Eeshshaa pilggetay daro wode eekettiyaaba giddikkonne shiishiyo naqaashshatussi ordde qofa immiyoogan doro go’a immees.
Tumatetaba qonccisiyaa qaalaan , eeshsha qonccisso pilggettay Hanottatabanne cimma hanottan pilggetta qofa xeellees.
Payddo pilggetta.
payddo pilggetay hiillanne saynissiyan pilggetta eraa hiilatta qoodettiya eeshshata qoodan qonccissiyoonne hanotatu gaytotetta payduwan bessiyo pilggetta maaraa go’etees.
Payddo pilggeta buussa yiggiyoogee kane ooso.
payddo pilggetay issi hunddumma giddon bee’ttiya qofatu giddon de’iyaa gaytotetta qoncissiyoogan issi hanotta adan aybbanne laammenan pilggiyo hiillan oosettees.
Ha hiillaa eqqettiyaageeti payddo pilggetay koshshiya hillancha qofappe woykko eraappe gujenan oosetees giidi borossona.
Hagappe kaallidi Eeshsha qonccissonne payddo pilgettatu giddon de’iyaa ano dummatettay qoncciddosona.
Tumatteta meretan dummattosona .
Pilggeta hiillanchchatunne pillgetta hasheiyaageetu giddon de’iyaa gaytottetan.
Guuta gaytotetay de’iyooge attenabe gidikkoka, payddo pilggetta hillanchay pilgetta hashetiyaageetura daro walaheetenan oosetees, Eeshshaa qoncciso pilgetan qassi hillanchchaynne hashetiyaageeti baxuxeti oykettidi issoy hara bola laamee ehiysiyo suggeta medhdhiyogan eretees.
Eeshsha pilggetay he pilgatay wurssetan ay muruta woykko ayfe yohuwa demmanakko daro erokona.
Eesha qonccisso pilggeta hillanchata bantta kumeta qofa naqaashata yiggi xeelliyoogan oottiyaageeta gidishin payddo pilggeta hillanchchati issi baaka bantta qofa gujenaan giddo ginna xeella pilggeta bili kaalloosona.
Eeshsha qonccisso pilggetay payddo pillggetay go’etiyoogaappe guuta leemissotta (samples) go’etees.
payddo pilggetay kane halchchuwan guutaba pilggidi darobassi laamiyo woykko kuyiyoo eratata dichiyo billa gididi he wodiyan de’iyan hanotata qoncissiyoo hiillaa go’etees.
Eeshshaa qonccisso pilggetay issiba birshshidi bessiyoogaa gidishin paddo pilggetay gassi issiba giddon de’iyaa gayttotetta woykko gaassotetta go’ees.
Payddo pilggetay mucureti gigida pilggetta gigissuwan naqaashsha shiishiyo hiillata go’etiyoogan danddayettida keenan hillanchcha buzo eray gujetenan poletees.
Eesha qonccisso pilggetay makkiseti beenaa naqaasha shiishiyoo ogiyan poletiyo wode payddo pilggetay muccurettidanne makkisettida neqaashsha shiishiyoo ano ogetuan go’etidi assa gidenabaata yiggiyo miishshata naqaasha shiishanas go’etiyoogan eta giddon de’iyaa hara dummatettakka bessees.
Oosso.
Saynissee pilggetatta Eeshshaa qonccissonne payddo pilggeta qommo giidi shaakkiyo bassoy aybee.
Nuuni eeshsha qonccisso pilggetan naqaashata ay meran wotiyo.
Nuuni payddo pillggetta naqaashata ay meran wotiyoo.
Eesha qonccisso pilggeta birshshidi bessiya dumma bila eeshshata zuleyittee.
Gaytotata pilggiya naa’ubata woykko hegaappe dariyaabatu giddon de’iyaa gaytotetta besses giyoogaayo qofay aybee.
Payddo pilggetassi ano halchchoy aybee?
Payddo pilggeta hillanchati loyttidi go’etiyo hiillati aybee aybee.
Tamaarettoo, Saynissee pillggetta ano meratta zuleyanassi dandayeetti?
Daro asay, saynissian beettida eraa co kese meezziyan demmido eraraa walakkossona.
Saynissiya pilggeta merata qonccissiya ichashshu eeshshati de’oosona.
Saynisiya pilggetay muccureta hiillan gigldaagaa gididi ha pilggetay oottetiyo wodiyaa erettida xekkata adhdhdi oosetees.
Saynisse pillggetay naqaasha go’etees.
Naqaashati saynissee pilggetassi de’o shemppodan qoodetoosona.
Oraotto saynissee pilggetappee demmetiyaa murutati issibassi baggappe attin issibassi kumetta eeshshaa qonccisiyaaba gidenna.
Saynisse pilggetay zaari oosettidi go’an pee’ees.
Zaari oosuwa giyoogee, issi pilggeta zaari zaai pilggidi go’ettido hillanne pilggettay ootiyoo ogeta hara pilggeta ooso boli peshananawu go’etiyoogaa giyooga.
Saynisse pilggettay palaman Diccees.
Saynisse pilggettay xinxxiuwppe palamaa giyoogee dumma dumma pultota go’etiyooganne qonccissiyaa naqaashata go’etiyoogan qofa assi dichiyooga giyooga.
NAA’AANTTOO SHEMPPUWAa.
Pilggettaa Halchchuwa xaafuwaa.
Tamaretta, ha moduliyaa koyro shempuwaa hashu saro wurssetta.
Geluwaa/Guyye hanotta Qonccetta.
Mettota Birshshi yootiyoogaa.
Pilggetta alalletta gigissiyoogaa.
Pilggetta mino miyetta.
Malatetiya pilggeteta zaaretiyoogaa.
Ha shemppuwassi ano aallalee pilggetta halchchuwa xaafuwa qonccissiyoogaa.
Haniya pilggetta huuphe yohuwaa dorana danddayosoona.
Murutta hunddumma xaafuwa meezzetana.
Bantta pilggettaa oosuwasi misattetiya qonccee giigida alalliya gigissana.
Lo’’o pilggetta hiillaata giigissana.
Missatiya pilggetta hiillaa giigissana.
Bantta pilggettaa wodiyanne marccuwa makkissidi bessana.
Pilggetta Halchchuwaa Ufuretetta.
Oosso 1 pilggetta Halchchoy Aybee?
Pilggettaa projektiya doomanappe kassiyan, pilggetta halchchoy giiganawu bessees.
Pilggetta ooso buussan pilggetta halchchoy koyro xekka.
Xaafettida pilggetta helchchuwaa woykko, pilggetiya metuwaa halchchoy eran go’ettiyoo ogiya wottiyoogaa.
Pilggetta halchchoy issi bessiya pilggetta xekkata hiillanchay ooso giddo wooxi gelanaappe kassiyan qofana malaanaadan go’ees.
Ha halchchuwas danchchikee gidide marccuwanne dumma dumma miishshata qonccissiyoogee pillggetta hiillaanchcha ooso.
pilggetta helchchuwas ano aallallee aybee?
Tamaaretto koshshiya keena tobbiyaa pillggetta halchchuwaa allaliya xeelliyaagaan tobbido mala hidotay de’ees.
Neeni ay go’etanawu koshiyaakko, aybissi hegaa oottanawu bessiyaakko, ay ogiya go’ettiyakkonne ay ogiyan bettida muruta woykko ayfiya maakissanakko, ay qommo pilggetaas go’iya hiillaa woyko buqura go’ettanaakko qonccissidi bessees.
Kaallidi aybssi pilggettay oosetanaas bessiyakako malaattidi bessees.
Ay oosotti polettidaakko erissiya malaatatu maachcha bessees.
Ha pilggettaa wursettan maacciya yaratukka banatarkkaka bantta yalissa ogiyan yiggiyoogan ha pilggetta ogeekka gaasuwan amppidaaga gidiyooganne lo’o muruta immiyaagatuwa gigettis giidi maccanas go’ees.
Pilggetta huuphee yohuwa shaakki eriyoogaa.
Pillgetta oosuwawu giigiyo wode, huuphee yohuwaa shaakki eriyoogee doometta oosotuppe issuwa.
Issi issi huuphe yohoti pilggetas dooretiyo wodiyaan mahetta goocaa qofatun woykko maheetan yiggettees.
Pilggetta maaduwa woykko koshsshaa.
Beettidda murutay oosuwana pe’iyoogaa metuwa birshshanawu) go’ettiyoogaa.
Huuphee yohoy deretetta wogara maayetiyoogaa gidiyoogaa.
Pilggetta Huuphe yohowa pulutotta.
Issi issi pilggetta huuphe yohotu pultoy ne akeekkan awugee?
Hagaappe garssara ettaappe amaridaageeta zuleya.
Issi pilggettaa oottanaappe kasettidi, lo’o pilggetas huuphe yohuwa dooriyoogee keehi koshshiyaaba.
Gaazeexataanne librariyaan shiiqida maxaafata.
Maxaafati daro luxanchchatun woykko, eranchaatun xaafettida xuufetuppe doommidi hara deretetas xaafettida haniakayankka xuufeti uttidaageeta xuufettikka go’oosona.
xompposona.
Daro erettida pilggetta eqotati dumma dumma kane qofatura ano pilggetta mani’etun ubbatto xuufetu dasheetta go’ettosona woykko gigisswinaa.
Galla galla nuuni dumma dumma qommo hanotaara woykko metotu cenggurssaninne missliyan naqaashata aatiyabatuppe, worqqattan gayttida xuufetuppe, issoy hararaa oottiyo haasayatuppe dere assa gaytotetatun poletossonaa.
Ha gaytotetatikka issi mino hayanchay woykko pilggetta hiillanchay hageeta shiisherettidi pilggetta huuphe yohuwa gigisanawu pultto gidoosona .
Ay mala kiittati aadhdhiyakko?
oyshati nuuni huuphe pilggetta qofa giigisanawu go’oosonaa.
Taarikiyaappe demmiyo naqaashati ha naqaashata eti doomettan halchcheti oosettido aallaliyaappe polo dumma gidida aallaliyaas pilggetta hillanchchatun oyshata xana’anawu woykko pilgganawu go’ettossonaa.
Huuphe yohoy Aahoo?
Daro pilgettati issi guutta pilggetta mam’ee xalaalan polettidosona: amarida pilggetta hiilanchchati issi pilggetas kumetta hanottata paattidi bessiyoogaa oottidosona.
Doorettida huuph yohoy tumaappe pilggettiyaabee?
Huuphe yohuwa aahottetaappe denddidaagaan xalaalan huuphe yohoy, oyshaassi zaaroy baynaga gidiyoogan, pillggetawu hanenan attanas danddayees.
Hara qassi akeekanawu bessiyaabay, halchettida pilggettawu go’etiyo qaalati birshetiyaaga gidiyoogee woykko gidenaagee.
Hara akeekanaawu koshshiyaabay xaafettida maxaafata huuphe yohay kase pilggetidaakoonne pilggetibenaakko woykko koyro pilggettaan metoy de’iyakkonne baynakko xuufeta zaaretixeelliyooga kuushay gakettidee?
Shiiqida naqaashatu yiirigaanawu sirissiyaageete?
Issi huuphe qofay ammanttiya ogiyan yiggetanawu naqaashsha shiishidogane he pilggetta metuwa zaariyoodan oosetibeenaagaa giddikko huuphe yohoy bari huuphiyan muruta pilggetta oottanasi aybbakka go’anawu danddayenna.
Pilggettaya maaddoy de’iyooba gidana mala pilggetta hillanchcha gidiyaa keessa naqaasha shiishanawu koshees.
Hara akeekaanawu koshshiyaabay , shiiqida naqaashata paattanaas doorettida gooda hiillaan ha pillggetta hillanchayo de’iyaa guyyee meeziyaa .
I’ woykko A’ ha halchchettida qooda hiillatun paattiyooga tuma akeekatay de’ii?
Pilggettiyo metoy maadiyaabee?
Oosuwa giddo geluwaappe kasiyan, pilggetta hillanchay ha oosuwawu maaddoy de’i baawee giyooga maaccana bessees.
Pilggettan Beettida murutay corawu xaaxi waaxi go’ettanaassi Danddayetii?
Issi pilggetta projakttee go’ay de’iyoogaa gidiyoogee issi wode go’a xaalaawu paatteta gidiyogaappe adhdhidi koyettiyaagaa gidiyoode , ha pilggetay qaxa gidida gujo go’ay de’ana giishin issi hiillanchchay ha naqaasha go’ettidi hara dumma hanotas xaaxi waaxo ogiyan go’etiyooga gidan bessees giyooga.
Naqaasha paattanas ay keenaa marccuwanne wodyia wurssidee?
Pilggettaa aalaliyaas koshshiyaa marccoy xaallay darotto issi pilggetta projekitee ekeetiyaaga oottees.
Giigida pilggeetta ogee projektiyas haniyaagee?
Daro sabettida pilggetta qofay darotto boorettiyoogee kushshe kumena lefan halchchettida pilggetta ootiyoo hiilla gaasuwana.
Pilggetan hashettiyagetu boli gakana dandayiy qohoy de’ii?
Pilggetta hiilanchchati ha pilggeta projektiyaa gaassotan yiggetiyaa assatu boli assatetta woykko qofa kaha hanottan qohuwa gaatiya metotta paati xeelana bessees.
Tamaaretto, ha’i entte pilggetta huuphee yohuwu shaakki eriyoo lo’o era dichchidetta gaanawu danddayettees.
Oosso Ne Luxettaan neyo haniyaa pilggetta oottanas bessiyaa oydu pilggettaa ogiya qoffada kaallidi beetiyaa mela sohuwan xaafa.
Pilggetta geluwan pilggettaa Halchcho kifliyan pilggetta hillanchay ay ay gujjiyaakko ne qofa qonccissaa.
Issi pilggetta oottanas dummattida guyye naqqashata zuleyiyoogas woykko go’ettiyoogaas halchchoy aybe?
Tamaaretto ,ha xekkan bolla baggara qonccidda oyshatta zaariyoogee guutta daafurissiyaaba.
Gelloy nabbabiya assas guye/dendo/ naqaashata pilggaanas koyettidi gigidaba mera bessiya pilggetta danchchikke.
Geluwan xaafanchay ha pilggetta nabbaiyaageti he huuphe yohuwan garssa koshsha dentettanas bessees.
Pilggetta hillanchchay issi baaso qofa woykko pilggetta oysha gididi de’iyaaba gidikko ha baaso qofay woykko oyshay doomettan eranaassinne tobbanawu bessees.
Zagaye Abiyinne A yarati, (2009:4950) qonccissidogaadan, issi pilggetta helchchuawan geluwa kifilee qonccisanas koshshiyaabatu haggaappe kaalliya qofatun dashshettidi shiiqiyoogaadan yoottidosona.
Nabaabiya assay pilggetta meranne he pilggettan pilggeettiya oyshata aassidi guyye naqaashaa immiyoogaa.
Ne pilggeta pissiyee kase adhdhida pilggettaa oosotta koshshiyoodan nashshiyooga.
Gelo xaafoy minja oyshata bayratettan xeelaanas bessiyaaba.
Hara pilggetaappe ekeettida oosoti ha pilggetta halchchuwaas maayeetiyaagaa gidanna bessiyoogaa.
Ne pilggetta oosuwan ay naqaashati bayratettan ekeetiyaakko ne oosuwa gina qoncissiyoogaa.
Nabaabiyaagee awugee awgaappe kalli kaalli ziiretiyakko yootiyaa gomppa nabbabiyaagaas qonccisinyoogaa.
Ha geluwaa buqurata bessiyaa gelo qofati awan wuriyaakkonne ooratta halchchettida pilggetta oosotti qassi awugaappe doomiyaakko malaati bessiyoogaa.
Xaaxi waaxin, hunddummati, hunddummatu mera danttoti, pilggetta oyshetu yafarati payddonne eeshshaa qonccisso pilggetta hiillan eta koshshiyoodan dummettidi go’an peshshanaas koshshees .
payddo pilggettan, issi hiilanchchay hunddumma go’ettiyo hanottan ba pilggetta halchchuwa doometan wottidi go’etees.
Eeshshaa qonccisso pilggettan hunddumma go’etiyiyo pilggetta oysha yafaray issi pilggtta qottan woykko pilggeta meran amppees.
Hegaas ha gaasotun amppida, hunddumma qofatu gaytotett denddoy payddo pilggetta gaadanikka koyrokka dummayiyogaan doommetan tobbees.
Dashshetta qofan, geluwa/guyye qofa qonccisiyo kifile ne pilggetta bayro gaasuwa bessiya qofata oykkanaas koshshees.
Ha projektiyaa neeni aybissi oottay?
Oosuwa Ha huuphe yohuwa nababiyoo wodiyaan ne guugiyan hassayiyoobay aybbakko ha garssara de’iyaa yafaratun xaafe.
Daro pilggettaa halchchoti issi metuwaas zaaro gididi eketaanawu danddayees.
Lo’o giigida metuwaa qonccissiyo eeshshaay aybee?
Issi pilggettaa metuwaa zuleyiyo wode qoncce, kawushsha, oottanawu metenna poletiyaaba gidanawu koshshees.
Gujjuwan, metuwa qonccissiyoogee pilggetta giddon beettiyaa pilggetiya qofa eeshshata la’a la’a gidenaanee naagetiyaa eeshshaa qofatta shakkidi bessiyaaga gidanawu koshshees.
Tamaaretto, ente woni zuleyido qonccee metuwaa ziiretu eeshshaara hagaappe kaallidi de’iyaagetura gaati yiggi xeellite.
Pilgettas ciimma eray de’enageeta gididi bila hiillay de’iyo ezzgiyaa assatus gidiyoogadan meeteiyaaga gidiyooga.
Ooso bolli de’iyaa hunddumma zawa meraturanne pilggeta koshshra dabottiyaaga gidiyooga.
Pilggettana danddayetiyaaga.
Qonccetettanne pilggetta zawatetta, gishin ha metuwa pilggetta hillanchchay baassi de’iyaa marccuwaninne wodiyaa kuuyana danddeyiyoogaa gidiyoogaa.
Ha metoykka issoy issuwaara qofan oykettida, malibe’o oyshatu giddon de’iya pilggetta oyshatun metotu qonccetetta missatiyaane kaalliyaa halchchotu giddon issipetettay de’ana bessees.
Oosuwa Netuwa qonccissiyo wode ubbassi kotta gidida mertiyaa balay aybee?
Koyrotadda, ha oysha nerikka mala simmada.
Koyruwan, meto qonccisoy koshshena zaareteta xaafota oykiyoogan zaareto xaafoti ha kifiliyan he metuwa phoolisiyagetta gidiyagan qoncce zaway de’iyogeta gidanas bessees.
Naa’anttoy, metuwa qonccissuwa issi mala qofa dumma ogiyan zaarettidi xaafi adusiyo meray daroto bala gididi beetiyoogaa.
Heezzanttoyn, issi muruta metuwa dooridi qonccissanawu bessishshin daro, walaha metota qonccissiyoogaa.
Ha bola baggan beetiyaa balata ashanas, issi pilggetaa hiilanchchay qanttanne akeekanas metena metuwa qonccissiyo ogeta hassayanas koshshees.
Ha shemppuwa kifilee 1 neeni oyddu huuphphe ne pilggeta baaso oosuwan shaakka eranas oyshetadassa.
Ha’i hagaappe bola bagga tobbidobatta ne kahaan hassayada ne kase gigissido pilggetta huuphphe yohuwan metotu qonccissuwa xaafa.
Oosuwa 1 Issi pilggeta hillanchay ba pilggetta halchchuwa gigisiyooge aybissi koshshi.
Pilggetta halchchuwa xaafanassi ano qofanawu bessyabeti aybee aybee?
Tamaaretto, bolla baggara de’iya oyshata loyttidi malideti?
Halchchotikka pilggetta metowa qonccisotura tilaa maayettiyaageeta gidanna bessees.
Pilggetta huuphe yohuwa wudiyoogaa halchchuwa maaraana xaalaw qofa xuntiyoogaa.
Pilggettas dummayido metota zaaranawu banqattana naqaashsha shiishiyoo hanotata digiyoogaa.
Pilggetta oosuwa maaraa tilla birshshiyo danchchiketta giigisanaasa.
Hegaas, muruta ogiyaan giigida halchchoti pilggetta oosuwa hiillatta dichanas hanotta injjeyiyoogapekka aadhdhidi naqaashsha shiishanas, paatanas, birshshanaas he naqaasha go’an peeshanai ogiyaa bessees.
Pilggetta Oyshshatinne malibe’o qofati issoye dummee?
Xaaxi waaxo pilggettiya yohuwa shaakki erogaappe guuyiyan kase oosettida xaafota zaretogaappe guyiyan pilggetta hiilanchay metota ooso bolli peeshiyo malibe’o qofata woykko pilggetaa oyshata qonccissanawu bessees.
Pilggetta oyshshati woykko malibe’o qofati metuwaa assidi qonccissanawnne ciimma ogiyan paataanaw kaafees.
Malibe’o qofay eeshsha qottatu giddon de’iyaa gayttotetta maaraa qonccissiyaagaa geetettees, siittan tilla paacettees.
Pilggetaa eeshshe qottatu giddon, de’iyaa naagettiya gayttotetay tuma woykko worddo gidanawu danddayees.
Oosuwa 1Issi pilggetta hiilanchay pilggetta oyshshata woyko malibe’o qofa ay wode goetanasi bessi?
Issi pilggetta hiillanchchay malib’o qofa gidin woykko pilggeta oyshshata ay wode go’ettanawu bessiyakko teqqiya wogaay de’enna.
Eeshshaa qonccissiyaanne issuwaa issuwaa huuphiyaan qoodiyoo pilggetta qonmotusi (Etuppe aykenati hegadani deiyoona?
Darotto Eeshshaa qonccisso pilggetasi goan peeossonaa .
Naa’anne hegappe bolla eeshshaa qotatu gaytotetta minotteta he gaytotaka oyshadaani xaafiyoogan bessees.
Hundummaa pilggetan go’ettiyaga gididi payddo pilggetta oosuwasi dumma koshshee .
Naa’anne hegappe bolla eeshsha qonttatu giddon de’iyaa gaytoteta keehippe paatidi malaattees.
Eeshsha qatatu gidoni deytiyaa naagetiya gaytoteta birshidi besees.
Issi pilggetan ha kifle Oyqqiyoobati ayba gaada qofay?
Co mela oossetiyaa pilggettappe hundummass woyko ooso boli peeshanawu qofetidi polletiyaa pilggetaasi gidiya keena marccuwa demiyoogee keehi injjee.
Hundummaa maadduwaa xeelliyaaga, kase de’iyaa eraa waati aassnaakko imetida hayoo qoftaka xaaxi waaxi bessees.
Ha kifle issito issito “pilggetta halchuwaa qonccissuwaa” woyko “pilggetta Oosuwaa gaassuwaa“ gettetees.
Issi pilggettaa hillanchay bana zaari oychchanas bessiyaa baaso oyshshati aybe aybe?
Pilggetta maaduwaaba qofiyoo wodiyan, pilggetta hiilanchay hagappe kaaliyaa oyshshata oychchanas bessees.
Hundummatu qofatu mayretaa gaytotteta pilggetappe demiyoo murutay ayba gidanne.
Ha murutappe kali oosetiyaa pilggetatu dentana dandayiyoo hayyo qofati ayba gidanne.
Ooso boli de’iyaa luxissiyaagas ayfe ayba gidane.
Murutati proramiyaa, hillata woyko dichcchaa oosuwaa bolli laame ehiyoona.
Ha murutati luxeta poliessiyaa maachaa boli laamiyaa ehaanas dandayiyoona?
Ha helchchetida pilggetta gaassotan zaari giigiyaabay woykko beetida lo’o laameti aybee?
Ha pilggetta ayfeti ay ogiyaan oosuwaan peeanakko woykko kaalidi ay ooratabi medhdhetana deiyooko?
Ha pilggetay aybisi maaddiyaakonne ay metota teqanasi dandayi?
Beetida murutati laamiyaa waati ehiyaako aybisi ha oosetida pilggettay koshshiyaga gididako?
Pilggetaa Aahotettaa.
Pilggetta aahotettaa giyooge woygiyoogee?
Pilggeta oosuwaa aahotetaa zawayiyogee maadoy de’iyoo pilgetta gidiyooga besanas qofidi ottiyo akeekaa ogiyan gigiyaaba.
Pilggetta hillanchay pilggeta aahoteta zawa xeeliyaagan dumma giigida kiffliya gigissanas woyko ha kifliyaa qofay gaytiyoo hara pilggeta dumma kifleetun xaafanawu denddayees.
Xaaxi waaxin, aahotetaa zaarayiyoogee issi pilggettay ay ogiyaani xuumana woyko zawaa shaakana bessiyaako akekisees.
Hegappe gujjuwan, issi pilggetta oosuwaappe asay ne pilgettappe nagidobata neeni pilggennan kantiko ays agada kantidako nababiyaa asawu neeni qassi ne ootabenna gaassuwaa qoncissanawu beesees.
Anotetaan, misatiyaa xaafetidabatu zaaretoy neeni ootiyoo pillggeta metotura gaytotetay de’iyoo cora maxafata koshshido keena shaaki akeekiyooga, malatiyooga, nababiyooganne yigi xeeliyoga getetees.
Ha pattetayka anotetan dereteta dola eratetara gattixeelliyoogan malibe’o qofata gaasoteta gaytoteta maara nagetidi gigetidako maalatanas besees.
Pilggetta hillanchay ciimma gidida pilggetta oosota zaaretiyoogaa koshshees.
Pilggetta hiilachchay wurssetta pilggetta projektiyaa oottanaappe kasiyan dumma gaassotuppe denddidagaan ciimma kase xuufiya zaaretuwa xaafanas bessees.
Minttidi giigetta xuufiya zaaretoy he pilggetta oosuwan kase oosettidabati aybakko ciimma akeeka immees.
Kase oosettida oosota akeekiyoogee pilggetta hiilanchchay koshshiyaa metuwa hegeekka gujjo era ha pilggetas immiyoogaan kaafees.
Yaliissa xuufee zaaretto xaafoy pillgetta metuwaa zawaa zara yigganaawu kaafees.
Metuwa zaagiyoogaappe gujjuwan, xuufiya zaaretoy malibe’o qofata oyshanne halchchuwa gigisaaawu go’ees.
Aassidi nabaabiyoogee pilggeta hiilanchcay dumma dumma pilggetiya metuwa gigissiyo shiiqota eranawu go’ees.
Kase xuufiya zaaretoy lo’o pilggetta naqaashatu paatetta gayttotetta giigisanasinne ha pilggetan beettida naqaashata paatiyooganinne qonccissiyoogaan oosotus baaso gidees.
Kase xuufiya zaareto xaafoy keehi eeso ogiyan halchchuwaa xaafiyo xekka gidiyoo giishshawu lo’idi go’an pe’aanawu bessees.
Meezzee de’iyo pilggettaa hiillanchchati pilggetta zaareto xaafuwa zaaretiyooga keehi koshshiya xekkadan ekkosonaa .
Kase xaafotu zaaretuwa go’ettenaagee,hara projjectiya halchcho xekkati ubba pilggetta buussata oosuwan peeshibenana agiyoogaara lagge giyooga.
Oosuwa Issi pilggetta projektiyaa oosuwaa dommanappe kasettidi issi pilggetta hiilanchchay oychanas bessiyaa keehi go’iya oyshati aybee aybee?
Ay pilggetta projektiyaa doommnaappe kase, pilggetta hillanchchti oyshanawu bessiya oyshati.
Ha pilggettiyaa yohuwan kase oosettide pilggetta qommoti aybee?
Aadhdhida pilggetaappe ay ayfe woykko murutay bettidee?
Pilggetta hiillanchata gujjo pilggeta koshshiyoogadan immettida ginnati aybee aybee?
Pilggettan attidabati aybee aybee?
Helchchetida pilggetay ha yohuwankase de’iyaa era bolli gujjuwass waattidi go’ii?
Ay ay pilggetta hiillatti kase aadhdhida pilggeta oosuwan pee’idonaa?
Xaafotu zaaretuwa wodiyaan pilggetta hiillachchati kaalliyaa oyshshata oychchanas bessees.
Ta doorido xaafotu zaaretuwa birshshenas danddayiyo dumma pilggeta oyshay aybee?
Ta shiishiyo naqaashsha zaarota xaafotu qommoy aybee?
Taani hunddummaa yohotuba xeellayida de’iyaana?
Ta kase xaafotu zaaretiyo xaafotu zaway awugee?
Ta naqaashsha koyiyo oge ay keessa yalissee woykko lo’o?
Taani go’ettiyoo zaareto xaafuwaa ciimma gidida ogiyan paattidanna?
Taani go’ettiyo qofatanne oyshata oottanas bessiyaa ogiyan issuwa hararaa geddarassada xeellidana?
Pilggettas koshshiyaabata ziireyiyogaanne dashshiyoogaa xeelliyoogaan co qofa qonccisiyoogappe eta minotettaanne shuggotetta tobbiyoogan bessidanna?
Ta oosuwaas phalqqetta pilggetta xaafota tobbidanna?
Nabaabiyaa assay ta xaafuwa zaaretoy koshshiyaaga, hanetiyaaganne, go’ay de’iyoogaa giidi ekkanne?
Ha bolla bagga oyshata zaaroti darotto issi malibe’o qofa woykko pilggettaa oysha birshshanas kaafiyaageta.
Oosuwa 1Kase xaafota zaaretiyoogee issi pilggetta projektiyassi immiyoo go’ay aybee aybee?
Ha oosettiya pilggettas mata debbotiyaanne oosotu murutay nabaabiyaagas bettiyoogaa.
Ha pilggetta daroppe kase oosettida huuphe yohuwa zigiretiya yohotta shaakki be’iyoogan merettida qofa palama kamiyooganne kase pilggettaka aasiyoogaa.
Pilggetta qotta gigissiyo wode kase xaafotu zaaretoy baaso qofa immees.
Kassettidi beettidi pilgeettida metuwaara gayttotetta medhdhees.
Oosuwa 1Kase xaafotu zaaretuwan oottiyobatinne oottanna bessenabati aybee aybee?
Neesi cuccumo eray ha pilggetta yohwa xeelliyaagan de’iyoogaa, ha yohuwana wodiyadan missattiya qofaynne hiilla ogeta aasiyo eray de’iyoogaa nabaabiyaageeta bessaa.
Ne pilggetay guppy kanttido yohota zawayees.
Qanttan kuuyetiyaa yohotikka ay keessa koshshaninne ali’o ogiyaan zuletiyoogaawu xube gidenaadan naagees.
Halchchuwan zaareto xaafoy zuubarenaganne huuphe woykko guli’aa gidanawu bessees.
Libreree naqaashatussi ano pultto.
Naa’u xaafuwa zaarettiyo qommoti de’oosona; ayfee (koyro)nne naa’antto zaaretto pulttota getettoosona.
Naa’antto naqaasha pulttoy xaafanchchay ba oosuwaa giddon ayfee naqaashadan suure qonccisibeenaageetta.
Xaafuwa Zaarettoy xaafuwaa buussaay xaafettida zaareto xaafuwa shakki eriyoogappe doometees.
He huuphe yohuwan xaafettidi ogeta qoridi giigisidogaappe guyye.
Pilggeta hiilanchchay meezetanawu go’iyaa daro mata wode giigida oosoti shaaheti eretanas bessees.
Xonbbiya giigisuwan, pilggetaa hiillanchchay bila asa gidanna bessees.
Xaafotu Zaaretotu aahotettay, aybaynne ay keessati xaafuwaa giddo gelenan attanawu bessiyaakko pilggetta hiilanchcha oottiya aawu xalaalay maaccanna besses.
Pilggetta yohuwan gidiya naqaashshay beetiyo wode, pilggetta hillanchchay cora naqaashsha maccrata doomana besees.
Oosuwa 1Pilggetta hiilanchay pilggetta hiillaa pilggetta halchchwa danchchike oottidi aybissi giigisanna bessi.
Pilggetta halchchuwan pilggetta hiillaa kifiliyaan pilggetta hiilanchchay aybaa qonccissii?
Lo’o halchchettida pilggetay giiga qofeti oosettiya oosoy doometanaappe koyro makissettiyo billa hiillay de’iyooga gidanna bessees.
Issi pilggettasi haniyaa pilggetta giigissoy he pilggettiya metowa meradan dummatees.
Yalissa pilggetta eeshshappe issoy he pilggetta murutan xaaxi waaxin qoncciyabata giddiyaagadan pilggettiyaba loyttid birshshyoogaa.
Haggeti nuuni pilggetiyaba birshshidi eranawu maliyo ogetun oychchiyo oyshatuppe amaridageeta.
Pilggeetta leemissota ekkiyo ogiya giyoogee aybee?
Daro pilggetatus, pilggettiyabata ubba pilggiyoogee koshshiyabanne ekeettiyaaba giddenna.
Gammatetta (validity) giyoogee aybee?
Gammatetta giyoogee issi pilggettappe beettida murtay he pilggetta paatiyoogaappe kantti kyidi beettida murutay hara hanotan hara pilggetiyabas halchchuwan pee’ana ay keena gamma gidana danddayiy giyoogaa.
Oosso 21.
Gaxxa bagga gammatettay aybee.
Giddo bagga gammatettay aybee?
Gaxxa bagga gammatetta giyoogee pilggettappe beettida murtay ha pilggetta ooso giddon gelibeena gaxxa assatus woykko hanotatus xaaxi waaxuwan go’ettanawu ay keena maadiyaakko giyoogaa.
Pilggetta leemisuwa ekkiyo hiillaa qommoti aybee aybee?
Duma duma pilggetta leemisuwa ekkiyo hiillati de’oosona; qaadan pilggetta leemisuwa ekkiyo hiillaa, maaduwa baaso oottidi leemisuwa ekkiyo hiillaa,koottan leemisuwa ekkiyo hiillaa hh.
Qaadan pilggetta leemisuwa ekkiyo hiillay, issi pilggetta deretettappe ekkettida leemisuwaappe beettida murutati pilggettay oosettido kumetta deretettas gamma xaaxi waaxin go’etiyoganne merettida balata leemisuwa giigissiyo buussan goyddanawu go’etetees.
Oosuwa Qaadan pilggetta leemisuwa ekkiyo hiillaay aybee?
Qaadan pilggetta leemisuwa ekkiyo hiillay issi deretetta woykko pilggetiyabatu ay eeshshaa gidikkon pilggetanas doorettida bantta giddo dumma dumma uferetta oykkiyo qaaday koyro qofetiyaagaa giddes.
Payddo hiillaa ogiyaan madiya muruta demmanawu, qoodan corattiya pilggetta leemisota go’etiyoogee leemissota shaakkiyo wodiyan mereriyaa balata guutiyo giishshawu ha hiillaa go’etiyoogee daroppe koshshiyaaba.
Oosso 2Naqaashsha shiishshiyo miishshati aybee aybee?
Pilggettaa miishshata giyoogee naqaashsha shiishiyo miishshata giyoogaa.
Ha buquratikka ,oyshatta, oychizaarota, paacetta xaafetaba paatiyooga, xeelaan issi aawu haydaa xaafota.
Ha kifliyaan pilggetta hiilanchchay go’ettanawu koshshiya buqurata shaakkidi malaatanas bessees.
Xombbe xaafotakka ha go’etiddo buquratu duuqqi ekkidi oychizaaruwaa makissiyo xaafota oykkana bessee.
Naqasha paatteta halchchiyoo wode, pillggetta hiilanchay go’etiyoo paddonne paattetta ogeta qonccisana bessees.
Ha pilggetta halchcho kifliyan, pilggetta hiilanchay ba go’ettiyo ogetta qonccissiyoogaan etaka gamma malaatanawu bessees.
Ha halchchuwa kifliyan nuuni ay qonccissanawu danddayiyo?
Ooso Halchchuwa / wodiya Batuwa.
Ooso halchchoy woykko wodiya batoy oosetiyabatu halchchoy dumma dumma projektiya oosoti ay wodiyaan polletana bessiyakko akekisiya halchchuwa ziire xaafuwa giyoogaa.
Oosettiya oosoti marccoy baynan polletena gishawu, qommo baggan tobbido oosuwa halchchoy ha qofettida pilggettay marccuwaara issippe ohettiyaaba.
Issi pilggetta hachchoy ay qommo xaafo qotta koyii?
Daro saynissee pilggetta halchchoti pilggetta oosuwas issi erettidda xaafo qotta go’etees.
Geluwaa/ Guyye bagga haydaa.
Metuwaa qonccissiyoogaa.
Dabbotiy xuufetta zaaretiyoogaa.
Marccuwa batiyoogaa.
Xombbeta.
Oytto xaafota/maccarata.
pilggetta xaafo qotta.
Huuphe yohoy issibassi qoncceenne kaali hanetiyabati aybakko qantta erissiyo hanotan giigees.
Qantta qonccissoy issi sintta qantta pilggetta halchchettida oosuwa qofa dashshetta.
Neeni maxafatuppe, wodiyadan giigida xuuftuppanne hara pultotuppe ekettida ubba naqaashaata xonbbiyan bessees.
Xonbbeti ne oosuwa giddon xaafotun hookko maalaata giddon gaxxa payduwaan(Vancouver style) ; woykko xaafida xaafanchcha sunttan(Harvard style) xaafetanna danddayees.
Xonbbettu ziiriyaa neeni ne pilggettaa gommppa oosuwa giddon wodhdhi dottan( pittaletu kasiya kaaluwa maaraan ) woyko ha pilggetta halchchuwa wurssetan wodhdhana dandayees.
Hagan be’dogaadan, xonbbetta waattidi xaafanawu bessiyakko tobbetiis.
Gidoshin , xonbbiya issi qofa wudidi xaafiyo xaatta oge hagaappe kaalidi beetiyo zuliyan akeekanna danddayettees.
journaaleettu xaafuwaa.
Xaafidaagetu suntta.

Jornaliyaa xaafo payduwaa.
Ha xaafuwa koyronne wurssetta sintat.
Xaafidaageetu suntta.

Ne xonbbetu sintta paydotta.
Kumettanne tilla besso sintta URl.
Internetiya sintta bessotuppe (web site) ekettida xonbbetta dumma xeeluwan, neeni xonbbiyan wottiyo besso sinttaa zaari xeelanas woykko go’ettanassi ammanttiyaaga ogiyan wudettagaa gidanna bessees.
Ay xonbbekka ziiriyan xaafettidageti ubay ne xaafuwan qomppa qonccidaagaa woykko bettiyaagaa gidana bessees.
Wotto xaafota/ maccara xaafota(Appendices).
Ne pilggetta halchchuwan go’ay de’iyo aybanne gujjo naqaashata nabaabiya assassi maaddiyaba gada ne qofiyooba ubatta wotto xaafuwan oytta wootta.
Dashetta.
Pilggetta halchchoy issi pilggetta oottanaas giigida hillanachchay I ba oosuwa waatti oottanakko bessiyaa ciima makisso gidiyoogan na oosuwa yiggiyaagee ay ogiya go’ettidine aybaa oottida oosuwa wurssanaas halchchidakko ettes gina bessanawu go’ees.
Ha shemppoy naqaashsha shiishiyoonne pilggetta hayidda xaaxi waaxo qofattu bollan xonggolees.
Tamaareti , ha shemppuwaa wurssetan.
Etu pilggetasi go’ettana dandayiyo naqashsha qomotta shaaki erana.
dummatetta shaaki eranna.
Eeshsha qonccissonne qooda naqaashshata shiishiyo ogeta qonccissana.
Dumma dumma naqaashshata shiishiyo buquratta go’etana.
Bantta pilggettas hanettiya naqaashsha shiishiyoo buqurata (hiillata) go’ettidi bessiya pilggetta hayiddata go’ettidi bantta pilggetta oottana.
Naqaashshatu Qommotta.
Luxetta hanotta bessiya qooda xaafotanne pilggetta ne oottiyo wode ne nabaabiyo dumma dumma naqaashaa qomotta be’anna danddayossu.
paydduwa naqashshatta.
paydduwa naqaashshati paydduwan ayne mettotenan yiggettanas woykko mazigabanawu danddayeettees.
Suntetta (Nominal) giyo sunttay laatiiniyan ‘ nomen’ giyoogeekka suntta giyooga.
Millatto zageetan qoncciyaabati etta missatto eeshshan issoy issuppe kassettidi woykko guyye attidi zageetiyo maaraa bessees.
Eqottan marccuwa qanxiyoo woraqatati, A,B,Cnne D machchalan masaetettiyoogaa.
Zaggetta xonbba(interval).
Zagga xonbba naqaashshati issi ziireyuwa gatiyo maarani issoy issuwappe de’iyaa lagee hahottetan qonccees .
Ta ufayssa like, 1 doomidi 10 gaakanawu de’iya payduwa beetiyo wode.
Kushshee lyigganaassi, payddoti issoy issuwa darissodan geedaaretana danddayees.
Hegass, layttanne 38 laytta assa giddon de’iyaa dumattetay 12 nne 15 layttay de’iyoo assatun giddon de’iyaa dummatetta issi mala issi assas mela gidida layttay de’anawu danddayees.
Kushshee naqaashshati darissetanawunne shaaketanawu danddayiyoogee 1 nne 2 paydotu giddon de’iyaa dummatettay lageetiyoogaa gaassa xalalaan 4 paydoy 2 ppe naa’u kushshe keena dariyaaga gidiyoogana.
Zaggetta (xonbba)nne kushshee naqaashati bagga mahatta (parametric) Hegasikka, etti bagga makkeyoo buqurattu yezetay shaaketieriyoo maaran bessanasi go’etettees.
Neeni naqaashshatta demmanawu yiggiyo wode, issi naqaashshas muduuso woyko ohetta meray de’iyakko akeekana bessees.
Ohettidda naqashshatu like kantikiyaa xonbbata hegeettikka houwaa bunchchettan (frakshiniya) shaaketiyoogan likketana dandayetigeeta.
Mudduuso naqaashsha woqqoti kumetta paydotu shiiqotun like tossona.
Naqashsha Shiishuwaa.
Ne shiishanawu koyiyoo naqaashshatu qommoy neeni ha naqaashshata ay ogiyan shiishanakko koshiyaa hiillaa maaccees.
Naqqashshatu pulttuwaa.
Naqashshati dumma dumma pulttotuppe shiiqanaa danddayoosona.
Eeshsha Qonccissonne Qooda naqashshat shiishiyo ogetta.
Pilggetta hiilanchatti naqaashshata shiishanawu qofiyo wodiyan dumatidi beetiya naqaashatu qomotta shishanasinne he naqashshatta shiishshiyo ogetukko bantta sintta zaaroosona.
Zara 1 Eeshsha qonccisiyanne qooda pilggettasi naqaashshata shiishiyoo ogiyaa xekka.
Dede danchkiyan.
Danchikyoode meretiya balata guutanasi gidiya keena qoodaa corayioogane sidiya keena abbiyaa.
Assattuppa.
He sohuwaa eftidigattiya (kaaletiya) assatupa.
Pilggetta hydda hanottata kaaliyoogaa.
Ubbaaba mazgabaan naagiyoogee dandayetanaba gidiyo gishshawu ne koyshshan kessiyaa ogee aygakko maacana bessees.
Naqashshati darotto issi hanottappe guyian awu sohuwaka xaafidi oykanasi woyko keehi aaho gigida ogiyaan dumma dumma eeshata shaakiyoogaa simmidi xeelanasi grapiyaan, chartiyaninne halchchuwa xaafi oyketees.
wuda xeelaa.
Xeelaay, issi hanottay baagan woykko kumettan hanetiyo wode xeeliyoogan ha hanota kase halchchetida maaran shaakeretiyooganne mazgabiyooga giyoogaa.
Xeela pilggetta oottiyo wode xaaxi waaxo qofata gidanaas bessiyoogeekka ha hiillay pilggetta projektiyaa oosuwan meto hiillaa gidiyoogaa gidenan , hage keehin gigettida halchchuwan poletiya hiillaa gidiyoogaa.
Oyshshay washetta qommo gididi pilggetta hillanchchay dentiyo oyshatussi zaaruwa immo yaageti giigida oysha zaariyoo woraqatan kuntiyooga giyooga.
Issi issi hiillaa qomottusikka etta minonne lefa miyeeti de’oosoona.
Citta xongoletta hiillay oychizaaro qommo gididi darotto issoy issuwara eretena akeekan dooretida assatta hashshettosona.
Citta tobbekka lo’o ogetta go’etanaanas wayssiyaa qofatanne yohotta ciimaa hassaya immiyoogaa eeshsha qonccisiyaa naqaashshata demmanawu go’osoona.
Hageekka ay maxafata gidikkoka qaaxiya misiletta, televisioniyaa keerottanne sheetatanne xaafettida pultotta maxaafata, woraqattata , dabdaabetta , issi pilggettas woykko kaafe buquradan go’ettiyoobata xaafota paattiyoogaa gomppa paattiyoogakka geetetees.
Qoncce gidenna ogee pilggetta ooso gidiyoogaa hegee koyrottidi oosetidaba gidiyoogan pilggetta oottiyaage denddo naqaashata qashshamena.
pashshetiyageti hassayenan oosetees woykko ‘Doshsho’ hiillaa.
Xaaxi waaxuwaa minjjo xaafoti daroto eretida pultottuppe duuqetiyageta gidishin issito issito dumma xeelay woykko go’ay issi awu naqashsha woykko doonaa haasayata go’etiyoogappe beetanawu danddayees .
Amantiyaganne hannettiyooga giddiyoge minjettida xaafetidabata paattiyoogas kulka yoho.
Zaaruwa imma.
Naqashsha shiishiyoo hiillatati aybee aybee?
Eeshsha qonccisonne qooda naqaashatu giddon de’iyaa ano dumattetay aybee.
Naa’u ano gaassotu naqashsha qomotus aybee?
AGuuxishin heezaa gidiya naqaashsha shiishshiyo xekkata xaafa.
Naqaasha shiishiyo buquray naqashshata assa xalalappe shiishanas go’ees.
Oyshsha naqashsha shiishiyoo buqura go’etiyo naa’u ogetta xaafa?
Xeela naqashsha shiishiyoo hiillaa pacca miyiya xaafa.
Deretetta saynisiyan naqasheshata shiishiyoo oydd naqaashsha qommotti aybee aybee.
Payddo ‘8’ oyshshan de’iya naqaashsha qommotu eeshata qantan qonccissa.
“Neeni shiishanas koyiyo naqaashatu qommoti neeni naqashsha shiishiyo ogeta maacces” giyoogee woygiyoogakko qonccissa.
Ha kifilee pilggettasi bessiya haydda yoohotta qoncisses.
Haydday keehi koshshiyaa pilggetta sohotuppe issuwa gidiyogee cimiyoogee, geela eeshshaa bessiyoo ginna hanenna ogiyan go’etiyoogee daroppe pilggetta oosuwa aahoo tobbe gidiis.
Pilggetta haydday anottettan pilggetta hiilanchatunne eti pilggiyo assatu giddon meretiya gayttotetaba xeelees.
Daro assay kandduwaaba qofiyoo wode, eti qofiyoogee issibay gamma woykko balla giidi shaakiyo wogga qofossonaa.
Daro assati kandduwa luxetta keetaninne goynno keetan Woyko hara deretteta heeratuoppe luxossona.
Daro derettetatussi eeshsha ayssiya seeraa wogati de’osoona.
Neeni pilggetta ottana qofidaba gidiko , pilggetta kanddoy keehippe koshshees.
Pilggetta Oosuwan bessiya kanddoy aybee?
‘Ethics’ giyoo qalay Girikke doanan’ ethos’ giyogappe yiidaba gidishin ayo birshettayka kandduwa giyooga.
Daro assay kandduwaba qofiyo wode /mizza’ne bala’ eranchcha kandduwa, Amanuwa qofa, kayima hassayatu giddon shaakiyaa kanddotuba qofossonaa.
kandduwa birshiyoo hara ogeeti eeshaa woykko kanduwaa xekkatta luxxiyaa eratteta baazatta xongoliyoogan .
Daro luxxetta baazatuwa , eqqottatu era oosotusi etu alaliyaanne keeruwas issuwaw issuwaw dumma banqatiyaa peshsha / seerati de’oosonaa.
Pilggetta konddoy aybissi koshshii?
Pilggetta oossuwan kandduwa woggatta aybssi koshiyaakko baxxuxan bessiyo unddenna gaassoti de’oossona.
Naa’antuwan, pillggetta oosoy daro hashshetiyoogaan dumma dumma eray de’iyo cora assanna ogottata kaaletiyo billa koshshiyo gishshawu suurette xekka mankayanasi ha oosotu hashettidi oottiyo eeshata hegetikka, issoy issuwa ammanettiyoogaa oyshshatetta, issoy issuwara bonchcetiyooganne lagge wattan zupphe maadoy meretena ogiyan oottanaw go’ees leemissuasi, daro suuretteta wogati hegetikka maxaafa gigissiyo awatteta naqashsha koxxiyo pissiya , yara zaareta oosuwa oottiyo wode koshshiya xuuratata wogati guugee buqqura naagiyogasi giigetida gidiidi assa giddon isso issuwara hashshetiyoogekka xoqqisees.
Daro pilggetta hiilanchati bantta oosuwan sabettanas koyigaate gidiyo gishshawu etta qofay carshatettan wuugettidi xayana mala koyokonna.
Heezanttoy suuretteta wogappe dariyaageti pilggetta hiilachchati bantta oosuwaa bantta derettetawu tumanchaba oottiyaagaa gidana mala qonccisosna.
Oydantuwa ,pilggetta suuretete wogti ha pilggetta oosuasi dereteta kaafoy mertanadankka go’ees.
Wursettan, ha pilggetta suuretteta wogatuppe dariye bagati hara qofanne deretteta qo’a immosona .
Hegadanika, pilggetta oottiyoo higgettane ogetta maayetidinne poo’uwaa woykko shempoybata boli oottiyo suure ogiya kaalena hillanchay ba payatteta dafan yegees hara ba yara oosanchatun tamaaretu bollika danuwa gattees.
Pilggetta kandduwa polissettaa.
suureteta ogeti koshshiyooge eretidogadan, daro dumma dumma eratetta ogeti, kawotetta ogetta xeeliyagan hegetika eeshsha malaatata, woggatanne polissetta giigisido eretidaba.
Kaaliyaageti issi issi kandduw geerata gididi dumma dumma eeshsha malatata (codes) bessiyedane xaafo dashetata.
Saynissiyaa qofa immiyoban uban amanetsi giigetta .
Naqashshatta pishshiyoode.
Naqashshata neeppe madhdoppa , quccoppa woykko wora malatoppa.
Eridi Baliyoobappe Geyiyooga.
Experimentiyaa giigisyogan, naqashsha paattiyo wode, naqaasha gogoliyoode , yarata ha oosuwa zaari be’iyoode, oosanchatta dooriyogan, marccuwa maduwas xaafiyoode, issi oosuwas erancha dooriyooganne hara pilggetta oosuwan xalla eesha koshiyoode uban hashattenne ne qofata zuubarisena oottana bessees.
Tumanchatetta.
Ne gelido hiddootatanne mayetidobatta naaga; tumatetan oottaa, ne qofaynne ne ootiyobati issuwa gidana bessees.
Azalla balanne sheneho giyooba neeppe xayssa ne oossotanne ne yarath oossotta kehippe naagetiyooganne hiilan makissa .
Qonccetteta.
Naqashshata , murutata ,qofata miishshatanne dumma dumma buquaretta harara koxxa.
Guugee Bugura Bonchiyooga.
Oosotu dumma malaatata, Hara oosoy duugetenadan naagiyaa maatanne hara qommo guugee buqurata bonchcha.
Xuuraa Naagiyoogaa.
Xuuraa naagiyoo meeteta naaga.
Awattetan Attamissiyoogaa.
Ne oosotta attamisiyoo wode pilggetta era dichchanawnne leqqidi beetiyoo ossota ottiyoogasi peatin ne kancheeyoora oosotta assanas qofiyoogan attamissoppa co kasegaa zari zari ootiyaanne daro buquratta xayssiyagadan attamissoppa.
I. Awattetan (Hogogiyooganne) kaafiyooga.
Tamaaratta tamarisiyoogan kaafiyoganne zooriyoogan kaafa etu sarotteta sinayiyoogan etu bantta qofadan maaccanawu ettas sheniyaa imma.
J. Issippe ootiyaa yaatta Bonchiyoogaa.
Nenara issippe oottiyaa yaratta bonchiyoogaa issuwa issuwaa bessiyadan naagaa.
K. Derettettaba Tookiyooga.
Deretteta dichanne barataa gidiyabata sintaya .
L. Assatteta shaakenan ootiyooga.
Matuman, sheeshan, kochchani woykko etu saynissee leqqattetara minottera gaytotetay baynna gaassota co’o amphiyoogan ne ooso yarattane tamareta eraydda qohiyoonne shaaki xeeluwaa neppe xayssa .
M. Eran leqqiyooga.
Adussa luxettanine lohuwan eranne oosuwaan qara giddiyooganne leqiyoogan ubbatto nena poshsha .
N. Woggasi Haaretiyooga.
Koshiya woggata, eqottatune duma dume kawuwaa polissetta eranne haaretta.
O. Meedossatta naagiyoogaa.
Meedoossatta pilggettan go’etiyoo wodiyaa etasi bessiya kabbuwaa imam.

Eeshsha Qonccissiyaa Naqashshata paattiyoga Eeshsha qonccissiyaa naqashshasi dumma dumma meray dees.
Daro eeshsha qoncccisso Haranahata kabboyiyoo pilggettan, naqashshatu minjjoy dooyaa oyshshatuppt gordda oyshshatuppe, wuddo oyshshatuppe gididi pilggoiyoo oychi zaarotuppe birshshetida naqashshat ubba shoqomnees Gidikoka, eesha qonccisso naqashshatu minjjan awugetu mala pultott (hiilata) xalalaa gidosona giyoo zawi bawaa.

Issi xafanchay eretida engineere/saynissiya assa/ issiban leqqiyoo ooso eray deiyoogaa gidiko , hegasi etu ‘erancha’ gidiyooga gassuwas xafanchay ‘tani’ giiyoo qaala goetiyoogaa ba aweteta bantu qofasi immana dandayosona.
‘Tani’ giyoo qaala goetena gaassotaa.
‘Tani’ giyoo qaalay kali kali goetidaba,ne xaafuwan gidikko ne xaafoy gassotetan woyko meradan hassayetidaga gidiyoogan tilla xaafuwa kalibenaganne awu qofay gujjetido xaafo gidees.
‘Tani’ giyoogaa goetanagee ne xaafuwa daro amantiyaag ootees Nababiyaage ne’tani’ guussa neeni tiaal xaafomeran xaafi dandayena asa giiohi gogo lana dandayees xaafo shiiqotun beetiyooge ne xaafiyoobe akeekana maladan ne era ooso heera xaafotura meezyayees.
Nabebiyaagee neeni ‘Tani’ gaadde xaafiyoogaa neeni hara eranchati ne oosuwaa heeran xaatidobane qofidoba akeekana dandayenagappe dendidi ba buzzo dooruwan c’o goetieis giidi gogolana dandeyees.
‘Tamarettu xaafuwan’ Tani’ giyoo qala goetiyoogee issi assi ba huuphe qofan oyketidi hayuwaa immiyooga woyko ha tameree a’ oossoy hara assan xeeletanaw bagedden eqiyagakone giidi a keekenan (hassayenan) ootidogana.

Korssiya Qonccissuwa.
Ha korssee luxanchchati Wolaytta medhdhixaafuwaa xeelliyaagan shiiqida aaho huuphe yohotaa wudidi xeelliyooba gidishin hegeetuppekka bira gidiyaageetta be’anawu: medhdhixaafuwaa birshshettaa,qantta medhdhixaafuwaa qoncce haydaa, qantta medhdhixaafuwaa eeshshata, qantta medhdhixaafuwaa ufurettata, qantta medhdhixaafuwaanne adussa medhdhixaafuwaa dummatettaa, qantta medhdhixaafuwaa xaafiyoo hiillaa, amarida Wolaytta qantta medhdhixaafota dashiyoogaa, yirffiyoogaa, yiggiyoogaanne hhm… ha korssee xaaxiwaaxidi bagiddooni oyiqqiis.
Qantta Medhdhixaafuwa birshshettaa shaakidi akeekkosona.
Qantta medhdhixaafuwaa qoncce haydaa shaakkidi eroosona.
Qantta medhdhixaafuwaa eeshshata dummayoosona.
Qantta medhdhixaafuwaa ufurettata shaakki eridi xaafanawu goettoosona.
Qantta medhdhixaafuwaanne adussa medhdhixaafuwaa dummatettaa boxooxxissidi eroosona.
Qantta medhdhixaafuwaa xaafiyoo hiillaa ba kushiyan gelissoosona.
Luxido ogiyaa kaallidi dumma dumma huuphe yohotun qantta medhdhixaafuwaa xaafoosona.
Amarida Wolaytta qantta medhdhixaafota dashiyoogaa, yirggiyoogaanne yiggiyoogaa akeekoosana…hhm.
Qantta medhdhi xaafoy hara qommo xuufetuura aybin malatettiyakkonne qassi aybin dummatiyakko zuleyana.

Woqa.
Hagee issi qantta medhdhi xaafuwan qonccida hayhay polettido man”iyaa woykko danddiyaa, wodiyaanne eta hanotaa xaaxiwaaxin woqa geetettees.
Qatuwa (mani’iya) Hagee issi qantta medhdhi xaafo giddon qonccida hayday awan woykko awugaa heeran polettide giya oyshaa zaariyagaa gididi asa naati de’iyoonne de’ana danddayiyo heeraa xeellees.
Wodiyaa Issi qantta medhdhi xaafuwa giddon qonccida yaday awude polttidaakkonne bessiya wodiyaa shaahuwaa, qoodaa, layttaa, aginaa, gallassaa, gallassaa shaahuwa h.
Carkkuwa hanotaa Hagee qassi issi qantta medhdhi xaafo giddon qonccida hayday polettiyoode de’iyaa wodee aymalee woykko waanidi uttidee giyaagaa xeelliyaaba gididi balggokko, bonekko, irakko, awakko, poo’okko, xumakko, shaanoochchakko, gaappokko, kinchchokko, .
Peeshshaa/Deretettaa hanotettaaHagee qassi issi qantta medhdhi xaafuwa giddon polettiya hayday eeshshwaa hachchi hachchi de’uwa bollan Gayttiyaa laamiyaa xeelliyaaga gididi he hayday polettido issi erettida heeraa meray he haydaa bolli waani qonccidaakko bessiyaaba.
Heennaa hagee qassi he qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa qonccida haydaa doomettan merettida hanotay aybee giyaagan ufayssiyaanne miichchiyaabakko, poo’obakko, hashshiyaabakko, kayyoyiyaabakko, hidootaa qanxxissiyaanne xumabakko, … hhm ha”ikka woqa giddon qonccissoosona.
Kiitaa: kaallidi shiiqida qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa giddon deiya woqa macarata qoridi kessidi aahuwan xaafite.

Issi galla Baatisoy kooso xaliya uyidaagee geeyi simmidi gomppay honggaawidaagan soo yiyoode keettay tullu gees.

Poocammidinne ufayttidi de’iya asatu soo xalahe kushiyan guulloy xayenna giyoogaadan issi galla keettaayeera banttana layttaa shaachchiya keena kattaa soossi ashshidi palaha kattaa caani ekkidi giyaa biichchidaashin laaxaa kattidi toyssennan aggido guuganttaa bonqquwaa bolli naati dalai mehiyawu soo ekkidi akeekennan wottidoogan poddu giida tamay boniyaa carkkuwan peregettidi laluwa gidiis.

Qommoora qonccida qantta medhdhi xaafuwa kaalliya Woqa Go’ettida ogiyaa tobbidi yiggidi kifiliyaani shiishshite.
Ha qommoora de’iyaa qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa giddon giigidi shiiqida haydaa woqan amppada hara woqaara de’iyaa issi qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa ne koyydo huuphe yohuwaa bolli xaafada shiishsha.
Issi qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa giddon xaafanchchay bar kahaa giddon simerettiyaanne un”iyaa deretettaa allaalleta xeelliyaa qofaa haydaaa cora ginaara kasiyaa kaaluwaa naagidi mayriyoogaa woykko issi qantta medhdhi xaafo haydaa giddon polettidabatu kasiya kaaluwaa garadaa susaa gaanawu danddayettees.
Susay halchchettidanne qoncce gidida haydan polettiyaabatu kasiyaa kaaluwa gididi doomettay , giddoynne poloy/wurssattay/ kuushshay de’iyoo haydaa utettaa bessees.
Qantta medhdhi xafoy darotoo issi utettan issi kutti nabbabidi wurssanawu danddayiyoonne issi erettida susaara de’iyaagaa gididi ba giddon ichchashubata oyqqees.
Erissuwaa/geluwaa ha kifilee qantta medhdhi xaafuwa giddon xaafanchchay qonccissiyo sohuwaanne he qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa hayda xinxxisoy qoncciyoosaa.
Kahaa kaquwaa ha kifilee qassi issi medhdhi xaafo haydaa giddon de’iyaa hanotati undduwaalettiidi woykko qaxiqalleettiid biyoonne eeshshaawatu giddon wokko eta bolli dicciiddi biyaa ooshhsay/ dom”ettay qoncciyoosaa.
Umbbubulettaa Issi qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa giddon polettiyaa haydan qonccida ooshshsay woykko eeshshaawatu giddon gidin eta bolli qonccida dom”ittay liiphiyaa kiyiyoonne poridi wodhdhiyoo xoqqa /kiike sohuwa.
Zarbbettaa/worettaa issi qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa nabbabiyaageetu kahay kaqettidosaappe naagiyoobaa poluwaa xeeraa be’idi wodhdhiyoosaanne eeshshaawatu giddon/bolli liiphiyaa kiyda ooshshay woppiyoopaa doommiyo sohuwa.
Dashettaa hagaani issi xaafetti shiiqida qantta medhdhi xaafoy wuriyoonne nabbabiyaageeti naagiyoo hayday muleera poluwaa demmiyoosaa.
Bayra/ kaalettiyaa eeshshaaway ooratta naqaashshaa demmiyoosaa.
He naqaashaa maayettana xaykkonne ammanettiyoosaa.
He naqaashaa bolli ba hoolliyaa shociyaa shocennaa yiggidi maaciyoo sohuwaa.
Leemisuwaassi ‘Tumay tuujjumaa xoonees’ giyaa qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa giddon de’iyaa haydaa susay Dumaaloora machchee Baaloomiira na’aa Duuqqaara issi kosha wodiyaani Dumaaloson de’iyoogaappe erissuwaani doommidaagee tuujjumay shiiqidi Dumaaloy nu bolli axiraariyoy A soy saro gidiina gidenne A machchiyoo goromoote giidi haytta aagaa bashshana giyaa maqquwaappe doommidi kahaa kaquwaani gelidaagee ha maqqoy aybaa kessana de’ii giyoogan ooshshaa zuussaa kaallanaadan oottinnee biibi Baaloomo malttiyaan kayso giidi qashuwaassi xaacee oyqqin umbbubulettawu gakkidaagee goromootetettaa yootin kawoy edayees giidi lahuwaassi bollaara kammido kaysotettaa akeekennan A yaynnido xoossay qaari olin I tumay kiyiyoode liiphiyaa kiyidosaappe wodhdhiyaagee beettes.

Erissuwaa Dashettaa.

Xambbixallo siiquwa.

Na’ee sunttay yooshshiyo.

deree shiiqidi o sho’I efiida wodallaa qaphiyan qoridi qasho keettaa efiinnee yooshshiyo ekkinne aakime keettaa.

Meeziyaa Oyshata.
Ha qommoora shiiqida qantta medhdhixaafuwaa giddon qonccida eeshaawatu eeshshaa hetada bessa.
Ha qantta medhdhixaafuwa huuphe yohoy xambbixaallo giissidabay ayba milatii shaakkidi bessite.
Hanotay polettido sohuwaanne wodya/woqa dummayidi bessite.
Xambbixallo siiquwa intte nabbabbiyoode intta akeekan karssikarssoy merettido gaasoy ayba geetii?
Kase intte nabbabido qantta medhdhixaafoy de’ikko intte akeekidobaanne taamaaridobi de’ikko intte meeziya kifile giddon shiishshite.
Ooshshay issi qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa giddon qoncciyaa haydaa susaa zaa’aassi keehin koshshiyaabanne maaddiyaaba.
Ooshshay palama xalla gidennan he qantta medhdhi xaafuwan qonccida haydaa giddon de’iyaa bira/ kaalettiyaa eeshshaawaa bollinne I/A biyoo ogiyaa bolli gakkiyaa sugettaa, xubiyaa, sheekissiyaa qofaanne eqettiyaa wolqqaa woykko baaxiyaa xaaxi waaxin ooshshaa geetettees.
Issi qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa giddon darotoo issi guli”a gidiya baaxxe de’ikkonne issitoo issitoo qassi issi wolqqaama baaxeenne he baaxiyawu daashsha gidiyaa hara cora sima/ burcce baaxeti de’ana danddayoosona.
Ooshshay naa”u qommo gidisshin hegeettikka.
Karebagga ooshshaa kaalettiyaa eeshshaawaynne A/I yarati Etaara eqettiyaa kareppe yiyaa wolqqatuura ooyiyoo ooshshaa.
Garssa ooshshaa hagee qassi eeshshaawati bagiddon banaara/bagiddon (ba kahaara) baaxetiyoo ooshshaa.
Qassikka ooshshay merettana danddayiyoo hanotata xeelliyaagan ooni oonaata ooyyi giyaa oyshaa kaalliyaagaadan zaaranawu danddayettees.
AsiAsaara/beettiyaabaara (physical) issi qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa haydaa giddon qonccida kombbe/ kaalettiyaa eeshshaaway ba wolqqaa go’ettidi banaara eqettiyaa asaara woykko asummaa maayida mereta wolqqaara (mehetuura, do’atuura) baaxetiiddi beettiyoo ooshshaa.
AsiHanotatuura/de’uwaara (classical) qantta medhdhi xaafuwaa giddon beettiyaa kaalettiyaa eeshshaawaynne A yarati sinttan wottidi poliyoo haydaara eqettiyaa bantta qaadaara woykko bantta de’uwa gaasuwan banttana gakkiyaa de’o metotuura baaxetiyoo ooshshaa.
AsiDeretettaara/peeshshaara (social) issi qantta medhdhixaafuwaa giddon merettida kombbe eeshshaaway bari de’iyoo heera deretettaa giddon de’iyaanne banaara eqettiyaa deretettaa qofaara, deretettaa giddon de’iyaa iita xeelaara,meeze wogaatuura…h.
AsiBanaara/ba kahaara (psychological) Issi qantta medhdhi xaafuwa giddon qonccida kombbe eeshshaaway ba giddon ba kahaara,ba shemppuwaara,tumanne worddo giya annaace qofatuura,ba ixxiyoonne ba dosiyo doorotuura,ba huuphe giddon merettiyaa zaaruwa koyiya oyshtuura baaxetiyo ooshshaa.
Xaaxi waaxin ooshshay ha hanotatu ubban qonccana danddayees.
Kiitaa: Kaallidi shiiqiya qantta medhdhi xaafuwa xeellidi geeddarissite.

Qantta medhdhixaafo gaanawu digaiyaabi dees giidi qoppeetii?

Ha bollara shiiqida xuufiyaa qantta medhdhixaafo giikko eeshshaawati aappunee.
Mehdhdi xaafuwa giddon qonccida asatu eeshshaa gatti xeellees.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwa giddon de’iyaa asaa xeelliyaagankeettaawa/yaranne allaga/diina giidi naa’awu shaakkana danddayettees.
Qantta medhdhi xaafuwa giddon de’iya asatu woykko asumma eeshshaawatu eeshshaa xeelliyaagan Issi qantta medhdhi xaafuwa giddon de;iyaa hayday nabbabiyaageetussi tuma malatidi beettanaadan woykko ammanttanaadannee appe timirttiyaa ekkanaadan koshshiyo gishshawu eeshshaawatu kanddoy tuma malatana bessees.
Eeshshaaway dosiyoobaaninne ixxiyooban.
Hara asay eeshshaawa bolli shiishshiyo qofan, nashettan, tooshiyan hegaanne hegaa milatiya ogetun qonccissana danddayees.
Eeshshaawati haydaa giddon kaa’iyo beeran heezzawu.
Shaahettoosona.
Buzo eeshshaawaa (individual character) ha eeshshaaway kumetta, cora zooziyaara qara gididanne undduwaalo asatettaara de’iyaa eeshshaawa.
Dicciyaa eeshshaawa (dynamic character) –Ha eeshshsaaway qantta.
Mdhdhdi xaafuwa giddon laamerettiya eeshshaara de’iyaa woykko laamiyawu qonccida eeshshaawaa gididi issi eeshshan asi malaatana danddaeyenna cora mera asatettaara de’iyaa eeshshaawa.
Dilccida eeshshaawa (static character) Ha eeshshaaway daroton amarida laamettenna qoncce eeshshaa tookkidanne asi he eeshshan shaakkidi malaatana danddaytiyo qaaxxenna eeshshaara de’iyaa eeshshaawa.

Ha asaa be’ida na’iya waasuwa shoddin deree gakkin olinne woxxiigiis; waasoy olay eqqin guyyee guyyiyaawu giya waasoy leeliis; deriya xoonidi biidaagaa xundduqiya agunttay oyqqinne tollu ootti aggiis yedaa ba’iiddi biida qalaxee/bade gaddabbi oottin batibatin woossin ixxinne qasho keettaa efiyoorin wontta dere yaynniyo gutaran bonchchettiya zaari hayttaa luyshayidi wombbaraa/daannaa sintti shiiqidaagee adussa wodiya qashettiyo maachchaa siyidi hayttay hashiya gakkin geddi giidi garssaara luuxxidi tumaa mooridi, maataa naaqqidi ba amuwaa bashshidi hallittay oggin hanniira aadhdharkkina giis.

Qantta medhdhi xaafuwa poloy nabbabiyaagaa woykko ezggiyaaga woqqaa tamaarissees giidi qoppeetii.
Issi qantta medhdhi xaafuwa giddon qonccida haydaa xaafida xaafanchchaassi de’iyaa xeelaa ginaa woykko tenqqaa xaaxi waaxin xeelaa ginaa geetettees.
Doonaa bilaa giddon erettida oyddu qomo qantta medhdhi xaafuwa tenqqati woykko xeelaa ginati de;oosona.
Yooga xeelaa (innocent eye) Ha xeelay issai qantta medhdhi xaafuwa giddon qonccida hayday aybanne erenna gare naatu doonan odettidoogaadan shiiqiyoode(Gastta asa eehshsaappe muleera dumma woykko kareeraa gididi qoncciyoode.
Kahaa zataa (stream of consciousness) Ha xeelay qassi issi qantta medhdhi xaafuwa giddon qonccida hayday odettiyoode xaafiyaage huuhpiya woykko kahaa giddon bana gelissi wottidi woykko ba kahaa giddon eeshshaawa wurssi gelissi wottidi eti qoppiyoobaanne oottiyobaa ubbaa etedan qopidi xaafiyoogaa.
Izaawatettaa xeelaa (first peson prespecive) Hagee qassi issi qantta medhdhi xaafuwa giddon hayday odettiyo ginay kombbe woykko kaalettiyaa eeshshaawaara keehin dabbotiya woykko Assi/Iiissi yara gidiyaa eeshshaawan koyro xekka asan odettiyaaba gididi darotoo Ta, Tana ,Taagaa, Taassi, Taappe, Nu,Nuna,.
La”a xeelaa (omniscient prespecitive): Ha xeelay issi qantta medhdhi xaafuwa giddon xaafanchchay he qantta medhdhi xaafuwa haydaa susaa la’a xeelaa go’eettidi qonccissana danddayees.
Hagan xaafanchchay issi eeshshaawaappe hara eeshshaawaakko, Issi poluwaappe hara poluwaakko, ba koyidoogaadan la’an simerettidinne qaaxxidi ba medhdhido eeshshaawatu qofaa, heennaanne qusttettaa (minotaa) xeelliyaagan haydaassi colbbuwan eqqidi ba koydo sohuwaaninne wodiyan naqaashaa immana danddayees.
La”a xeelaassi naa’u macarati de’oosona.
A) Uni’o la”a xeelaaHagan xaafanchchay haydaa heezzantta xekkaa asa baggaara (Eti,I,A,Hegeeti,h.
B) Halchcho La”a xeelaa Hagankka un”o la”a xeelaa macaraadan xaafanchchay haydaa heezzantto xekkaa asaa go’ettidi yootees.

Hegaappe simmin ha hayyuwa qaalan ammanada Shamaca gita hidoottaa wottido maahee kuushshaa agina 21, 1970 M.L shamaca azina gelido hezzantto layittaa bonchchiyo huupphe gallassan sa’ayi woggaa wonttidaagan omoosa miizza yeessiyo guuran woninne maaretay shamacissi keehin meteeshin maaheegee ubba keehin barchcheyin cawugaa shukkiyaa bayiraa duregodaa Duxeebo Karen zamppan gugay giiphphamidi maccaasay danccuwaa attumaasay xixxaabbiyaa birshshidi irppaniyaani gulbbatidi Shamaca duude hayiqqennaadan naatiran mayiraamo shiiqqishin saruwan hiilee magaaliyaawu gowattee Macari kushiyaan yelettin geedobayikka waayissennan wodhdhin asay maahessi oyidda ililidi mayraamissi oydda ililidi soo simmin dakko uppayssay heeraa maayoppe attin maalaaliyaa hanotan he upayissay gam”ennan yeehuwawunne kayyuwawu laamettigis.
Hegaappe simmin ha hidootaa wottido kaalliyaa attumanaassi dabboy shiiqidi sunttaa sunttiyoo gallassi kiyida palamaykka maalaaliyaaba.
Gido shin etasoo wogga goday, aawaa aaway, ta na’aa sunttay ‘’Maaha’’ ginneekka hara suntta ubban haattaa tigin “Maahee” giishin attiiggis.

Hegaappe simmin kaalliya layttaa gifaataa aginan 1979 M.L Maaha aaway efiidi Abaa paskkaala giyoo paranjjay marcuwaa qoxxiyo xoga biitay de’iyo laallan, wolaittan koyro keexxido, daro eranchchati puutido wanddara 1ro xekka luxetta golliyan zeero kifiliyan gelissiyoode Maahee uddupuntta layttaa biro oyqqiidi giittaa birshshidabaa malaliyaagee koyro bakkaa wurssinnee zeeruwaappe koyro kifiliyawu xaallinnee ha kase laytti be’idi yeekkido naata ubba, ba laggeta he laytti gakkiyaagis.
He biidosan qassi moottan de’iyaa 41 luxetta golletuppe ba gishshaa gishshaa tookkidi shiiqida innaabootiyaa (ha’’I de’iyaa wolayttappe, Gamoppe, Goofappe, Dawuroppe, Konttappenne Baskeettoppe shiiqidaagaa) muliyaa hurxxu oottidi sintta xeera kiyidi he wode miishshay keehin ali”iyo wode issi sha’’u biraanne pilipise iraadooniyaanne daagaa okisppordde paranjjatto qaalaa kochchaara tooki ekkidi soo yiidi Yuukaanne Shamaco woraa yettin shamacaa ba bolluwantta anjjoynne cuchchaay ba na’aa bolli ciyyiiddi de’iyaagaa be’ada he sohuwan dendda eqqada danccuwaa birshshada, afalaa marxxada huuphessan baareetan de’iyaa eessaa meeshuwaa menttada buudan duuqqada tuussaa zemppada ba bolluwantta ayyaanaassi qonashiyaa gixxada eessaa dukkada oydda illiyoode Yuukkay loyttidi akeekidi simmidaagee ikka anjjoy karihi gin denddidi eessaa baawaa ayyaanaassi mixxillis.

Maahee he ufayssan kumi uttidaashin Shamaca uttadaa “Ta na”awu ne aawaa aawanttu anjjuwaa ha nena zonnayiyaagaa hassayay” giyoorin Maahee karhi oottidaagee xeelliddi xiskkidabaadan jallidi qofaa shaaraa qashamiyoogaa doommidi, bana aawaa aaway “neeni ta de’o xuuraa shiishshada minjjiyoo tawozana qol”o!
Maahessi hegaadan hanshin issi gallaa dogidobaa hassayssiyaa ooratta wonttay wonttiyaaggis.
Gidoppe attin ha ubbabaakka tamaaridi simmidi gakkana danddayiyoogaa wottiidi denttiidi gakkidi kaalliyaa ogiyaa baagaa maacidoogaa aynne ashshennan bari aawaassi odanawunne aaway chii giikko biittaa yeggidi baqatanawu bari wozanaara gefaa gelidi wurssiyoorin kafoy ceeqqiyaaggis.
Maahee karee dooyettanaappe kasetidi siirixaa giddon duppaa kalchchiyan qoxxidi saddido bari aawaa arssaa sinttan gulbbatidi bar maachchaanne halchchuwaa qoqqoppidi yootiyoode aaway miichchaanne qiriyaa doommidi, tana’awu kase tamaarida ubbay hare taran xaafiyoogaappe harabaa demmibeenna gishshawu tanaara ne’aawaara coo aqada pee’iyoogee, machchada yelada bonchchettiyoogee, daaliyoogee, daannatiyoogee dareesi giidi hanqqettin yeekkiidi agidi kiyidaagee keehin deree yaynniyo bar aawaa aawaa ishshaa saalaamo godaa Mallaqa kushiya oyqqi ekkidi ehiyaaggin aaway keehin dagammidi “Intte ha guutta na’ay awaasiya xeegin waanidi yeeti?
